story:
WHY SUNNIES HAWAII?

I mean really, what make us unique? 

BAMBOO.

SUSTAINABLE. Bamboo is self-sustaining. Think of it like a grass that grows back to full height in around 2 years. 

LIGHTWEIGHT...you will be AMAZED how light these sunglasses are!

FLOATABLE...so, we aren't really sure if that is actually a word...but THEY TOTALLY FLOAT! No more missing sunglasses after you get taken out by a wave. Or if fishing gets a bit crazy and they end up overboard. 

POLARIZED?! 
You bet your bottom dollar they are. 


WARNING: This means the sun's glare will no longer be your excuse for missing that wave or casting your line on the rocks.

SPRING HINGES. Not only are spring hinges the highest quality hinges available, they provide a unique custom fit. 

AFFORDABLE. Not just affordable, but the MOST affordable designer, polarized, spring hinge, water-proof, lightweight, branded, unique sunglasses on the market. Scratch that, on the PLANET. 

So...it looks like the only choice you have to make is one pair, or two?

Note: All three high quality options are polarized and have spring hinges. 

Option 1: 
Natural Bamboo Mirrored Lens- Blue or Yellow Options

Option 2: 
Dark Brown Bamboo- Black lenses

Option 3:
Natural Bamboo- Black Lenses


WHY WE NEED YOU

We have spent months finalizing samples and gearing up for production. The manufacturor we have partnered with is ready for our final order...this is where you get in! We need to raise $6,000 through your orders of Sunnies in order to proceed with this first production run! Contribute to our project today, and you will receive your first pair of Sunnies Hawaii before the end of summer. Mahalo!

Let's talk about perks! 

(If we do not reach our funding goal of $6,000...you DON'T get charged!! Click the "Choose your perk" Button to choose your reward!)

$28- Thanks for coming early to our party! The first 25 people will receive their choice of Sunnies for just $28! (Retail $56-$62)

$32- Black Lens Natural Bamboo. Clean, minimal, sleek. (Retail $56)

$34- Your own pair of Sunnies Hawaii, blue, yellow colored lens. (Retail $62)

$34- Your own pair of Sunnies Hawaii, dark brown bamboo. (Retail $62)

$62- Receive TWO pairs of Sunnies! (Retail $124)

$90- Last but not least, our lowest rate per pair, receive THREE pairs of Sunnies! (Retail $186)

story:
Who We Are:

We are a design and development studio specialising in watches and accessories. Our day-to-day consists in bringing new products to the global market.

We love what we do, but we want to do more.

Using our knowledge, we have created a high quality and very stylish automatic skeleton watch. Through our know-how and with the help of our contacts, we have been able to create this great watch at a very affordable price.

60% of all the profit that we make from this watch will go towards helping orphans, this will be through both existing charities and projects of our own.

The other 40% will be used to expand the business because the bigger we are, the more we can help.

What We Need & What You Get

We need funding to create the full range of watches and to get the Orphan Watch Project name out there. For this, we will be offering a range of perks for you to choose from including:

  • The opportunity to help a great cause
  • All our watches at exclusive discounted prices
  • A limited edition Orphan Watch made available only to backers

The Technical Stuff

Case: ø40mm stainless steel case (limited edition with PVD black coating)

Movement: Automatic 

Strap: Genuine leather strap with stainless steel buckle

Choosing Your Colour

If we reach our funding goal, we will send you and e-mail asking you for your choice of colour.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can’t contribute, you can still be a great help. How?

Spread the word! The more people that know about us, the bigger a chance we have of reaching our goal.

You can find us on Facebook and Twitter or head over to our website for a closer look.

Thank you for taking the time to read our proposal and thank you for your support.

 

 

Disclaimer :

All images are representations only and may differ slightly to the final product.

story:
WHAT WE BELIEVE IN

        

Creating opportunities that last a lifetime. Our mission is to build bright futures for teens who come from broken situations and were never told they can make a difference.

Reduce the global footprint, by producing our handbags and bracelets in Los Angeles, using skilled local craftsman who can share their knowledge and pass the craft on to our teens.

To change the way people look at buying. The more our customer buys, the more jobs they create.. considerable value is added to every purchase. Now our customer becomes the architect of our brand.. or in this case, the designer of someone's destiny

                                                                           

                                                            

                                               WE HAVE WORKED WITH                                                                        

        

                                                                 

 

In speaking w/ CEO's of major outreach organizations from Los Angeles to San Diego many agreed that after their teens go through programs to learn a trade, if they cannot find work often times they wind up back on the streets. 

   

                                                   Reviews

 

 "Create Now strives to offer unique resources and opportunities to foster, homeless and disadvantaged youth. Vincent has done an outstanding job in mentoring our youth by creating a new brand, and initiating sales. He has shown our Teens that anything is possible." - Create Now LA 

"Akcpt would help our youth who are in a crucial period in their lives and are striving to become self-sufficient." -Covenant House California

"We loved the workshop you facilitated with our students, mentoring them through the design process inspiring creativity, and introducing career opportunities in fashion."-LA's BEST

"This project would not only allow the women of DWC an opportunity to re-ignite their creative voice but also a possible foot into employment in the fashion world."-Downtown Women's Center

"Vincent has my full support and endorsement with this important project, which I feel will be of great value to our city."-Commissioner of the City of Los Angeles

 

 

PERKS

 

OUR  JONATHAN  HANDBAG

Slate Grey/ Black/ Printed Sides

$265.00

                    

              

A stylish looking urban handbag that dresses up or down.

16 L x 10 H x 7.5 W

MATERIALS

         high end faux leather, vegetable tanned leather, metal zipper, twill lining

PARTS

                   magnetic snap closure, metal feet, adjustable shoulder straps

 COMPARTMENTS

         easy access inside zipper pocket, cell phone pocket, small note size pocket

             

 

 

OUR NICOLE HANDBAG

black/ printed inner strap and inside lining

$225

                                      

                                            

                                             A fun, everyday, versatile, handbag  

                                                               14 L x 10.5 H x 6.5 W                                                                        

MATERIALS

           high end faux ostrich leather, vegetable tanned leather, printed canvas lining

PARTS

                                            gunmetal snaps closures, metal zippers

COMPARMENT

easy access inside zipper pocket, cell phone pocket, small note size pocket

            

 

 

OUR ANTOINE HANDBAG

 creme printed canvas/ brown straps

$200

                        

                      

                          A sturdy, large sized tote, that can go anywhere, anytime

   21 L x 12 H x 6.5 W  

MATERIALS

                            printed canvas/ vegetable tanned leather/ twill lining

PARTS

antique brass studs/ metal zipper

COMPARMENTS

easy access inside zipper pocket, cell phone pocket, small note size pocket

              

 

                                                        PLEASE NOTE

 OUR FAUX LEATHER IS THE SAME QUALITY USED IN HIGH END DESIGNER BRANDS. 

The Jonathan and Nicole designs are made of combination of real and faux leather. The Antoine handbag is made of real leather and canvas. Our bracelets, dog collar and men's wallet are made of real leather. All of our products are designed in collaboration with our teens and made in the US.

 

OUR BRACELETS

 

$55

metallic bronze vegetable tanned leather, glass crystals, metal studs, magnetic metal closure -one size 8"

akcpt hope, akcpt desire, akcpt change

 

 

                               

$55

metallic silver vegetable tanned leather, glass crystals, metal studs, magnetic metal closure -one size 8"

akcpt love, akcpt giving, akcpt joy, akcpt me

 

                                  

$55

matte black vegetable tanned leather, glass crystals, metal studs, magnetic metal closure -one size 8"

akcpt passion, akcpt courage, akcpt individuality

 

 

OUR DOG COLLAR

              

$45

 matte black vegetable tanned leather, glass crystals, metal studs, metal hardware

 1 size available- measures 14 - 18 inch neck

 

 

 OUR LIMITED EDITION MEN'S WALLET

                                                 

                                                                                                      

           

            

$65

Very slim, ultra soft kidskin black leather wallet. Six credit card pockets, one billfold, and two slide pockets. Measures 4.25 L x 3.5 W folded. Nicely finished w/ gold Akcpt debossed logo

 

 

THE TEAM

 

                      

 

Hi I'm Vincent Libretti the founder of Akcpt. I've been in the fashion business for over 17 years. Nowadays, it's become so special because I'm able to use fashion to impact change in someone’s life. I get a huge reward from believing in people who were never truly loved or accepted. It's all about looking into someone's eyes and embracing their wholeness. You know people can go far when someone tells them positive, beautiful things that they see in them. It's believing in that person that makes them soar.

Our company will always operate by a quote my Dad told me early on.."What's important is to make someone else feel important" 

Thank you ahead of time for supporting this brand....

Please help us by spreading the word!

If you would like to reach us, feel free to email us at support@akcpt.com. We would love to hear from you!

Best

Vincent

                                                                                                                                          

                                                                           

               

                     

 

Jamie Lambert

Our Apparel Production Director

Jamie is such an asset with her 10 years of production experience in the apparel industry. She holds the highest standards and prides herself on building lasting relationships.  Her knowledge, compassion and drive are easily felt by all. Everyone loves her positive spirit, along with her ability to drive change through innovation.

 

                                                                     

 

                                         

 

Ben Litchman

Our Guidance Coordinator

Ben has worked in the non-profit sector since 2010 providing services for teens experiencing homelessness, and recovering from substance abuse. He has facilitated therapeutic group assignments by utilizing the arts; painting, drawing, photography, film-making and music & songwriting. Personally I have never met a more real, in touch human being. Ben is a magnet of hope and encouragement.

 

 

 

 

Project Timeline

We manufacture with a group of highly experienced factories in the Los Angeles area.  Based on our past experience, we anticipate being able to fulfill orders within 8 -10 weeks, but we should note that forecasting demand is an inexact science. If order volumes exceed our expectations, it might take slightly longer to fulfill orders. Our expected delivery is March 2017. We will always keep you up to date on all deliveries.

Again thank you for your wonderful support and making a huge difference!

story:
JOAGO was crafted after the founders traveled to Southeast Asia and witnessed the harrowing impact of ocean pollution on the local environment. Our goal is to increase awareness & engage others in a way that incentives substantial change in our waste management. With retail being the leading industry of our generations, our cost-effective, eco-friendly products were subsequently formed.

 

 

 

 

Moon phase

Making our EOS model even more elegant/beautiful with this moon phase design with some ocean waves. Designed from and for our oceans by the famous watch designer, Miguel Catris. 

 

STRAPS OPTIONS: Ocean waste, pineapple waste, vegan velvet and recycle stainless steel strap.

All our straps have a quick release system to allow you to change the strap in less than 10 seconds.

We put nature at the heart of our decisions as we consider it the most fundamental factor of the world. We do not only want to create a retail company that sells products but a company with a commitment towards cleaning the oceans every day through our products

story:
HELLO INDIEGOGO!

I'm Jack, and I'd like to present to you the Key-Z! The next evolution of key holders.

The Key-Z is made with a non-slip, non-abrasive silicone. It is shorter than a deck of cards, as wide as a dollar bill and as thin as 3 stacked house keys. It will change your life FOREVER! 

Silicone is soft enough not to damage surrounding objects, yet durable enough to withstand extreme conditions.

It's so thin, it will practically dissappear from view when in your pocket, eliminating those pesky bulges generic keychains are notorious for.

I am a minimalist, I like it when things are simple. But for those who like to add and customize, the Key-Z can accommodate you! There's room for easy expansion like a money clip, card slot or custom usb drive.... the possibilities are seriously endless!

What I Need & What You Get

Your donations will go towards manufacturing. Then, I will approach major brands and retailers in order to help get the Key-Z into everybody's hands. I TRULY feel that the Key-Z will help declutter the world, and appreciate your help in accomplishing my goal.

$27,000 is needed for the first run, this includes packaging and shipping. I have also allocated funds for online presence and marketing.

By pledging, not only do you have the opportunity to be the first to own a Key-Z, you can also promote a business or brand like never before!

The Key-Z makes a great gift, too!

If this campaign is not 100% successful, you will be refunded by Indiegogo. You can feel comfortable knowing that your pledge is actually going towards something.

If you pledge to receive a Key-Z, you will have the option of voting on the color! The top 4 color choices will be produced.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that not everyone needs the Key-Z, but I do know that we all have that ONE friend with the bundle of jingles at their hip. All I ask is that you tell them about it! Do it via Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, the phone, your blog, anywhere! There are awesome share tools right on this page to make it nice and easy for you!
story_txt:
HELLO INDIEGOGO!
I'm Jack, and I'd like to present to you the Key-Z! The next evolution of key holders.
The Key-Z is made with a non-slip, non-abrasive silicone. It is shorter than a deck of cards, as wide as a dollar bill and as thin as 3 stacked house keys. It will change your life FOREVER! 
Silicone is soft enough not to damage surrounding objects, yet durable enough to withstand extreme conditions.
It's so thin, it will practically dissappear from view when in your pocket, eliminating those pesky bulges generic keychains are notorious for.
I am a minimalist, I like it when things are simple. But for those who like to add and customize, the Key-Z can accommodate you! There's room for easy expansion like a money clip, card slot or custom usb drive.... the possibilities are seriously endless!


What I Need & What You Get
Your donations will go towards manufacturing. Then, I will approach major brands and retailers in order to help get the Key-Z into everybody's hands. I TRULY feel that the Key-Z will help declutter the world, and appreciate your help in accomplishing my goal.
$27,000 is needed for the first run, this includes packaging and shipping. I have also allocated funds for online presence and marketing.
By pledging, not only do you have the opportunity to be the first to own a Key-Z, you can also promote a business or brand like never before!
The Key-Z makes a great gift, too!
If this campaign is not 100% successful, you will be refunded by Indiegogo. You can feel comfortable knowing that your pledge is actually going towards something.
If you pledge to receive a Key-Z, you will have the option of voting on the color! The top 4 color choices will be produced.


Other Ways You Can Help


I know that not everyone needs the Key-Z, but I do know that we all have that ONE friend with the bundle of jingles at their hip. All I ask is that you tell them about it! Do it via Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, the phone, your blog, anywhere! There are awesome share tools right on this page to make it nice and easy for you!

story:
Pitot Watches Introducing the F14 inspired watch

 

With your help, we can kickstart a new watch brand, watches inspired by fighter jets. I'm Thomas, a former RDAF aircraft mechanic, served on F-16 and rescue helicopters. Later I worked civil in SAS and Monarch(UK) on Airbus, Boeing, and Gulfstream.

We offer a low price on the new F-14 watches.

VF-84 Jolly Rogers inspired

Maverick inspired Blue PVD coating

 

Brushed case

 

Blue PVD coated stainless steel 316L case and F-14 rotor

 

VF-84 Jolly Rogers inspired

 

With original Tomcat logo

 

Celebrating the 50th anniversary 21 Dec 1970 - 2020

Custom F-14 rotor

 

4 different color designs

 

Inspired by Mavericks helmet

 

 

This year is the 50th anniversary of her first F-14 Tomcat flight.
To celebrate it, FightsOn.net made a live stream event yesterday with 10 former Tomcat crew members, Pilots and RIO's and an aviation photographer specialized in Tomcat photographing.
The event can be seen on their Facebook group, for those who missed it.


Pitot watches also celebrate the 50th anniversary, and the watches will have "Anytime, Baby" engraved plus the "21 DEC 1970-2020" engraving.
Watches are limited to 300 of each model!

 

Press Coverage

 

Watch info

Included: VF-84 Jolly Rogers sketch for download in high resolution

As a former flight mechanic and with a passion for both watches and fighter jets I'm developing watches inspired by fighter jets. I always aim to capture the essence of a particular fighter jet and what makes that jet unique and transfer these key signatures to the watches.

When you work with fighter jets it much more than an engine and wings, It's a highly complicated machine developed over decades to perform outstanding maneuvers in all kinds of weather and being able to perform special tasks at the most extreme situations in the world.

Approaching a fighter jet makes your pulse rise and you have to be very careful around air intakes, exhaust, brakes, radar, flaps and aileron, hook, weapons, fuel, electronics, and a lot more. 

But when the fighter jet takes off with the most unique sounds of the turbine jet and with the smell of high octane fuel reaching your nose, you cant withstand to be impressed beyond words.

There were many fighter squadrons that flew the F-14 Tomcat, but especially the VF-84 Jolly Rogers captured my attention and I really wanted to make a cool watch to honor the F-14 Tomcat and to connect the fans and community around it with a watch.

Inspired by the VF-84 Jolly Rogers

VF-84 Jolly Rogers

Dial pattern inspired from Jolly Rogers decal

Pitot F-14 Jolly Rogers - F-14 rotor and "Anytime, Baby" engraved

 

 

History of F-14 and Jolly Rogers 

The F-14 Tomcat, made by Grumman on Long Island, with twin-engine, twin-tail, and sweeping wings served in the US NAVY, and her name was "Tomcat". The F-14 made its first deployment in 1974 aboard USS Enterprise (CVN-65).

The F-14 is one of the most famous and loved aircraft in Naval Aviation history, and many remember the movie The Final Countdown and also the Topgun movie where the F-14 has a leading role.

In May 1944, the first VF-84 squadron was formed from veterans of VF-17 (the original "Jolly Rogers"). 

VF-84 took part in WWII in Japan, at that time they flew the F4U Corsair.

VF-17 Jolly Rogers - F4U Corsair

Unfortunately, VF-84 was disestablished because of heavy losses and established again later in 1955, now flying the FJ-3 Fury.

After different airplanes like Demon and Phantom in the VF-84 fighter squadron, early in 1976 the F-14 Tomcat arrived at the squadron and flew until 1995 after that VF-103 Jolly Rogers took over the planes.

Later the F/A-18 Hornet and F/A-18 super hornet replaced the F-14 Tomcat and a lot of F-14 were sold to Iran, who still use them. There is no F-14 Tomcat in Europe at any museum, only US museums have them displayed.

VF A-103 Jolly Rogers - Flying F/A-18 Super Hornet Photo Credit: Rich Cooper/COAP

Picture from an early backer - Call sign Rock - Picture is from 1989, visiting a German Tornado II officer club in Northern Germany.

 

Color and design options 

Inspired by Top Gun and Mavericks helmet, we have made another 3 color designs to choose from based on the same case. The original F-14 Jolly Rogers comes with a glass bead blasted case, where the Maverick inspired comes with a stainless steel 316L case with a special Blue PVD treatment, similar to the Maverick blue helmet color.

The other options come with a stainless steel 316L brushed case, all have the Seiko NH35 automatic movement. The one with the Tomcat logo, has a Horween leather strap.

3 out of 4 F-14 Tomcat color/design options shown

Pitot F-14 Blue PVD - color design inspired by Top Gun​ and Mavericks helmet

Blue/Red with brushed case

F-14 with original Tomcat logo

Inspired by the key features from the F-14 Tomcat

 

Crowdfunding to build up a brand

Since our first crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo to fund the prototype developing, I have run 4 campaign total and build up a great community around the brand Pitot Watches, "Watches inspired by fighter jets".

A lot of backers have supported us, friends have emerged in the development of the watches across oceans and country borders.  There has been a lot of work and long hours at the office, and the project seemed hopeless at one point where my wife was diagnosed with cancer and we had to survive and recover together.

We have come a long way, and my mission to build 20-30 fighter jet-inspired watches started with the F-16 inspired watch in early 2018. We have now designed in total 7 different watch designs and 4 prototypes have seen the day so far.

With my passion and the feedback from all over the world, help from friends, family, and strangers, who also believe in this and our designs, I have never for one moment had any doubt that this would be a success.

We build aviator watches and we share that passion with other aviator and watch lovers, and together we build not only a community, but a company that delivers high-quality watches and the design is getting better for each new watch we develop.

With your support, we not only deliver a specially designed watch to you, but we also build up a new company that will make jobs for marketing, design, sales and webshop experts.

Best regards Thomas Clausen

 

Watch data

The NH35A is currently one of the world’s most popular automatic movements and is widely available in many affordable/microbrands.

Seiko NH35 can be also be found in watches like Invicta, Boldr, Vostok, Spinnaker, and DELTAt.

Movement Type: Automatic - Jewels: 24 - Vibrations Per Hour: 21,600 BPH - Power Reserve: 41 hours - Winding direction: Bi-directional - Hacking?: Yes - Handwindable: Yes - Functions: Hours, minutes, seconds, date calendar.

Future work

We are working on an F-16 and F/A-18 Hornet watch with swiss movement, also we are preparing a Pilot watch in cooperation with a US-based pilot who will do the flight test in the development phase in an F5 Tiger.

 

Development

First sketches being made after long research and mood board inspiration of the F14 Tomcat VF84 Jolly Rogers - We decided to move on with nr 1 from left

The big air intake inspired the cutout with black PVD steel inserts on the side of the watch to give it some depth.

2D final design before 3D start

From the 2D layout we made it into 3D in Solidworks - to have the watch in 3D with all parts, made it easy for us to show the factory what we want.​

Here the 2D lumen to the dial

Some of the inspiration

After 3D ready - we made a test 3D print in plastic to get a feel of dimensions and shape

 

NOTE: Watches will be numbered, but since we had run multiple crowdfunding campaigns on another platform to help with prototype making, the first numbered watches are already reserved.

NOTE: Iceblue will not go into production (Change to other model or get a refund)

Risks and challenges

There is always a risk when backing a project - We have been strict when choosing the factory we decided to work together with, and the prototypes have been flawless in the first attempt! We make the watches from scratch, and control all dimensions and look, by making the 3D parts ourself, so they are ready 100% for production and eliminate mistake in design. Corona could delay the project a bit - companies in China are back to work, but other companies in the shipping area could still affect the delivery time.

story:
Meet The Bat Stand


What's up with The Bat Stand?

The Bat Stand is designed for one of the most popular sport's equipment, the baseball bat. It protects your bat, provides a storage option and enhances safety in the dugouts. 

Just one of the several bat manufacturers can produce up to 6 million bats in one year. There is a need for an all in one product in the market that addresses all of the common issues and does not sacrifice convenience. 

When we designed The Bat Stand, our goals were to:

  • protect your expensive, cherished and beloved bats at all times
  • provide a convenient way to store your bats
  • enhance safety in the highly active and fast paced dugouts

Protection

Whether in use or on the go, The Bat Stand will protect your bat from damage by preventing nicks, chips and scratches that can be caused by constant contact with rough surfaces like the ground.


Storage

When bats are not in use they tend to end up in a corner with the bat head resting on the floor. The Bat Stand provides a convenient method to store your bat and great for memorabilia purposes. Display your bats with pride.


Safety

The dugout is a highly active place. With bats all over the ground, it can also be a dangerous place. The Bat Stand will keep this area clear of bats, giving coaches and players one less thing to worry about.


The Starting Lineup

These colors are available, if you cannot choose just one show your creative side! Mix and Match your Bat Stand.


A design-driven product

We believe you should not have to settle for half or part of the job, and we strongly believe you should not have to choose between protecting your bat and convenience.  The Bat Stand will protect your bat at all times! When ever your bat is not in use you can have peace of mind because we will be a great teammate and have your back. Where others fail, we offer a balance in protection and convenience.

The Bat Stand is very simple to assemble. In a matter of seconds you are set and ready to go. Just insert your bat for protection and take out when ready to use.

In just under 7 oz. The Bat Stand is the ideal weight for the player on the go. It does not get any better than that!

Let every one know you mean business. Display your bat with pride and complement it with The Bat Stand. 


Perks for our Indiegogo Supporters

Below is a visual breakdown of the perks we offer when you support our campaign. Each perk below allows you to choose your color from Red, Gray and Navy Blue. Select a perk from the top right and be a part of this great movement! 


Why We Need Your Support

We have been working diligently on The Bat Stand for the past year and have come a long way. Now your contribution is needed! Our resources have gotten us this far, and we need your support to go even further. With your contribution we can get this amazing product not only in your hands but all baseball enthusiasts.  
Your support does not only mean pledging for one of our awesome perks, but also sharing with friends. Join us in sharing #thebatstand movement!!

Where will your funds go?



Risks and Challenges 

We have finished the design, purchased the molds and tested the samples. We are ready to offer this amazing product that will protect your bat at all times and enhance safety in the dugouts so that you can focus on playing your best game ever!

story:
Real Simple Style:

The green strings in the Navy shoes above are not as floppy in real life! And, are also brighter. We were using sample strings for the shoot! Sorry for the confusion

FOR THOSE OF YOU WONDERING, you will make your color and size choices once we reach our goal. We will send you an email and you tell us what colors you want!

If we do NOT raise the money and cannot make the shoes, you get all of your money BACK. Please help us reach our goal! 

------------------------------------------------

Comfortable 'Boat' Style Shoe For Guys And Girls that gives to a cause/charity of your choice every time you buy!

Their shoe was made for the boat, ours was made to make a difference.

Humble Beginnings:

804 Industries (804industries.com) was founded by Morgan Davis and Stuart Burgh in Richmond, VA with the hopes of providing people with an awesome pair of shoes, at a great price, while helping people in the process. They loved the idea of giving back like companies such as TOMS, but they never loved the product. So, they thought “Let’s do something similar, but just different enough to fit our own tastes.” They borrowed from classic styles like the “Sperry” Boat Shoe and the TOMs classics and merged the two to present a style for those of us who never really loved either, but had to settle for one or the other in the past.  We want you to have a shoe you can wear with ANYTHING and we think we did that.

Our company gives back for every purchase you make, but not to any one cause. We know most people feel great giving back, but we also know people have an opinion as to where their money goes, so we devised a system where the BUYER gets to choose where his or her donation goes.

It’s a pretty simple concept; you pick a color and we donate to a cause.

Our second product to hit the market hopefully will be our Boulevard Shoe. 

WE NEED YOUR HELP TO RAISE ENOUGH MONEY TO MEET MINIMUM COSTS FOR OUR FIRST PRODUCTION RUN.

Like jeans for your feet!

 

We borrowed inspiration from the classic boat shoe style, but made a few minor modifications to make it a shoe of our own. We know that plenty of companies have made modifications to this classic style in the past, but no one seems to have gotten it right, until now. 

We wanted a shoe that any one could wear (guys or girls), with anything, and for any occasion. We wanted to retain a classy feel, but with a bit of a casual swag. Not so casual that you couldn't wear them out to dinner, but not so upscale that you would be worried about getting your kicks dirty at the local bar.

 

This shoe was made for the young professional, the hipster, the prepster, and everyone in between. We hope to make a shoe for everyone who doesn't exactly fit into one category...

If you have any issues viewing our moving GIF images above, please click on the "Gallery" tab above for shots of every color available!

We need $27K in order to meet our minimum production quantities, so without your donation we will not be able to produce any shoes! Please help us meet our minimums so you can get a pair of 804's!

The Specs:

Uni Sex - Perfect for Guys and Girls!

Colors - 

You have 3 great colors to choose from.

 

Canvas Exterior - 

The canvas makes the shoe extremely durable. We've been wearing sample pairs ever day for the last 6 months and we've yet to have any rips, breaks, or tears. We also have NO FRAYS. Some people like the frayed look, but personally we like the clean cut look of our shoes. The canvas holds up really well, feels great, and looks even better.

 

Low Key Sole -

This is most important aspect for us. We love the height of our soles.  We stuck with a short, low key sole, at .5 inches you don't get that "gummy" look that comes along with some similar shoes.

 

Comfort -

We added additional padding to our shoes to make them nice and comfy. We also have a striped lining on the inside of the shoe.

No Rear Laces - 

Pretty straight forward. We never loved the rear/side laces on most boat style shoes, so we got rid of them.

A Suede Upper Heel -

The upper portion of our heel has a nice patch of suede leather which adds a nice contrast to the heels of the shoe.

 

 

SIZES WE CURRENTLY HAVE AVAILABLE. WITH YOUR BACKING WE WILL BE ABLE TO PROVIDE MORE. 

 

The shoes fit smaller than most (comparable to the fit of a Nike athletic shoe), so if you are in between sizes go with the larger size. But, they are also canvas and will break in after a few wears and get bigger or mold to your feet similar to TOMS. If you're a half size, we recommend moving up rather than down! So, for example if you're normally a 10.5 go with 11 rather than 10. All the shoes are also cut the same, so if you're a girl who needs a larger size, a men's size minus 2  roughly equals a woman's size in US standards! Example: Men's 8 = Woman's 10.

Two Sets of Strings With Every Pair FOR CHARITY -

Every pair comes with the standard brown strings, but also a free colored additional pair of your choice. We have Green, Light Blue, Red, Orange, Light Gray/Silver, White, and Pink to choose from. 

Each color represents a different charity to which we donate 10-15% of profits! Please see below for more information and see our Q&A section all the way down for even more info.

The pictures below are GIFs and should be moving like a slide show. If your browser cannot load them, please click the 'Gallery' tab up top to see all the color combinations!

 

 

 Charity:

How it works? You buy a pair, we make a donation. It's that simple. 

When you buy you get the standard brown pair of shoe strings, but you ALSO get to choose a FREE PAIR of extra stings in either Bright Green, Light Blue, Orange, Red, Light Gray, White, and Pink. Each color represents a different cause, so the color you choose denotes where your money goes! 

The Colors and The Causes:

We hope that we can help as many people as possible! So, we picked several categories of causes. We may rotate them in the future, but for now the causes below are the causes that receive 10-15% of all of our profits. 

Hi Res shots of every color combo can be seen in our gallery.

Green 

For every pair purchased with Green Strings we donate funds to the International Tree Foundation. Yep, a percentage of profits go to planting trees! Why trees, well they clean the air, provide us with a food source, help add nutrients to the soil, and can even be used for some medicines!

For every 15 pairs sold, depending on site chosen, between 1 and 6 trees will be planted.

 

The International Tree Foundation works with communities in Africa to carry out sustainable community forestry projects which help to increase their income, food security and soil and water quality through growing trees. Their projects also protect and regenerate trees and forests, providing protection for the environment and atmosphere as well as habitats for rich biodiversity.

If you would like to skip over our campaign and donate directly, you may visit them directly here: http://internationaltreefoundation.org/

Blue

 

When you pick blue, you are quenching someone's thirst for clean water. We are donating 10% of profits to charity: water, which specializes in providing clean water to people all around the world. Every time you buy a pair, money goes to getting thirsty people a drink.

 

charity: water is a non-profit organization bringing clean and safe drinking water to people in developing nations.

 If you would like to skip over our campaign and donate directly, you may visit them directly here: http://www.charitywater.org/

Orange

 

 

You can't forget about the kids! Every donation made when you pick Orange Shoe Strings helps kids fight cancer!

Pick orange and we make a donation to the Rally Foundation. Rally Foundation, a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization, empowers volunteers across the country to raise awareness and funds for childhood cancer research to find better treatments with fewer long-term side effects and, ultimately, cures.

In preperation for Childhood Cancer Month, which is September (roughly when you'll receive your shoes), we will also be offering a BONUS color, YELLOW, that you will also receive whenever you choose to donate to the Rally Foundation. So, you will get not one, but TWO extra pairs of strings and you can choose to wear either color to support this great cause!

 

 

If you would like to skip over our campaign and donate directly, you may visit them directly here: http://rallyfoundation.org/rally/home

Red

 

 

If you choose RED for every pair purchased we donate to a "Health" related cause. This category ranges from curing disease to helping people cope with living with an ailment to helping the wounded. Or, it could be anything in between.

Every pair of shoelaces sold helps fund essential Davis Phinney Foundation programs.

Ten pairs of shoelaces provides one person in need with a copy of the Every Victory Counts® self-care manual. Forty pairs make it possible for someone to spend a full day hearing top Parkinson's experts, being inspired and learning to how to improve their quality of life at The Victory Summit. Just one pair of shoelaces helps pay for educational webinars, scientific research, national symposia and other vital tools that make it possible for people with Parkinson's disease to take action against their disease and to live well today.

The Foundation provides essential information, practical tools and inspiration to people living with Parkinson’s and funds research closely aligned with our mission – improving the lives of people living with Parkinson’s.

Light Gray/Silver

 

 

Proceeds go to providing musical instruments to organizations across the United States, including schools, community based nonprofits and music therapy programs.

Donations will be made to the Fender Music Foundation. If you would like to skip over our campaign and donate directly, you may visit them directly here: http://www.fendermusicfoundation.org/.

*We would like to stipulate that we are not official partners with this organization. But, we do think they are doing an amazing job with aiding ailing music programs all over the country and that's why we want to help them out as much as we can!

Pink

 

$2.50 from each shoe purchased will be donated to The Breast Cancer Research Foundation® (BCRF), dedicated to preventing breast cancer and finding a cure in our lifetime by funding clinical and translational research worldwide.

If you choose to purchase extra strings, we will make an additional donation of $2.30 to BCRF for each additional string set purchased.

If you would like to skip over our campaign and donate directly, you may visit them here: www.bcrfcure.org

 

White

 

Some causes don't stick to just one thing like health, clean water, or education. Some causes do a little bit of EVERYTHING, bringing in all the help they can to better the lives of the people with which they work in any way possible. We made up a special category for these causes, the ones that don’t really fit into any other category, known as DEVELOPEMENT.

This campaigns cause is the Local Development Catalyst Network, LDCN.

Local Development Catalyst Network

 

Local Development Catalyst Network, LDCN, is an innovative community based Non-Profit that was founded in the spring of 2011 by American Zachary Lager.  Through his academic studies and development work around the world, Zachary recognized a strong disconnect between impoverished African’s needs and the mainstream development system’s response to those needs.  

The goal of the LDCN is to offer environmentally sustainable, economically beneficial, and culturally relevant solutions to the challenges impoverished Africans face on a daily basis, thus improving the local quality of life and stimulating a continuous and positive shift in how Africans perceive and experience the world and their environment.

If you would like to skip over our campaign and donate directly, you may visit them directly here: http://www.ldcn.org/Home_Page.html.

 

Additional Perks:

The Sticker Pack:

We'll send you a random assortment of 2-5 stickers of our assorted logos! A few examples of what we have so far:

 

 

T-Shirts:

All styles come in Sm, M, L, XL

 All Ts are American Apparel

FAQs

1. How donations work

Transparency is our goal here, so we'll keep you in the loop as we go. Please note that even some of the most charitable companies out there only donate about 4% of their profits to charity. For this effort 10% of profits will be donated to your charity of choice. 

If you are concerned with any of this, please know that we have been working with most of these charities for a few months now and they have all of our cost data. Our charity partners know exactly how much we make and will receive updates as our costs decrease.  So, if this is your concern, we’re sure if you contact them directly they’ll say we’re good people. We plan on making our donations public once we make them. 

We will be making donations as soon as we receive our funds, and, later on, once the shoes are shipped, any cost savings we have will be relayed to our charities and corresponding additional donations will be made.

If you would rather just donate directly to any of these causes and don’t want shoes please visit their site directly, all of which can be found in each “cause” section of our page! 

2. When/How do I pick my colors?

Once we raise the funds we will send you an email asking for your color choices. Simply tell us your color and size choices for your shoes/shirt. You get to pick any of the three shoe colors and any lace color you want. ALL SHOES COME WITH BROWN STRINGS IN ADDITION TO YOUR COLORED STRING CHOICE, so you can choose to rock Brown or a Color.

3. When will I get my shoes?

It all depends on how soon we meet our goals. We are hoping to receive the shoes 75 days from the end of the campaign, once we do we ship them back out to you. So, if we raise the money early and we can order early, we can get them to ASAP! Sounds like a long time, but most shoe projects we've seen on Kickstarter and Indiegogo take much much longer. We will do everything in our power to keep you up to date on shipping. Remember, this is our very first production run, so bear with us!

4. Ok, so will you make donations before or after I get my shoes?

We'll make the donations as soon as we hit our funding goal. We know some of our causes really need their money to get started on some amazing work, so we will make all the donations the day the campaign ends.

5. Where the the shoes manufactured?

Everything is designed in Richmond, Va. We've been working hard to get our designs perfect for the last year.

Our shoes are assembled in Fujian, China. The facility has passed the SA8000 (Social Accountability) audit. Furthermore, our manufacturing facility has passed The Business Social Compliance Initiative (BSCI) Monitoring System audit. If you would like more information on this system please see the link, http://www.bsci-intl.org/.

6. They're canvas I know, so will they break in?

Yes they will. They do run small, so we do recommend if you wear a half size to move up rather than down. But, just like your favorite pair of jeans, the canvas is begin to break in over time, stretch, and will get more and more comfy the more you wear them. 

7. To sock or not to sock? That is the question

Your call. The canvas is a bit stiff the first one or two times you wear them. We rocked socks the first couple times, but once they got broken in we were sock free. Really all depends on your style. The canvas breathes well, so they shouldn't get too stinky. 

8. I'm not in the country. Can I still get these awesome shoes?

O yea, we got you covered. Shipping overseas can be pricey, so we included the costs in the perk boxes above. Please see the perk boxes and they'll let you know how much extra you will need to add to your pledge if you live overseas. We are not responsible for customs duties and procedures.

9. Your T-Shirts are pretty amazing too. How do they fit?

We are using American Apparel Ts. Plenty of stores sell them, so ask a local retailer and you can try one on. They fit more like an athletic fit T-Shirt rather than a "beefy" T.

10. When does the other stuff ship?

Stickers should be out within the week of the end of the fundraiser and Ts will be out within the month. 

11. Can I get extra strings if I want them?

OF COURSE. For every additional $5 you add to a shoe based donation you get another pair of strings and we'll make another donation! Strings don't cost us too much extra to produce, so for these we donate 50% of our profits from string sales rather than 10-15%. 

Also, remember you can put the strings in any shoes you wear, even if they aren't ours!

12. I'm interested in whole sale or a large purchase, can I contact you directly?

Sure, shoot us an email at 804contact@gmail.com. We'll send you the specifics. 

13. I work for a charity/cause and would love to be a part of this campaign. Can I join in?

ABSOLUTELY. Just shoot us and email and we'll work out a color and add you to the campaign. Please note that we use categories, so we would prefer causes which fit into categories we haven't used yet. Examples being education, domestic public service, or military. 

14. Who plays that awesome song in your video?

A band named Allay. Check them out on facebook. Good friends of ours and a killer band!
story_txt:
Real Simple Style:

The green strings in the Navy shoes above are not as floppy in real life! And, are also brighter. We were using sample strings for the shoot! Sorry for the confusion

FOR THOSE OF YOU WONDERING, you will make your color and size choices once we reach our goal. We will send you an email and you tell us what colors you want!
If we do NOT raise the money and cannot make the shoes, you get all of your money BACK. Please help us reach our goal! 
------------------------------------------------
Comfortable 'Boat' Style Shoe For Guys And Girls that gives to a cause/charity of your choice every time you buy!
Their shoe was made for the boat, ours was made to make a difference.
Humble Beginnings:

804 Industries (804industries.com) was founded by Morgan Davis and Stuart Burgh in Richmond, VA with the hopes of providing people with an awesome pair of shoes, at a great price, while helping people in the process. They loved the idea of giving back like companies such as TOMS, but they never loved the product. So, they thought “Let’s do something similar, but just different enough to fit our own tastes.” They borrowed from classic styles like the “Sperry” Boat Shoe and the TOMs classics and merged the two to present a style for those of us who never really loved either, but had to settle for one or the other in the past.  We want you to have a shoe you can wear with ANYTHING and we think we did that.
Our company gives back for every purchase you make, but not to any one cause. We know most people feel great giving back, but we also know people have an opinion as to where their money goes, so we devised a system where the BUYER gets to choose where his or her donation goes.
It’s a pretty simple concept; you pick a color and we donate to a cause.

Our second product to hit the market hopefully will be our Boulevard Shoe. 
WE NEED YOUR HELP TO RAISE ENOUGH MONEY TO MEET MINIMUM COSTS FOR OUR FIRST PRODUCTION RUN.
Like jeans for your feet!
 

We borrowed inspiration from the classic boat shoe style, but made a few minor modifications to make it a shoe of our own. We know that plenty of companies have made modifications to this classic style in the past, but no one seems to have gotten it right, until now. 


We wanted a shoe that any one could wear (guys or girls), with anything, and for any occasion. We wanted to retain a classy feel, but with a bit of a casual swag. Not so casual that you couldn't wear them out to dinner, but not so upscale that you would be worried about getting your kicks dirty at the local bar.

 
This shoe was made for the young professional, the hipster, the prepster, and everyone in between. We hope to make a shoe for everyone who doesn't exactly fit into one category...
If you have any issues viewing our moving GIF images above, please click on the "Gallery" tab above for shots of every color available!

We need $27K in order to meet our minimum production quantities, so without your donation we will not be able to produce any shoes! Please help us meet our minimums so you can get a pair of 804's!
The Specs:
Uni Sex - Perfect for Guys and Girls!

Colors - 
You have 3 great colors to choose from.
 

Canvas Exterior - 
The canvas makes the shoe extremely durable. We've been wearing sample pairs ever day for the last 6 months and we've yet to have any rips, breaks, or tears. We also have NO FRAYS. Some people like the frayed look, but personally we like the clean cut look of our shoes. The canvas holds up really well, feels great, and looks even better.
 
Low Key Sole -
This is most important aspect for us. We love the height of our soles.  We stuck with a short, low key sole, at .5 inches you don't get that "gummy" look that comes along with some similar shoes.
 

Comfort -
We added additional padding to our shoes to make them nice and comfy. We also have a striped lining on the inside of the shoe.

No Rear Laces - 
Pretty straight forward. We never loved the rear/side laces on most boat style shoes, so we got rid of them.

A Suede Upper Heel -
The upper portion of our heel has a nice patch of suede leather which adds a nice contrast to the heels of the shoe.
 
 
SIZES WE CURRENTLY HAVE AVAILABLE. WITH YOUR BACKING WE WILL BE ABLE TO PROVIDE MORE. 
 
The shoes fit smaller than most (comparable to the fit of a Nike athletic shoe), so if you are in between sizes go with the larger size. But, they are also canvas and will break in after a few wears and get bigger or mold to your feet similar to TOMS. If you're a half size, we recommend moving up rather than down! So, for example if you're normally a 10.5 go with 11 rather than 10. All the shoes are also cut the same, so if you're a girl who needs a larger size, a men's size minus 2  roughly equals a woman's size in US standards! Example: Men's 8 = Woman's 10.
Two Sets of Strings With Every Pair FOR CHARITY -
Every pair comes with the standard brown strings, but also a free colored additional pair of your choice. We have Green, Light Blue, Red, Orange, Light Gray/Silver, White, and Pink to choose from. 
Each color represents a different charity to which we donate 10-15% of profits! Please see below for more information and see our Q&A section all the way down for even more info.
The pictures below are GIFs and should be moving like a slide show. If your browser cannot load them, please click the 'Gallery' tab up top to see all the color combinations!



 
 

 Charity:

story:
**Important note on bag types: When you choose ANY reward, you have a choice of this Vortex Shadow OR it's smaller cousin the Vortex Shield which is half the size of the Shadow.  Click here to learn about the Kole flask.

You have loads of time to make up your mind on color and size till after the campaign ends, when you fill in your survey. 

 A new category of bag that fits on between bulky messenger bags and sling bags, handmade locally in full grain leather. slim like a shadow. Designed for your challenging urban life.

Vortex shadow is the ultimate handmade leather sling bag. Reinvented to fit all the devices you love. 

This is the only leather sling bag to fit all your devices in one place (Read on for a list of all the devices that fit in the Vortex Shadow). Vortex is slim and supremely usable with hidden pockets and features.

Forget bulky messenger bags or slings so tiny they can hardly hold your phone. The Vortex Shadow is a new category of bag, the only leather bag out there that’s slim and light enough for a day on the go, yet it still holds all the gear you’ll need for that day. 

 Vortex Shadow is completely handmade from top to bottom in full grain leather with no expense spared in fabrication.

It’s the Vortex sweet spot between portability and function. Oh, and it doesn’t have the retail markup of leather bags you find in store either.

 We use only the highest quality full-grain leather. And it’s handmade, stitch by stitch.

 

  The Vortex is made with you in mind: it is supremely tough and made to last a lifetime. If you are into your tech devices or like to wander the city streets in search of the best spots to photograph, a commuter who wants to have the best and still carry everything. This bag is for you. The Vortex Shadow takes the sling leather design to a whole new level, it is comfortable, slim, supremely usable and beautiful.

The Gadgeteer:

Load it up with your latest gadgets in search of the perfect spot for a photograph, the Vortex Shadow is for the gadgeteer who needs his tools with him at all times. The Vortex Shadow takes the sling leather design to a whole new level.

Phone. iPad. Camera. Water bottle. Books. Paintbrushes. Keys. Headphones. Multi-tool. You'll be shocked by how much your Vortex Shadow can carry comfortably. And it retains its shape with all your gear inside and remains balanced on your back.

 The Artist

Say you want to take the Vortex for a three day adventure in the city. Grab you devices, your iPad, camera, water bottles, books and paintbrushes. Grab your keys, your headphones and your multitool too. You'll be suprised how much your Vortex can carry and still be comfortable. The Vortex shadow is so well made you can grab all of this gear and the bag will still retain its shape and remain balanced on your back.

 The Vortex Shadow is our best effort to bring you what we love and what you have shared with us as the best way to have it. It's a cooperative effort in the best sense of the word. the work of years and years that have culminated in one beautiful piece, one that we ware proud of and that we are proud to present to you, our kickstarter community.

The Urban Survavalist

Vortex can do it all, for the rough and tumble daily commute pack your tools, your bike gear and everything you need for an adventure

 

 See below the pockets capabilities of the Vortex:

 The Vortex Shadow is made to carry everything you need, it is a larger version of the Vortex shield launched in 2015, the same amazing design with lots more room to take everything you need. The Vortex has multiple pockets inside to hold anything from smart phones to small cameras to pens, pocket knives and books. 

The Vortex has room for large flat devices like iPads and tablets with room for more.

See here various options for pocket use:

 

Carrying the Vortex Shadow is so easy and convenient. The weight distribution of the Vortex rests across your back and the thin profile means it's super easy to carry.

 

The larger size matters:  

The Vortex Shadow is the larger version of the Vortex Shield, launched in 2015. The same design, now with more room for take everything you need. 

We are still offering the Vortex Shield in this campaign in order to work offer folks who want a smaller version of the Shadow. Feel free to pick it up if you want an amazing piece that is half the size of the Shadow.

Our previous bag, the Vortex Shield, launched on Kickstarter in 2015 with great success. But it also launched a larger discussion about what our backers wanted and needed in a bag. The original Vortex Shield was beautiful but some felt it lacked storage space for larger devices like tablets.  

So, what did we do? We listened. And thus, the Vortex Shadow was born, the result of years of hard work and community input. Now, we’ve created a bag that holds all the stuff you need. The Vortex Shadow does it all and it’s even more beautiful than before.

One of the best things about the Vortex is it's size, grab it with you effortlessly on a long trip and stash everything you need in it or grab it for a short urban adventure. It is slim enough to go with you anywhere but large enough to carry everything you might need. It's a perfect meeting point of portability and comfort.

 

 There are easier ways to make leather bags, there are a million ways to cut corners. We just choose not to cut ANY corners and to make every bag by hand, that's just who we are. This allows us to keep our production close, make changes as needed and make sure that quality control is tight as possible. We've learned from our previous projects and maintain the highest quality of workmanship and materials in a handmade workshop. Simple. Its how we role.

 

  Introducing the Vortex Shadow, completely designed by cooperation with our crowdfunding community.- you guys.

 

  This bag is everything that YOU wanted, from the full grain leather, to the size that allows you to carry larger devices like iPads and tablets, to the ultra slim profile, it's all through communication with our community that this happened. Want to see how we did this? See here all the live session we ran with models and mockups to decide the design, materials and even the name of the bag.

 

 The process of democratizing the design alloed us to share our ideas, get feedback, go back to the drawing board and make changes on the fly with your ideas in mind. This was a fantastic experience and for us a first in creating our leather gear. All you input was a a huge part of what this bag is, from zippers, to color, to the very idea of creating a slim carry-all in full grain leather, this was all a cooperative effort. Thanks to everyone who played a part in it, yay :)

--------------------------------

 

            

 See in the GIF below, ease of use of the zippers, fast reach pockets, upper compartment and lower compartment access. Super easy to grab your gear and go.

 

  Think of the Vortex Shadow as the best bag you will ever own, because it will be: Simple, perfectly sized, made of the best materials and doesn't include the retail markup of leather bags this size. It is perfect.

  Why we made the Vortex Shadow and how it's different from the Vortex Shield

Think of the Vortex Shield as a niche product, one that allows you to carry just what you need but not everything you want. Now consider that Vortex Shadow, it's a full-sized sling that can carry twice as much as the original Vortex but still remain slim and classy. There two bags complete each other. The larger Vortex Shadow was created from the original Vortex project from 2015 and with all that we have learned and all of your feedback we created the next level, the Vortex Shadow. See on the top of the page all of the sessions we ran here on Kickstarter to learn from our backers and create the bag you see here now. Available in Black and in Tan.

LEFT-HANDED BAG LOVERS, DON’T DESPAIR

We got you covered, once we have more than 10 people who ask for a left-handed version it will be offered as an official option. In order to make this happen, just pick up one Vortex shadow and put in the comments that you want the lefty version. Our guess is that we will have a ton of orders so once we cross the 10 pieces we will have a lefty product run.  

 

 

 The Vortex Shadow is a new category of bag:  

The vortex isn't a messenger bag but it also isn't your classic sling. This bag takes cues from both of these categories and fuses them together to make a perfect shape in handcrafted full grain leather. We call this category the Vortex Sweet-spot, it allows you to use this bag in just about all your urban adventures, you can choose your devices, your gear, and your accessories and the Vortex will take them all and remain supremely comfortable and even elegant.

 The cool thing about the Vortex Shadow is that it's supremely well made, super tough, made of the best full grain leather and is still a perfect daily use bag. It can be used daily and will only age well with use. The tan bag will get a tough scruffy look with age and the black leather will gain in texture and a handsome fade.

 A note on shipping:

We ship worldwide, everywhere no exceptions and the rates are assigned near every reward.We ship directly to your door with an amazing shipping team that is top notch and proven. You will receive tracking codes and express deliveries wherever you are  

Read this if you are outside the U.S.  

Most packages sail through customs without any duty, but some are selected by chance and the recipient gets hit with a duty fee. We have a dedicated team to work through customs issues in most countries and sweat the details on this but since we can't account for every customs agent, if you live in a place that is known for customs issues, we can't vouch for every possibility an extra charge.If you are an international sponsor and receive a tracking number when we ship, track your package daily to make sure it doesn’t get hung up in the system and returned to us.  

We make every effort to get that bag through customs and directly to you!

 

 

     

Music: www.bensound.com

**Important note on bag types: When you choose ANY reward, you have a choice of this Vortex Shadow OR it's smaller cousin the Vortex Shield which is half the size of the Shadow.  Click here to learn about the Kole flask.
You have loads of time to make up your mind on color and size till after the campaign ends, when you fill in your survey. 





 A new category of bag that fits on between bulky messenger bags and sling bags, handmade locally in full grain leather. slim like a shadow. Designed for your challenging urban life.





Vortex shadow is the ultimate handmade leather sling bag. Reinvented to fit all the devices you love. 
This is the only leather sling bag to fit all your devices in one place (Read on for a list of all the devices that fit in the Vortex Shadow). Vortex is slim and supremely usable with hidden pockets and features.





Forget bulky messenger bags or slings so tiny they can hardly hold your phone. The Vortex Shadow is a new category of bag, the only leather bag out there that’s slim and light enough for a day on the go, yet it still holds all the gear you’ll need for that day. 





 Vortex Shadow is completely handmade from top to bottom in full grain leather with no expense spared in fabrication.
It’s the Vortex sweet spot between portability and function. Oh, and it doesn’t have the retail markup of leather bags you find in store either.





 We use only the highest quality full-grain leather. And it’s handmade, stitch by stitch.



Multiple pockets with LOADS of space


 





  The Vortex is made with you in mind: it is supremely tough and made to last a lifetime. If you are into your tech devices or like to wander the city streets in search of the best spots to photograph, a commuter who wants to have the best and still carry everything. This bag is for you. The Vortex Shadow takes the sling leather design to a whole new level, it is comfortable, slim, supremely usable and beautiful.
The Gadgeteer:
Load it up with your latest gadgets in search of the perfect spot for a photograph, the Vortex Shadow is for the gadgeteer who needs his tools with him at all times. The Vortex Shadow takes the sling leather design to a whole new level.
Phone. iPad. Camera. Water bottle. Books. Paintbrushes. Keys. Headphones. Multi-tool. You'll be shocked by how much your Vortex Shadow can carry comfortably. And it retains its shape with all your gear inside and remains balanced on your back.



Perfect for the gadget minded


 The Artist
Say you want to take the Vortex for a three day adventure in the city. Grab you devices, your iPad, camera, water bottles, books and paintbrushes. Grab your keys, your headphones and your multitool too. You'll be suprised how much your Vortex can carry and still be comfortable. The Vortex shadow is so well made you can grab all of this gear and the bag will still retain its shape and remain balanced on your back.





 The Vortex Shadow is our best effort to bring you what we love and what you have shared with us as the best way to have it. It's a cooperative effort in the best sense of the word. the work of years and years that have culminated in one beautiful piece, one that we ware proud of and that we are proud to present to you, our kickstarter community.
The Urban Survavalist
Vortex can do it all, for the rough and tumble daily commute pack your tools, your bike gear and everything you need for an adventure





 





 See below the pockets capabilities of the Vortex:





 The Vortex Shadow is made to carry everything you need, it is a larger version of the Vortex shield launched in 2015, the same amazing design with lots more room to take everything you need. The Vortex has multiple pockets inside to hold anything from smart phones to small cameras to pens, pocket knives and books. 





The Vortex has room for large flat devices like iPads and tablets with room for more.
See here various options for pocket use:





 





Carrying the Vortex Shadow is so easy and convenient. The weight distribution of the Vortex rests across your back and the thin profile means it's super easy to carry.

story:
The World's First of its Kind Smart Hat

Kaptur is… Whatever you want it to be.

We wanted to capture, (see what we did there), the way we communicate in the internet era and create a hat that was as customizable as the background on your phone.

So what can you do with Kaptur?

  • Show off fire memes!
  • Support your favorite sports team  (and when they lose, support your next favorite sports team)
  • Have an awesome clip of your favorite band? Loop it! 
  • Want to let people know you’re deep in thought? There’s a GIF for that.  

We know you'll think of hundreds of different and creative ways you'll want to express yourself.

 

The Kaptur App

Speaking of the Kaptur App, what good is a hat with a screen if you can’t upload content to it? The app is the perfect companion to Kaptur, with all the features you need to upload, organize, and share your content.

Using the Kaptur App, create a playlist of media and share it with other Kaptur users!

With the app, you can create your own image library and tag it with keywords, or sort them by category.  You’ll be able to discover other users to share content with and follow creators that you love! It will all be part of the shared experience that is Kaptur, plus we’ll be adding more features as we go through the campaign!

 

The story behind Kaptur

Kaptur is the first product from One61 Studio, an innovation division of Bioworld Merchandising, the industry leading creator of licensed apparel and accessories for leading entertainment brands. We’ve taken the proven expertise in design and collaborated with wearables innovator and app developer, Say Wearables to conceive, develop and manufacture this revolutionary piece of headwear.

 

With your help, we will take our working prototype, bring it into full production, and begin shipping to our backers by AUGUST, 2018.  Be one of the first to own a truly unique concept in next-generation headwear!

 

What we need and what you get

We're seeking $27,000 in funding to complete all technical aspects of the hat prototype including enhanced 3D printing, additional mobile app development, and product packaging.

Our Early Bird backers will get a first edition Kaptur at 40% off the MSRP.  You'll also have a chance to create and share your own animations, and videos with other backers!  Be a Star!

 

Other ways you can help

We're also on twitter, Facebook and Instagram.  Help us spread the word and be a part of our #KapturMe Content Contest launching soon!  You'll be able to tag your own content creation and get a chance to be showcased on our page and social media!

 

Kaptur Smart Hat Tech Specifications:

  • Screen: LCD
  • Bluetooth enabled
  • Motion graphics at 5 FPS
  • 1.8 in 240X240 TFT full color LCD display
  • Curved lens to enhance and protect display
  • Rechargeable battery
  • 6-hour battery life
  • Magnetic quick-connect to USB charging cable
  • Sleek molded frame
  • Includes smartphone app
  • Supports animated gifs
  • Patent pending
  • CE, IC, FCC, BLE certifications
  • Full social sharing app
     

Flat Visor Kaptur Smart Hat Design Specifications:

  • 6-panel design
  • Flat Visor
  • Structured Crown
  • Low Profile
  • Adjustable Snapback
  • Comfort Sweatband
  • Cotton/Poly/Nylon
  • OSFM

Strapback Kaptur Smart Hat Design Specifications:

Precurved Strapback:

  • 5- panel design
  • Curved Visor
  • Structured Crown
  • Adjustable Strap
  • Stealth metal closure
  • Comfort sweatband
  • 35% Cotton / 65% Poly light weight material
  • OSFM


Recent News

Bioworld Merchandising to Launch One61 Studio IoT Division at CES
(Dallas Innovates, December 30, 2018)

The GIF Hat Was Inevitable 
(Urban Daddy Gear, February 2018)

story:
Sustainability is balance.

 

We design out of love for elegance and produce with high regards to the people, animals, and nature. Our priority is the love for family and the idea of passing on to generations. We can help the nomad families, by dressing you and your baby with the softest, purest cashmere, while having a clear conscience, since our wool comes from a fair and animal rights appropriate production chain.

The fashion label Verena von Eschenbach stands for ethical luxurious fashion for the whole family, which can also be passed on to the next generation. The label gets its cashmere, yak and camel wool directly from outer Mongolia, from nomads who have become our friends. The quality of our wool is 100 percent pure and untreated and free of harmful substances.

We personally ensure that the animals are kept in a species-appropriate manner, that production is resource-efficient, ethically correct and that workers' wages are fair. In addition, we would like to help the nomads to continue their craft and culture in the future.

We cordially invite you to support this project, in order to make upmarketed luxury fashion more sustainable: Invest in timeless, long-lasting signature pieces that simply make you feel amazing - by wearing the softest fabric,  by supporting our nature, and therefore letting your soul be happy!

 

 

 

Animals and people in harmony and balance with our  nature and traditions

 

Goats, camels and yaks, from which the wool hair is obtained, come from species-appropriate farmlands in independent Mongolia: they live freely among their herds and find sufficient food in the hilly landscape without overgrazing the land. The animal’s  hair is combed out once in the spring time, after the animal naturally loses its fleece. Manufacturers, Mongolian knitting mills and Nepalese weaving mills take over the supply chain process. All products are manufactured exclusively according to traditional craftsmanship.

 

 

Our three
biggest benefits

 

A cultural asset that must be protected.

 

In textile processing countries there are disastrous environmental conditions and unfair working conditions. Not with our cooperatives! We want to protect the traditional manufactories in Mongolia and Nepal and preserve the ancient knowledge of nomadic cultures and their habitat. The herd owners are Mongolian nomads who are paid directly in the respective community. We know them personally and visit them and their herds regularly on site. We talk to the workers in the craft businesses and we personally know their families. Together, we have developed a fair cooperation plan that guarantees that they can maintain their tradition and culture for the next generation.

 

 

Timeline

 

 

 

Stretch goals

 

Size charts
for all products

story:
A while back I made a small run of about 40 of these T-Shirts (it was all I could afford at the time). I gave several away and sold some as well. I never could have imagined the reaction that they would get. People loved it and it seemed to spread like wild fire over social media. So, here I am today with a simple wish to be able to mass (or semi-mass) produce my U.S. Guns design T-Shirt and hoodie with the second amendment on the back and help to spread knowledge of probably the most important amendment to our constitution. 

Paypal isnt offering a comment box during payment for some reason. you can message me at facebook.com/bamnson or email shaunpmatthews@gmail.com with your preferred size and color options when you pledge. thank you!

I'm only trying to raise $600 to fund all of this. So everything helps and if my goal isn't reached indiegogo refunds all contributions to the donor. Along with your contribution please include a note with your size and color preference if applicable.


It's a pretty simple goal. So, if you'd like to support me and proudly wear your constitutional right please be my guest to pledge for one of the rewards I've set up. When pledging please include color and/or size option. Thank you,

Shaun 


P.S. If you aren't in a position to pledge you can still help by sharing my campaign with friends!

story:
"Swiss Design - Global Approach."

As a Startup Company 

we are trying to develop meaningful Designs with a specific Global Approach;

located in Zürich Switzerland, we are able to collect the best resources and information from all around the Globe

 

 

THE HELMET STRETCH

"We love Bicycles" and of course we love "all Riders!"

The Bicycle gets more important and practical every Day.

And we care about increasing the Security and Comfort for all Bikers:

 

...in the beginning, we were thinking REFLECTIVE BIKE HELMET ...

 

But since each Rider will want to choose

which kind of Helmet fits best to his needs and his Style and Size:

We developed the Idea, of a 360° Reflecting Helmet-Cover,

that will "FIT TO ALL SHAPES AND SIZES."

 

"Now, we found the plausible Global Approach – that is the Goal of all our Efforts!"

 

FITS ALL SHAPES (Foto Sample BLACK MATT)

 

We care to build only something that will last – Durability and Quality, is essential:

We produce High-Quality only

We care about ecological Processes, and efficient Planning, that's why we appreciate the "Swissness" in our Team,

and that's why we check all facts before any Production.

 'To measure twice, and drill once'  is our Credo.

 

Support our Visions - if you like our Innovation, and our Intention:

To gain more Security and Style.... globally.

story:
Making our mark

For our first release we wanted something that would last, something that would make a statement, something that would make people ask! 

We decided our first release should be a timepiece. 

I've always been in love with the chronograph, the mechanics of how they work amaze me, so it was quickly decided that the watch would be a chronograph.

 The design

At Finn Harper we inspired by vintage design and we want to incorporate this with modern mechanics plus a little hint of minimalism. 

We did our research and found that most modern chronograph watches all looked the same, in fact the only thing that changed was the price depending on the brand. 

We wanted to offer something unique, we wanted a classically designed chronograph with the feel of a vintage timepiece. 

This chronograph was inspired by classic motor sport. With a classic design we went with a classic colour, British Racing Green (BRG)

We added a brown leather strap and created a vintage masterpiece!

Building the watch

The design was ready, but we needed to decide on materials.

We abide by our statement of offering high end products using high end materials but without the high end price tag, so we have used the best materials on offer to us for our debut release.

  • The case - 316L stainless steel, a tough and durable alloy that is extremely scratch resistant.
  • The strap - Genuine leather, because fake leather just isn't the same
  • The glass - Sapphire crystal, a highly scratch resistant glass
  • The movement - A Miyota OS10 Japanese movement which is highly accurate

The design was ready, the materials agreed, we just had to wait for the sample.

The sample

After everything was agreed and relevant payments made the sample was to be produced.

We could not wait for the sample to arrive, working with a manufacturer with over 30 years experience we knew the watch would be of the highest quality. 

We were updated every couple of days of it's progress until a delivery date was confirmed.

We received the package and were completely astounded with the look and feel of the watch, to some it up in one word AWESOME!

Every box was ticked

  • Stainless steel case - yes
  • Sapphire crystal glass - yes
  • Leather strap - yes
  • Name on clasp - yes
  • Initial on crown - yes
  • Case back engraving - yes
  • Working sub dials - yes
  • British Racing Green dial - yes

Everything about the watch is prefect, every image on this campaign is that of the sample we received.

I have worn it everyday and can confirm it is definitely a head turner.

Finn Harper needs you!

To bring this watch to market we need to meet our manufacturer's minimum order quantity (MOQ) which is 500 units.

This is where the fantastic people of Kickstarter come in. You will play a vital role in the development of this amazing chronograph watch, not only will you be claiming a high quality watch but your are helping our brand grow as a business.

Wether you pledge or not it would also be a massive help if you could help us grow by liking us on Facebook and following us on Twitter and maybe occasionally sharing our pages and updates, we will forever be grateful for your help. 

Website coming soon.

Thank you for your support
