story:
Summary

I'm a blogger at Glitter, Guts & Glory, though not actually a beauty blogger or fashion blogger, I like to call myself an "eclectic eccentric" which really just means random and nuts. However I do enjoy a good fashion or beauty blog and I follow an awful lot of you on different platforms. I'm planning a small t-shirt line in the next few months (another crowd funding campaign to watch for!) and so the two came together in my head with the thought that a simple "#bbloggers" or "#fbloggers" t-shirt would be so much fun! It's not much like the others I have planned and I don't want this design to rely on the others getting funded, so I'm just doing it separately. This makes it much more likely to happen! 

I don't intend to buy many extras or keep selling them after this campaign so this may be your only chance to get a high quality, ethically sourced #bbloggers or #fbloggers tee. This is not your average crap quality tee here. 

Its a great looking design that you can get in either white, leaf green or raspberry as shown below. The printing will be in a lovely shade of deep purple.

I know it looks like a lofty goal but there are enough of you to reach 100 orders relatively easily. It should be easy to make this a reality! We can do this!

What We Need & What You Get

  • I need £1800 for 100 ethically sourced tee shirts, the (local) printing, packing, shipping, Indiegogo and Paypal fees, VAT, etc.
  •  £18.00 each, includes shipping to mainland UK. That's it. Nothing complex here. You can get both shirts and save a couple quid too.
  • If you need delivery outside the UK, I will contact you for an extra delivery charge of £10 after the campaign is over. 
  • You choose which colour you want: white, raspberry pink or leaf green t-shirts.
  • If I don't reach the goal, the project will not be funded and I will not be able to get these tee's printed so hurry, get yours now and then please share it with other bloggers so they can too!

The Impact

You get your own gorgeous, high quality #bbloggers and/or #fbloggers tee shirt! Also, I made sure that they are ethically sourced and printed here in the UK so your conscience (and mine) is happy too.

Afterwards, you can all send me pics and I'll create a big collage of everyone in their tee shirts!

Also if you haven't already, have a look at my blog Glitter, Guts & Glory too because I detail a giveaway I will be running if the campaign is successful!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just aren't beauty or fashion bloggers, nor do they know any and don't really get what #bbloggers even means (a hashtag for beauty bloggers on twitter), never mind why you would want it on a shirt. That's OK, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Visit and like me on Facebook and share the campaign, especially on Twitter.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools, especially on Twitter!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Important Notes:  We will collect your information and images you want to use on the personalized mouthguards at the end of the campaign. 

Contributing now will ensure you get your guard during the initial production run.

Click on a Perk in the right column to order it.  Otherwise, Click on "Contribute" to donate to the cause.

If you want a fully rendered preview of your guard, email teamcaptain@megalodonsports.com.

 

Introduction

Megalodon Sports is introducing you to a revolutionary new way to represent your team on the field. We will emblazon your team's logo, name, or slogan on one of our mouthguards. 

We also know that teams are made up of individuals.  For those who wish to showcase a bit of their personality (with your coach's permission of course), we can add any graphic you'd like to the lip guard.  Want to say "Hi Mom" every time you score?  Done.  Or maybe you just want your name and number printed on the lip guard?  Done.  Whatever you'd like to promote your team or any unique design you'd like to showcase this season, let us transform a boring piece of protective equipment into your own branded billboard.

    

Mouthguard Features

 

We went through an exhaustive 6 month long design cycle to ensure we put together a great product.  We used 3D CAD to make model after model and vetted each variant using 3D Printing and Rapid Prototyping.  Finally, after 6 previous iterations, the mouthguard is production ready. The production mouthguards will sport the following features.

  • Material: Made by injection molding with FDA-approved Ethylene Vinyl Acetate (EVA). 
  • Protection:The lip guard adds an extra layer of strength outside of the players mouth that helps prevent damage to the lips and teeth as well as keeps dirt and grime from entering mouth.   
  • Personalization: Logos will be added with a patent pending process that will seal the logos with a protective layer of transparent plastic so they won't rub off during the grind of practices and games.
  • Optional Lanyard: We will include the option of adding a lanyard to the mouthguard.  This will allow players to securely fasten the guard to their facemasks.

Click Here to View a Vine of Us 3D Modeling the Mouthguard

Why We Need Help

We need funding to get the manufacturing process started for the mouthguards.  The funding will be used to create molds for the injection molding and also buy the necessary equipment used in the personalizing process.  If we hit our goal, we will be able to order our first run of mouthguards immediately from the injection molder.

Perks Explained

 

3D Printed Mouthguard - This is a full scale model of our mouthguard that will be printed just for you. It will be made from ABS plastic.

Megalodon Sports T-Shirt - Pretty self explanatory.  We'll ask you for your size and send you an awesome looking Megalodon Sports T-shirt.

 

Non-Personalized Mouthguard - If you just need a new mouthguard with lip protector, this is the option for you.  It will sport all of the features listed above except it won't be personalized with your logo.

White Standard Logo Mouthguard - The next step up from the Non-Personalized Mouthguard.  You get to choose which of our standard designs will be added to the lip protector. 

Personalized White Mouthguard - We will add anything you want to the lip protector of our mouthguard.  Names, numbers, logos, images are all fair game.

Alien Feet Socks - These socks are included in some of our packages.  Alien Feet socks have pads on the soles that prevent them from slipping around in your shoes or cleats.  

Meet the Megalodon Sports Team

Korey Gross is the co-founder, President and CEO of Megalodon Sports LLC, a sporting goods manufacturer based out of Alexandria, VA. If Korey were not an engineer he claims he would be a professional gamer, however, his record in FIFA13 would not support that claim.

From a southern suburb of Washington DC,  he earned a full academic scholarship to attend Pittsburgh University's School of Engineering. While completing his undergraduate degree work in Mechanical Engineering, he was also a member of the track and field team where he garnered All Big-East honors for the 4x100m relay in 2005. He then completed a graduate program at Pitt, earning a Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering in 2008.  Since leaving school, he has worked his way up to a project management position with a DC engineering firm.

Korey and his wife, Jen, were married in August of 2011 and just recently added a little baby girl named Mila to their family.

 

Bobby Seigle is the co-founder, Vice President and COO of Megalodon Sports LLC.  Bobby has an entrepreneurial spirit and is still devastated he was not named CEO of Megalodon.

He had the fortunate pleasure of growing up with Korey in suburban DC, and he received a scholarship to play basketball at Belmont Abbey College in Mount Holly, NC. He finished his school at the University of South Carolina and went on to get a Master of Business Administration from the Rawls School of Business at Texas Tech University in 2007.

He left his graduate program to become a basketball coach but decided to jump to the business world several years ago and put his MBA to work. Bobby and his wife, Sarah, just celebrated their tenth wedding anniversary in May of 2013 and have three kids, Trey, Elizabeth and Sophie. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Be sure to visit our website at http://www.megalodonsports.com.  Let us know you're circling our boat by joining our newsletter.  Also, feel free to follow Korey and Bobby on twitter @koreygross and @meandmyfro respectively.

He left his graduate program to become a basketball coach but decided to jump to the business world several years ago and put his MBA to work. Bobby and his wife, Sarah, just celebrated their tenth wedding anniversary in May of 2013 and have three kids, Trey, Elizabeth and Sophie. 

Other Ways You Can Help

story:
Most people love the way their iPhone looks and they don’t want to cover up its style and modern appeal. Many cases today that offer enough storage room use the front cover part or a large bulky back to offer storage. With the iPhone 5’s large design, we can design an accordion style back to the case that gives you the style, organization, and storage you need.

This case looks from the front like a standard protective case. However, the back features a sealable pocket with accordion style sections. Each case features 2-3 accordion style sections. Each section can be used for things like: Credit cards, coins, sandisk, keys, business cards, cash, etc. Also, the great thing is it’s not exposed for the world to see; you can seal it up with a small zipper. This also protects your personal items from falling out.

Most cases will ship Nov. 5th, 2012.

story:
Producing beard oils is more involved than just mixing items in a cup and calling it good.   Good quality lab products, glass beakers, flasks, graduated cylinders and pipettes,  are needed for measuring the correct amounts so that products have a consistency between batches.    The products I use are not cheap.   I use only 100% natural oils and the oils that I use for my blend, like Jojoba and Argan which make up the lion's share of the base, are not cheap.   I don't use any artificial scents or fragrance oils that irritate the skin or damage facial hair.   All the scents come from high quality essential oils.    The bottles and shipping materials are also quality.   No one wants a product in a container that doesn't work or to receive a product that is damaged due to cheap boxes.    And since I sell products that are used on the face, making sure everything starts clean with a professional disinfectant is important.    

All of this costs a great deal of money.    The funds I am seeking will be used to purchase even better equipment than I have now that will allow me to produce products faster and even better than the equipment I am using now.

Beard Oil Ingredients:  Jojoba Oil, Argan Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Castor Oil, Avocado Oil, Vitamin E Oil and Essential Oils

Shave Oil Ingredients:  Castor Oil, Virgin Olive Oil, Vitamin E Oil and Essential Oils

story:
Summary

Who is Airgetlám Industries?

Airgetlám Industries is a prosthetics company built for prosthetics users by prosthetics users. The president, Solomon Stone Romney, is the first client; he was born without fingers on his left hand. Advocacy is at the core of everything the company does. Airgetlám Industries’ designs focus on the user, their needs and feelings, rather than on the technology or the way society views them. Every effort is made to anticipate the needs of the client and to adapt rapidly to them. The decision to use a prosthetic, either to replace something lost or to augment something that was never had, is a difficult one; a decision this company is intimately familiar with. Airgetlám Industries seeks to make that process as comforting as possible through simple pricing and purchasing (direct to the client), individual attention, and support throughout the life of their device.

Through a combination of historical inspiration and modern innovation, Airgetlám Industries seeks to provide a prosthetics unlike any other currently on the market. Using a system of ratchets, springs, and cables, capacitive materials, and cutting edge manufacturing techniques, Airgetlám Industries will provide a hand with full articulation, fully functional use of a touch screen, and almost zero maintenance at a price comparable to the most basic hook systems available. For years prosthetics users have been asking for, and not receiving, these features.

What does Airgetlám mean?

Pronounced just as it's spelled (the emphasis on the last syllable). In Irish mythology, Nuada was the first king of the Tuatha De Danann so chosen for his physical perfection. During the conquest of the Firbolgs, another mythic Irish race, Nuada lost his arm during the Battle of Moytirra; being now imperfect, he was forced to abdicate his throne. The great Danann healer Dian Cecht and the smith Creidhne were able to craft Nuada an arm of silver to replace his missing limb. This silver limb was so lifelike that it both allowed Nuada to reclaim his throne and earned him the moniker “Airgetlám,” which means “silver hand.” Airgetlám Industries seeks to recreate the marvel of Dian Cecht and Creidhne by bringing people closer to perfection through the use of artificial, metal limbs.

What is the project?

Sometime between 1508 and 1512 an anonymous German smith created a wondrous mechanical prosthetic arm for the knight Gotz von Berlichingen who had lost his arm during a siege (a cannonball struck his sword blowing it backwards and cutting off his arm). Using an anvil this smith was able to create a sophisticated hand almost a century before anyone else could make anything comparable. The hand was so well constructed that it served Berlichingen for almost 40 years of continuous military campaigning, survived five centuries, and is currently on display in Jagsthausen Castle in Germany.

Airgetlám Industries believes that with current 3D printing technology and space age materials that we should not only be able to match this achievement but surpass it. 40 Years of hard service? 500 year shelf life? Challenge accepted.

Airgetlám Industries is seeking funds to help complete the design and construction of its first prosthetic hand prototype based upon the original Berlichingen hand. With the successful completion of this project, Airgetlám Industries can move onto field testing the device, securing major investors, and mass producing the hand.

Without this project being completed Airgetlám Industries will be delayed significantly in their ability to bring this innovative product and approach to the people who need it. 

Our Need & Your Reward

  • Currently we have a prototype production proposal for $11,400. Of that amount we can cover roughly half of it from personal finances. Funding will be used to cover primarily the remaining costs of the prototype production, patent applications, and associated legal fees. If any funds remain after the primary needs are fulfilled it will be used to support efforts at securing large scale investments and entering full production (i.e. research and travel costs).
  •  Social responsibility, historical research, and innovative manufacturing practices are some of the core values at Airgetlám Industries. The perks reflect those values by sharing with you our research and culture of giving.

A Statement from the President

We are not just producing prosthetics; we are creating a community.

We are not selling consumer electronics. We are not even really selling prosthetics. We are creating a community, selling a lifestyle. The prosthetics exist in service to that. We are selling a worldview where newscasters, politicians, entertainers, any public figure, any person can openly be disabled or wear a prosthetic. We have adapted and hidden who we will really are for long enough. The mechanical aesthetic of the design, the League of Tyr, the direct to consumer approach are all intended to advocate for the user.

Our intent is not simply to level the playing field for amputees but to provide them with the tools and support to excel. Amputees already work tirelessly to survive in a world where they are at a disadvantage. With better tools they can shift from surviving to thriving. We do not mourn for what was lost or never had. We rejoice in what remains, we seek to live not in spite of it but better because of it. Every prosthetic that we sell is a celebration of challenges to conquer, some of them for the first time ever.

I was very active athletically as a child. I swam, I skied, and I rode my bicycle. I learned to do those activities in that order because I could not hold a ski pole or the handlebars of a bicycle. I went through a lengthy process to develop a prosthetic specifically for swimming. It took weeks of modeling and doctor visits that ultimately came to nothing partly because the rules of swimming would not allow me to use it competitively and partly because of the high cost. My ski pole was modified so that it strapped to my wrist which was useful for planting vertically but not for dragging. It was exhausting, and sometimes painful, to use. One of the brake levers on my bicycle handlebars was reversed which allowed me to wedge my hand and steer though no longer brake on that side.

There was talk of removing tissue from the palm of my hand to give me greater grabbing ability. Ultimately, I had no surgery. These modifications were all sufficient but they each came with a sacrifice. As time went on I gave up most of those activities but not the desire to remain active. Experimental hand transplant surgery has provided an awful temptation over the years. That always felt, however, like a fundamental denial of who I am. The necessity of two fully functional hands even appeared in the theatre when I studied stage-fighting with a rapier and dagger. The need has never gone away, nor has the longing.

Shopping directly for prosthetics as an adult has proven daunting and at times discouraging. The Hosmer catalogue has page after page of frightening looking devices without any prices listed and ends with a multi-page credit application. How is that supposed to be welcoming to a person struggling to make ends meet, struggling with a difficult lifestyle choice? How can that be anything but off putting? I felt there had to be a better product and a better way.

Airgetlám Industries is that better way. I am Airgetlám Industries’ first customer. I do not want anyone else to have to struggle with this the way I have. This company is designed from the inside out to be welcoming and supportive: sophisticated design, simple pricing, and a community of advocacy. Customers buy a lifetime entry to an exclusive fellowship; the prosthetic is simply their badge of membership.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We understand that times are tight and that you may not be able to give right now. Odds are, though, that you know someone who can. Spreading the word can be the biggest help you can give us. Please use Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Reddit, LinkedIn, and any other social media at your disposal to get the word out. Indiegogo makes it easy with their share tools!

Thank you for your help!
story_txt:
SummaryWho is Airgetlám Industries?
Airgetlám
Industries is a prosthetics company built for prosthetics users by prosthetics
users. The president, Solomon Stone Romney, is the first client; he was born
without fingers on his left hand. Advocacy is at the core of everything the
company does. Airgetlám Industries’ designs focus on the user, their needs and
feelings, rather than on the technology or the way society views them. Every
effort is made to anticipate the needs of the client and to adapt rapidly to
them. The decision to use a prosthetic, either to replace something lost or to
augment something that was never had, is a difficult one; a decision this
company is intimately familiar with. Airgetlám Industries seeks to make that
process as comforting as possible through simple pricing and purchasing (direct
to the client), individual attention, and support throughout the life of their
device.
Through a combination of historical inspiration and modern innovation,
Airgetlám Industries seeks to provide a prosthetics unlike any other currently
on the market. Using a system of ratchets, springs, and cables, capacitive
materials, and cutting edge manufacturing techniques, Airgetlám Industries will
provide a hand with full articulation, fully functional use of a touch screen,
and almost zero maintenance at a price comparable to the most basic hook
systems available. For years prosthetics users have been asking for, and not
receiving, these features.
What does Airgetlám mean?Pronounced just as it's spelled (the emphasis on the last syllable). In Irish mythology, Nuada was the first king of the Tuatha De Danann so chosen for his physical perfection. During the conquest of the Firbolgs, another mythic Irish race, Nuada lost his arm during the Battle of Moytirra; being now imperfect, he was forced to abdicate his throne. The great Danann healer Dian Cecht and the smith Creidhne were able to craft Nuada an arm of silver to replace his missing limb. This silver limb was so lifelike that it both allowed Nuada to reclaim his throne and earned him the moniker “Airgetlám,” which means “silver hand.” Airgetlám Industries seeks to recreate the marvel of Dian Cecht and Creidhne by bringing people closer to perfection through the use of artificial, metal limbs.What is the project?
Sometime between 1508 and 1512 an anonymous German smith created a wondrous mechanical prosthetic arm for the knight Gotz von Berlichingen who had lost his arm during a siege (a cannonball struck his sword blowing it backwards and cutting off his arm). Using an anvil this smith was able to create a sophisticated hand almost a century before anyone else could make anything comparable. The hand was so well constructed that it served Berlichingen for almost 40 years of continuous military campaigning, survived five centuries, and is currently on display in Jagsthausen Castle in Germany.Airgetlám Industries believes that with current 3D printing technology and space age materials that we should not only be able to match this achievement but surpass it. 40 Years of hard service? 500 year shelf life? Challenge accepted.Airgetlám Industries is seeking
funds to help complete the design and construction of its first prosthetic hand
prototype based upon the original Berlichingen hand. With the successful completion of this project, Airgetlám Industries
can move onto field testing the device, securing major investors, and mass producing the hand. 
Without this project being completed Airgetlám Industries
will be delayed significantly in their ability to bring this innovative product and approach to the people who need it. Our Need & Your Reward
Currently we have a prototype production proposal for
     $11,400. Of that amount we can cover roughly half of it from personal finances.
     Funding will be used to cover primarily the remaining costs of the prototype
     production, patent applications, and associated legal fees. If any funds
     remain after the primary needs are fulfilled it will be used to support
     efforts at securing large scale investments and entering full production (i.e.
     research and travel costs).
 Social
     responsibility, historical research, and innovative manufacturing practices
     are some of the core values at Airgetlám Industries. The perks reflect those
     values by sharing with you our research and culture of giving.
A Statement from the PresidentWe are not
just producing prosthetics; we are creating a community.
We
are not selling consumer electronics. We are not even really selling
prosthetics. We are creating a community, selling a lifestyle. The prosthetics
exist in service to that. We are selling a worldview where newscasters,
politicians, entertainers, any public figure, any person can openly be disabled
or wear a prosthetic. We have adapted and hidden who we will really are for
long enough. The mechanical aesthetic of the design, the League of Tyr, the
direct to consumer approach are all intended to advocate for the user. 
Our
intent is not simply to level the playing field for amputees but to provide
them with the tools and support to excel.
Amputees already work tirelessly to survive in a world where they are at a
disadvantage. With better tools they can shift from surviving to thriving. We do not mourn for what was
lost or never had. We rejoice in what remains, we seek to live not in spite of
it but better because of it. Every prosthetic that we sell is a celebration of
challenges to conquer, some of them for the first time ever. 
I
was very active athletically as a child. I swam, I skied, and I rode my
bicycle. I learned to do those activities in that order because I could not
hold a ski pole or the handlebars of a bicycle. I went through a lengthy
process to develop a prosthetic specifically for swimming. It took weeks of
modeling and doctor visits that ultimately came to nothing partly because the
rules of swimming would not allow me to use it competitively and partly because
of the high cost. My ski pole was modified so that it strapped to my wrist
which was useful for planting vertically but not for dragging. It was
exhausting, and sometimes painful, to use. One of the brake levers on my
bicycle handlebars was reversed which allowed me to wedge my hand and steer
though no longer brake on that side.
There was talk of removing tissue from the
palm of my hand to give me greater grabbing ability. Ultimately, I had no surgery.
These modifications were all sufficient but they each came with a sacrifice. As
time went on I gave up most of those activities but not the desire to remain
active. Experimental hand transplant surgery has provided an awful temptation
over the years. That always felt, however, like a fundamental denial of who I am. The
necessity of two fully functional hands even appeared in the theatre when I studied stage-fighting with a rapier and dagger. The need has never gone away, nor
has the longing.
Shopping
directly for prosthetics as an adult has proven daunting and at times discouraging.
The Hosmer catalogue has page after page of frightening looking devices without
any prices listed and ends with a multi-page credit application. How is that
supposed to be welcoming to a person struggling to make ends meet, struggling
with a difficult lifestyle choice? How can that be anything but off putting? I
felt there had to be a better product and a better way.Airgetlám
Industries is that better way. I am Airgetlám Industries’ first customer. I do
not want anyone else to have to struggle with this the way I have. This company
is designed from the inside out to be welcoming and supportive: sophisticated
design, simple pricing, and a community of advocacy. Customers buy a lifetime
entry to an exclusive fellowship; the prosthetic is simply their badge of
membership.Other Ways You Can HelpWe understand that times are tight and that you may not be able to give right now. Odds are, though, that you know someone who can. Spreading the word can be the biggest help you can give us. Please use Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Reddit, LinkedIn, and any other social media at your disposal to get the word out. Indiegogo makes it easy with their share tools!Thank you for your help!

story:
Haz click aqui para la traducción al español.

Welcome!

Secret Shimapan is the very first brand of underwear that changes colors when you put them on! We use a unique thermosensitive ink that reacts to your body heat, turning transparent at 31°C/88°F, creating a beautiful shimapan pattern.

These cute bikini-cut cotton panties not only come in gorgerous blue, pink, green or black models, but with enough funding, will also come in sizes that fit even the curviest of women, transgender ladies, and guys who just want to wear cute underwear.

Why do we need $7,500?

  • In order to comply with quality standards, we need to buy a  whooping 10 kilograms of specially made ink. This alone will cost us $1,000.
  • To pay everyone who is working on this project for the following months, we will need $700 more.
  • To obtain quality panties at a low enough price to make a profit, we'll have to buy them in bulk, which will cost us about $1,100.
  • Finally there's the costs to buy a domain, build an webpage, set up an entire online shop infrastructure to take orders after the campaign ends, and legally register the brand and logo. Oh, right, and paying taxes. All this amounts to a total of $734.14

These donations alone will help us keep the online shop work for an entire year!

Wait, that doesn't amount to $8,500, so what gives?

Well, part of your donations won't go towards funding the project. Instead, it will go towards manufacturing your very own Secret Shimapan, and sending them to you!

Sounds great! But how do i choose my sizes, colours, and styles?

Don't worry, you'll be able to choose the sizes, colors and styles of your Secret Shimapan after the campaign succeeds, via a link with a form to fill out. Meanwhile, here's an approximate size chart:


Now, onto the perks!

$1 USD: Aw, you shouldn't have...

A token donation. Every dollar counts!

$10 USD: Secret ShimapArt Pack

If you donate $10 to the campaign, we'll give you a digital art pack full of adorable Secret Shimapan-related art, made by artists such as Bikupan, Arlymone, Nittydraws and Astral Lamb, among many others! Here, have a little preview:

Of course, every donation above this price also gets a free ShimArt Pack

$22 USD: A Secret Shimapan

When you donate $17 for the panty and $5 for shipping to the US, Canada or Mexico, you'll be reciving your very own Secret Shimapan! This cotton panty comes with a color change quality guarantee, meaning that, if it ever stops changing as vividly as it did on the first day, we'll change it for a new one, free of charge.

$39 USD: 3x2 Pack

Donate $34 (plus shipping) and you'll get not two, but three Secret Shimapan, meaning every panty will cost you 66% of it's original price.

$90 USD: 8x5 Week Pack

Buy five Secret Shimapan, and we'll give you one for each day of the week, plus one more to do the laundry in! This means each panty will cost you 62.% of it's original price.

$107 USD: 10x6 Ultimate Pack!

You know what, we like you. That is why, if you buy six Secret Shimapan, we'll give you four more entirely free. You'll be getting each shimapan at 60% of it's original price, the lowest price you might ever get out of a special sale once we have the online shop up and running. Get them while they're still warm!

But that's not all! Time for some stretch goals.

(Image by Arylmone)

$8,000: Polka dot Secret Shimapan

Panties that change from flat colors to a polka dot design. Both white dots on red background and red dots on white background will be aviliable!

$9,000: Secret Thigh-highs

The same idea, but higher: Flat-colored thigh-highs that become striped when you put them on! They will also be aviliable in blue, pink, green and black models. Of course, once we reach the stretch goal, they'll be added as a new perk.

$10,000: Secretacles

We've all seen enough japanese animation to know where this is going. These panties will change from a flat color to a neat betentacled design.

(Image by Arylmone)

$20,000: Secret Shimapan, male bikini cut

For transgender ladies and guys who just want to look fabulous, we'll order custom made panties with a femenine bikini cut, but with enough extra space in the front.

$100,000: Water changing swimsuits

If we manage to raise $100,000, we'll go full out and create a line of swimsuits that change color when you get into the water.

Spread the word!

Even if you feel you cannot contribute financially, you can still help us succeed:

  • Tell your friends!
  • Tell your enemies!
  • Tell your neutrals!
  • Share and like us on our following social media platforms:

You can find us on:

facebook.com/SecretShimapan
@SecretShimapan
SecretShimapan.tumblr.com

And remember to use the Indiegogo share tools! They are mighty indeed.

FAQ

Are they safe to wear?

Of course. We use oil-based rubberized ink with the exact same properties than any other serigraphy ink on the market (besides the thermosensitive effect). It complies with the Official Mexican Norm for chemical composition and use on clothing.

How much is shipping?

The shipping fare of $5.00 in North America and Mexico is already accounted into the perk cost. An extra of $10.00 is needed for shipping to the rest of the world.

When will I get my shima?

Our manufacturing partner, Mahaua is standing by and excited to start producing the Secret Shimapan. As soon as our campaign ends, they will get to work.

Allowing for 20 days to receive the funds we raised we can expect to have Secret Shimapan delivered to you within 3 months after the end of the campaign. And we will do everything within our control to expedite the process to get them to you as soon as possible.

How can I wash them?

Wash your Secret Shimapan with clothes of like color, using cold water. However, you should not iron them, put them in the dryer, or otherwise expose them to high temperatures for an extended time.

Will the colors stop changing?

Absolutely not. We are so confident in our product that, as long as you wash them properly, if it starts working less than perfect at any point, we'll replace your panty with a new one, free of charge!

story:
The Sonicherries Story 

Nowadays people are affected by excessive noise more than ever. The number of people with hearing loss is rising dramatically. Everyday noise is affecting not only your ears but also your heart and brain. Excessive noise causes hearing loss, cardiovascular diseases, neurological diseases, stress, tinnitus, insomnia, obesity and learning problems. 

Our product is only a means through which we wish to bring an important announcement - protect your ears and enjoy the beauty of sound.

Our first goal is to extend hearing ability to as many people as possible. We would like to let people hear their music at the sound level at which it can be enjoyed. Last but not least we aim to reduce risk of cardiovascular and neurological diseases. All of that is possible with Sonicherries - the first wooden earplugs.

Product 

Sonicherries are the first trendy wooden earplugs, offered in two versions. 

 

  • The surface of earplugs is treated so you can wash it easily with water

 

Where to Use the Sonicherrries

How Does It Work?

Below you can see how long your ears withstand without permanent hearing damage in different noisy environments. 

 

Measurement

In the measurement plot below you can see how the Sonicherries work. You can see the difference between Sonicherries Lower Volume (grey line) and Sonicherries Silence (red line). 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We would like to reach 20 000 USD to ensure the first production batch and to raise awareness about hearing protection through advertising.
  • The more fund we win the more money we can put into marketing, so we can save more ears.
  • As an early bird you can get a pair of Sonicherries earplugs for a very special price. If you like your own design (engraved logo, icon, letter) on the face of earplugs, no problem, just go for this perk.

Packaging & Shipping = FREE

If you order the Sonicherries earplugs, you will receive them with all accessories:

  • travel pouch
  • two size memory foam tips

We guarantee delivery of the product within two months after the end of campaign. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • A big help for us would be sharing our Indiegogo campaign link and the message that noise is killing our ears and much more besides.
  • If you do not want to become a backer, please spread the Sonicherries idea through Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, Twitter etc. And in case you happen to be in a noisy environment, just put your fingers into your ears.

​                                                 

                      

Perks

story:
Short Summary

The SLAP CASE team is made up of 5 college students currently attending the University at Albany- SUNY.  Our team members are Vasyl Antoshchuk, Heather Forster, Matt Legere, Nicole Phillips, and Roxanne Pitt. The SLAP CASE team met in an entrepreneurship class, coming together to create a product we felt we needed and others would too. 

SLAP CASE is a sleeker case for both sunglasses and eyeglasses that allows optimal protection without the discomfort of having a huge glasses case in your pocket, or risking possible damage to your glasses. SLAP CASE is a foldable case that could fit in a wallet or pocket when glasses are in use and can then be used to protect glasses when not in use.

So far, our contributors have helped us turn our concept of the SLAP CASE into a more functional stage as we begin to take on the prototyping stage! 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to start our project off fully, we need $5,000 to prove that there is enough interest for our product and allow us to purchase the necessary materials to help start our SLAP CASE brand. In order to help us raise this money, we are offering 6 levels of incentives for those who donate with prizes such as t-shirts, glasses cleaners, thank you's,  the actual SLAP CASE itself, and more! If we don't reach our goal, these funds will come back to you and we will recharge and better our SLAP CASE design to further help our target market. 

The Impact

A world without any scratch marks. 

As college students, we are beginning our transition into the "real world" and SLAP CASE is the beginning of that journey. We intend to make life easier for glasses wearers by lessening the space needed for a glasses case and still allowing protection to the glasses.

The SLAP CASE team has been hard at work researching the problems glasses owners face most often in order to improve our product and make life easier. Some things we’ve come across are that 61% of Americans wear eyeglasses, and even more wear sunglasses! By 2020 this market is expected to be a 300 billion dollar industry and we want to make sure you’re getting the most for your money, that’s why our glasses case helps you clean and protect your glasses anywhere without the hassle of a big, bulky case.

Did you know that wear and tear is the #2 reason people purchase new glasses? Well, that’s probably because no one wants to carry a huge case around all the time and there’s currently no case on the market that is as thin and as protective as the SLAP CASE. Stop spending your money on new glasses to replace a scratched up pair, buy a SLAP CASE and spend your money seeing a clearer world for longer! We’re still perfecting our cases and adding new designs to fit your personality, so if you have any suggestions feel free to leave a comment below.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you've broken/scratched your glasses too many times and therefore don't have the money to help our vision we ask that you SLAP some sense into your friends and spread the word using some of the Indiegogo share tools!

Did you know that wear and tear is the #2 reason people purchase new glasses? Well, that’s probably because no one wants to carry a huge case around all the time and there’s currently no case on the market that is as thin and as protective as the SLAP CASE. Stop spending your money on new glasses to replace a scratched up pair, buy a SLAP CASE and spend your money seeing a clearer world for longer! We’re still perfecting our cases and adding new designs to fit your personality, so if you have any suggestions feel free to leave a comment below.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you've broken/scratched your glasses too many times and therefore don't have the money to help our vision we ask that you SLAP some sense into your friends and spread the word using some of the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
The Story Behind Our Brand

Whats the story behind "CHRIS TOMSON"?

Our team sought out to create CHRIS TOMSON because of our passion for high quality watches & accessory and desire to cut out the brand inflation and retail markup of popular name brands.  We got frustrated paying hundreds of euros for name brand products, knowing they only cost a fraction of the price to make.  So we have spent the past year working with leaders in the industry to come up with an affordable, stylish looking and high quality watch & accessory collection.

When designing our products, we made sure of THREE things:

- the highest quality materials
- a look thats reflects the lifestyle of the city that the series represent 
- offering highest quality products at a price less than 50% of what our competitor's cost

After 1 year and hundreds of hours of passionate work we are proud to present our first series - "The NYC"-Series. 

Now we need YOUR support to implement the first mass order and bring our brand & vision to life.

 

The Products:

Watch-Series "NYC"

We want our watches to reflect the lifestyle of very special places. 

Which is why we chose New York City as our first design in the series.  A classic watch that reflects the minimalist urban lifestyle of the city. A watch strap made of the finest Italian leather, combined with a scratch-resistant sapphire crystal. 

Quality, elegance and durability down to the last detail.

Inspired by the zeitgeist of New York City, the "Classic NYC" series unites harmonious aesthetics with classic design. The timepieces, which shine with timeless elegance, enjoy the reputation of an instant classic. 

 

Our first, the classic line, is an ideal companion whether for him or her, be it in business meetings or in everyday life. Change the look in just a few steps, by changing the band to perfectly match any outfit.

 

Inspiration alone was not enough for us. We wanted to create a certain connection between our watches and the places they represent.  

For this reason, we engraved the silhouettes of each city into our watches, with loving precision and attention to detail. 

This embossing brings our watches to life with a character as unique as the city.  

 

The Laptop-Sleeve "Manhattan”

- handmade from the finest leather. 

Minimalist design, combined with the highest quality leather create a piece that harmonizes with any style. Paired with a suit or casual attire, the Manhattan Laptop Sleeve will certainly attract attention in every setting.

 
The thickness of the leather has been perfectly tuned to provide optimal protection for your device in every situation. 
An additional compartment at the front offers you a perfect storage option, so that even small things like your mobile phone can be transported in style.
 
 
Through the combination of a harmonious & sophisticated design in combination with high-quality leather, our “MANHATTAN" is the perfect companion for every business meeting.
 
 

Weekender-Bag "Discoverer"

A lavishly designed leather bag that deserves its seat as the centerpiece of any distinguished travel wardrobe. Handcrafted from the highest quality leather and designed for time away from everyday life.  
 
High-quality leather, the finest workmanship, and a sophisticated design make the functional leather weekender the perfect companion—whether for a short break with friends or a business trip with colleagues.
 
 
The well-thought-out design of the Weekender not only provides plenty of travel essentials, but also has a purposefully designed inner compartment with leather fastenings that keeps your electronic devices safe and secure at all times.    
 
To keep organized even in the stress of the airport, we added a perfectly sized passport pocket to the outside of the weekender to keep your passport at hand. 
 
 
For the modern traveler, we offer the perfect blend of precision craftsmanship and timeless, functional design. The “Discoverer” is certain to garner attention and pairs well with modern ambition.
 
 
 
 
 
 

What We Need & What You Get

After 1 year and hundreds of hours of passionate work we are proud to present our first series - "The NYC"-Series. 

Now we need YOUR support to implement the first mass order and bring our brand & vision to life.

For your support we give you an discount up to 50% off the future retail price.

Risks & Challenges

We are beginners in crowdfunding, but we and our manufacturing partners have years of experience in the industry!

We are aware our project is complex and that there are always unforeseen issues, but we have anticipated and planned for potential risks and have built a rock-solid production and delivery plan.

Firstly, our production is quite advanced and you can be very confident about our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. We spent over 1 year designing, developing, and receiving finalized samples.

Secondly, we have very skillful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterwards.

Thanks for all the support! We are excited to take this next step with you, the IndieGogo-Community!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jana, I worked as designer in many boutiques and now I would like to introduce my own collection Crazy Dolls which is associated with charity contribution.

For first collection I prepared 10 models. All dolls are hand-made and they are luxury compiled. Main material is artificial leather.

All products are hand-made and produced in sheltered workshop where women and mainly mothers in needs are employed. Proceeds from the sale will mainly help to mothers which are in unfavorable situation - they are usually divorced and taking care about their children without any assets and support of their ex-husband and their child maintenance. Most of them lived on street some time and this project and similar ones helps them to get back to normal life.

What We Need & What You Get

Mainly you get gratifying feeling that you help to others and maybe help some mother with her child to stop live on street and help them to get back to normal life before Christmas time.

As a memorial of your good deed you will get one of our Crazy Dolls from limited series which will be delivered to you before Christmas Eve to make you happy and to be proud of your deed.

The Impact

If we reach our goal we would be able to continue in our activities and tangibly it helps to get job for at least 10 women for one year and that's great and really thank you for that.

Other Ways You Can Help

Every dollar counts, but also sharing of my project is highly appreciated.

story:
Short Summary

Welcome to SendMeASurprise.com 2.0. Last year we introduced our monthly surprise box with a soft launch and had a great response. You have been excited to see what you receive and excited to share on social media. After a lot of trial and error and your great feedback we're ready to take SMAS to the masses!

What We Need & What You Get

The biggest challenge we have faced is getting the products for your surprise boxes. The two ways to get products is to buy them in bulk to get deep discounts or to have a large following to entice brands to want to be in front of our audience.

INDIEGOGO does both of these things. We will use your backing to buy bulk products. We will use your support as a community on social media to show our ability to hold an audience.

Your friends have been excited to see what you post. The more of you that post, the more pull we have with brands to get bigger and better products to send you. 

You have received RC drones, selfie sticks, bluetooth phone accessories, spa kits, DVDs, craft supplies, kitchen gadgets, fitness accessories, board games, photography accessories, tablets, iPhones, iPads and more! 

We have learned what products you want to see in your boxes. From your feedback we have decided to shift from being completely wide and encompassing to focusing on sending you gadgets, toys, games and other cool new products. 

Back us. Have fun. Surprise someone! #SendMeASurprise

The Impact



Risks & Challenges

SendMeASurprise.com has been running for almost a year. The challenges we've met and conquered along the way has given us the perfect experience to fulfill this project. We know the model works.

We have completely refined our fulfillment process and have a plan to grow it as our following grows.

The biggest challenge in this project is getting products. We have several connections and sources ready to use for product acquisition. We have minimized this challenge as much as possible. However, with any project there can be delays. We will keep our backers in the loop with up to date fulfillment expectations.

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow us on social media. You're going to see some entertaining posts. The bigger our reach the better products we can send. Engage with us and you'll be helping us blow people's minds!

Our Story

story:
We are fully funded! And now we are on INDEMAND!

Thanks to the amazing support of everyone, all nine enamel pins have been funded and are being produced!  I am really excited to bring the Mina: Nine Lives Enamel Pin Set to the Indiegogo community through INDEMAND.

 

About Me

I'm Nat Jones, an artist with a deep passion for creating dark art and a lifelong love for black cats, bats, and all of the things that go bump in the night.  I have worked in comic books, video games,  film, and fashion for more than twenty years. I live in Alberta, Canada with my wife and four boys.

                                                                My Amazing Wife, Cory, and I

I am really excited to be bringing you the Mina: Nine Lives Enamel Pin Set,  featuring Mina the Bat Cat, here on Indiegogo. Thank you so much for checking out our campaign! 

Cheers,

Please check out my website for more info:

natjones.com lewismayhem.com facebook instagram twitter 

 

About Mina

 

                                                    The First Mina Painting- Full Moon, 2013

MINA 

From feline familiar to fashion icon!

A little backstory on Mina, the Bat Cat. Mina was the name of our beloved Black Cat, she became the inspiration for the art that everyone knows. Unfortunately, she is no longer with us, but she lives on through the character she has become.

Since my very first painting of her, Mina has taken on a life of her own and gained fans worldwide as the little black cat with big attitude. I have designed nine different collectible pins for this set, all inspired by my most loved Mina art. Each pin captures her unique style and personality in a stylish, witchy accessory. Now you can have your very own Mina protecting you wherever you go. 

                                   The Original Mina, My Inspiration and Beloved Companion, RIP

 

About the Pins

 

 The MINA: Nine Lives Enamel Pin Set  features nine jewelry quality hard enamel pins, designed by myself and carrying a signature back stamp for authenticity. These high quality hard enamel pins will be available in gold or silver plated with black and antique white enamel, and measure from 1.5 to 1.75 inches (38-45mm) Each enamel pin will ship on their own custom backing card and include a black rubber clutch.

I will be personally working with the manufacturer to assure the quality of each pin and inspecting each one during packaging. The images attached are my mockups, so there may be slight changes to the final enamel pins due to manufacturing requirements. 

This is a great time for you to join in, as I am currently working with the manufacturer and getting ready for production.

The Pins

 

All pins are available in Silver Plating as well!

 

 

What You Get

The Pins are available in 1 Pin, 2 Pin, 3 Pin, 6 Pin, and a Full 9 Pin set.

As a bonus to your Mina: Nine Lives hard Enamel Pin you will also receive a MINA: Fangs Die Cut Sticker, 3 inches (88 mm)!

As well as an Indiegogo Exclusive MINA: Hexed Art Print 4x6 inches!

 

 

The 6 Pin and 9 Pin sets will also receive a MINA: Full Moon Die Cut Sticker , 4 inches (100 mm)!

The 9 Pin set will also include a special BONUS One Inch Mina: Fangs Enamel Pin in silver !

 

 

Risks & Challenges

My wife and I have run and fulfilled multiple online stores and have experience working with suppliers and manufacturers. We are already fully funded and moving into the production phase.

The biggest challenge right now is manufacturing and shipping delays due to the global pandemic. There is the chance of delay in fulfillment due to this, but I am including an extra month in my timeline to accommodate problems. I will stay in contact with all Backers during the fulfillment process to keep everyone informed of any issues if they do arise.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us get the word out about the Mina: Nine Lives Enamel Pin Set, tell your friends or anyone you know who is a fan of black cats or gothic and witchy things.  Please share our page on your social media, it's easy using Indiegogo share tools!

 

Thank you!

                     -Nat

I will stay in contact with all Backers during the fulfillment process to keep everyone informed of any issues if they do arise.

 
Other Ways You Can Help

story:
My name is Marius, I finished college in economics and a master's in project management. I'm 25 and country living and family needs me pushed to the labor market from the age of 15 years. I have five years experience in organizational management and two years of voluntary involvement in social and political projects.

Let me launch this small project, in which I believe with all my heart to start a profitable long-term social scenarios establishing highly profitable for our common future. In Romania, education does not occupy first place in the government's objectives, even second place.

Civic engagement must start somewhere, and I, at least for me, I found the perfect solution to combine the desire to engage a broader community educated and developed a desire to run a business and to provide opportunities for young people they want to work.

Money raised from this campaign will be invested in a website (online store), a platform of data protection possible future customers in production or buying shirts from European producers and later in the print shirt with the right messages environment that will be for sale. If the money will be enough, with great love, I wish at the outset to rent a nice place in Bucharest and to open its first store "physical" education shirts. The messages will be printed on T-shirts with the words impact that achieves all optional education needs community development.

As you probably have read about Romania movement "Corruption Kill" is a huge success, and volunteers are fighting for democracy #Rezist quality and a better future for children who will grow in this country and beyond. In a currently highly problematic for Romania but for Europe, education is the most powerful weapon against any danger. Without education, people are vulnerable, uneducated people are easier to handle in a nation with a majority of uneducated people, the future is scary.

Any help matters!

Not this platform and thus to you if I needed real help in financial terms. Even if you can not help financially, can you help me to distribute this little project and to reach as many people.

A, almost forgot, the future store will be called "OPHY" short for Ophelia, Hamlet extraordinary character.

story:
Design, personalize and buy or sell your custom watch – Zeewatches.


  • Create your own watch face from the ground up using tools on our website or...
  • Upload any image / graphics you want on your watch's face
  • Buy it! Or...
  • Sell your own design and make profits!

Hello! Zeewatches is our new startup and our plan is to introduce to the market a range of fashionable and good-looking customizable watches. Our vision is to allow you to build a watch you always wanted with countless possibilities of customization through designing your own watch face, uploading any image or graphics you want on it, choosing and mixing straps and few smaller parts of the watch. The final result will be 100% unique custom watch designed by you. And what's more you will be able to sell your own design and earn profits!  




Other big news is that anyone will be able to open up his own store on our website, upload his/her designs and sell it with profit. The process of designing, buying and selling your watches will be very simple and user-friendly. We will take care of logistics, assembly and shipping - all you have to do is to make your own design and upload it. And all you will need to invest to sell your own watches is your time and idea. It's simple as that.


Naturally, apart from custom watches you will still be able to choose from our standard collection which consists of dozens of our own fantastic designs that have been prepared by our graphic designers and collaborators.

We want to raise $20,000 mainly to help develop our website. Right now we are finalizing basic functions of our website, so there will be a possibility to buy watches from our standard collection. We would like to add customisation tools and the possibility to open up accounts which would let you become a seller of  your own designs. The process of developing an Internet website of great quality with possibilities of customization and opening up a store is a costly one and that's why we need your help. Check out the details below to see our watches and the visualizations of our website plans.

During our Indiegogo launch campaign you will be able to pre-order our custom Zeewatch. Your watch will be custom build with our customization tools, which means you will be limited almost only by your imagination. You can design the watch face, upload any graphics or a picture (e.g. your family photo) and choose matching strap.


What is a Zeewatch?

 
Here's our Zeewatch. The faces and straps are interchangeable, so you can easily mix the faces with any strap color you want to match your mood or outfit. Zee watches are affordable and will be available with 12 strap colors in the beginning. More colors will follow later. As mentioned our watch will be fully customizable up to tiniest details - you will even be able to customize the color of the watch hands and strap loops.



The Zeewatch is water resisant and made from high quality rubber and mechanism. We have already tested our Zeewatches and can assure you that the quality is great. And it looks good on any type of occasion.

What can you do with a Zeewatch and who would love to get one? Well, you can do almost everything and we're sure everyone who gets one will love it!

  • you can have a watch with pictures of loved ones

  • or drawings of your kids

  • it's great as a gift with your brand's logo

  • perfect for any sports team

  • you can put private label design to resell with your brand or in your store

  • capture the most important moments of your life, like wedding

  • literally ANYTHING that comes to your mind


Custom process


That is one of the reasons why we need your help. Apart from the standard designs that have been prepared by our graphic designers and collaborators you will be able to make yourself a fully customized watch.


The tools we will provide will enable for quick and easy customization of your watch's face:

  • different backgrounds,
  • patterns, inscriptions,  
  • dials, 
  • frames,
  • a possibility to upload your own, earlier prepared graphics or photo to use as a background.  

With one watch design you can achieve different results. Sporty, classy, conservative? Your photo of a family member or from your last vacation to bring back memories? No problem. Then just choose the strap, strap loops and watch hands colors and you have your unique fully customized watch! Thanks to our tools the possibilities will be limited only by your imagination!

Our custom process will have great capabilities, so considering the quality of our website we're aiming at, it will be quite costly to make it happen.  


Sell and earn


After we invest funds into increasing the capabilities of our website, not only you will be able to create your custom watch, but it will also be possible to open up a store where you can sell your own designs and earn funds for each watch you sell!





The process of opening up a store and selling your unique design will be as easy as it can be. You will be able to watch your sales and the funds growing. There's no need to invest your private funds in the process. Opening up the store will be completely free, easy and for every sale of your design you will receive funds – up to $10 per watch. This is aimed not only at professional graphic designers, we will also be happy to have designs from imaginative people from all over the world available on our website.


What will we do with $20,000?

Through hard work and dedication we have made the first step in the process and our website is now nearing completion with it's basic functions, but because it is costly we will not make it to the end alone. The funds raised in this campaign will go towards:

  • Website: finalizing our website with it's basic functions (we're close, but we need your help)
  • Website: custom process – professionally made websites can be expensive. Our will be because we aim at the highest quality possible. And the possibilities of custom designing your Zee Watch will be huge as we mentoned earlier.
  • Website: possibility of opening up a store – everyone will be able to do it and earn funds. Again, speaking from the technical point of view this is quite a task to make it happen and to make it work perfectly well.
  • Investment in our facility which will lead to shorter handling times and better quality of manually assembled mechanisms.

After succesful campaign (which will end in March) we will need three months to refine and finish our website. This means that we will ship our watches approximately during the first two weeks of July.

Support us and get yourself a watch!
story_txt:
Design, personalize and buy or sell your custom watch – Zeewatches.
 
Create your own watch face from the ground up using tools on our website or... Upload any image / graphics you want on your watch's face
Buy it! Or... Sell your own design and make profits!


Hello! Zeewatches is our new startup
and our plan is to introduce to the market a range of fashionable and
good-looking customizable watches. Our vision is to allow you to
build a watch you always wanted with countless possibilities of
customization through designing your own watch face, uploading any
image or graphics you want on it, choosing and mixing straps and few
smaller parts of the watch. The final result will be 100% unique
custom watch designed by you. And what's more you will be able to
sell your own design and earn profits!  



Other big news is that anyone will be able to open up his own store on our website, upload his/her designs and sell it with profit. The process of designing, buying and selling your watches will be very simple and user-friendly. We will take care of logistics, assembly and shipping - all you have to do is to make your own design and upload it. And all you will need to invest to sell your own watches is your time and idea. It's simple as that.






Naturally, apart from custom watches you will still be able to choose from our standard collection which consists of dozens of our own fantastic designs that have been prepared by our graphic designers and collaborators.
We want to raise $20,000 mainly to help develop our website. Right now we are finalizing basic functions of our website, so there will be a possibility to buy watches from our standard collection. We would like to add customisation tools and the possibility to open up accounts which would let you become a seller of  your own designs. The process of developing an Internet website of great quality with possibilities of customization and opening up a store is a costly one and that's why we need your help. Check out the details below to see our watches and the visualizations of our website plans.
During our Indiegogo launch campaign you will be able to pre-order our custom Zeewatch. Your watch will be custom build with our customization tools, which means you will be limited almost only by your imagination. You can design the watch face, upload any graphics or a picture (e.g. your family photo) and choose matching strap.

What is a Zeewatch?


 

Here's our Zeewatch. The faces and
straps are interchangeable, so you can easily mix the faces with any
strap color you want to match your mood or outfit. Zee watches are
affordable and will be available with 12 strap colors in the
beginning. More colors will follow later.  As mentioned our watch
will be fully customizable up to tiniest details - you will even be
able to customize the color of the watch hands and strap loops.



The Zeewatch is water resisant and
made from high quality rubber and mechanism. We have already tested
our Zeewatches and can assure you that the quality is great. And it
looks good on any type of occasion.


What can you do with a Zeewatch and
who would love to get one? Well, you can do almost everything and
we're sure everyone who gets one will love it!

you can have a watch with pictures of
loved ones


or drawings of your kids




it's great as a gift with your brand's
logo




perfect for any sports team




you can put private label design to
resell with your brand or in your store




capture the most important moments of
your life, like wedding




literally ANYTHING that comes to your
mind



Custom process



That is one of the reasons why we need your help. Apart from the standard designs that have been prepared by our graphic designers and collaborators you will be able to make yourself a fully customized watch.




The tools we will provide will enable for quick and easy customization of your watch's face:



different backgrounds,


patterns, inscriptions,  


dials, 


frames,


a possibility to upload your own, earlier prepared graphics or photo to use as a background.  





With one watch design you can achieve different results. Sporty, classy, conservative? Your photo of a family member or from your last vacation to bring back memories? No problem. Then just choose the strap, strap loops and watch hands colors and you have your unique fully customized watch! Thanks to our tools the possibilities will be limited only by your imagination!
Our custom process will have great capabilities, so considering the quality of our website we're aiming at, it will be quite costly to make it happen.  

Sell and earn


After we invest funds into increasing the capabilities of our website, not only you will be able to create your custom watch, but it will also be possible to open up a store where you can sell your own designs and earn funds for each watch you sell!










The process of opening up a store and selling your unique design will be as easy as it can be. You will be able to watch your sales and the funds growing. There's no need to invest your private funds in the process. Opening up the store will be completely free, easy and for every sale of your design you will receive funds – up to $10 per watch. This is aimed not only at professional graphic designers, we will also be happy to have designs from imaginative people from all over the world available on our website.




What will we do with $20,000?
Through hard work and dedication we have made the first step in the process and our website is now nearing completion with it's basic functions, but because it is costly we will not make it to the end alone. The funds raised in this campaign will go towards:





Website: finalizing our website with it's basic functions (we're close, but we need your help)

Website: custom process – professionally made websites can be expensive. Our will be because we aim at the highest quality possible. And the possibilities of custom designing your Zee Watch will be huge as we mentoned earlier.


Website: possibility of opening up a store – everyone will be able to do it and earn funds. Again, speaking from the technical point of view this is quite a task to make it happen and to make it work perfectly well.


Investment in our facility which will lead to shorter handling times and better quality of manually assembled mechanisms.



After succesful campaign (which will end in March) we will need three months to refine and finish our website. This means that we will ship our watches approximately during the first two weeks of July.


Support us and get yourself a watch!

story:
This page is for the octophotograhper design. If you would like to order one of the other four limited edition designs, click the images at the bottom of this page:

Illustrator Jo Brown produces incredible artworks that showcase animal life from around the world. We have been following Jo Brown's artworks since we came across her unique style of drawings several years ago. Recently we reached out to Jo with the idea of producing artworks based on underwater photographs of our favourite ocean animals from around the world.

                           

Jo has created some incredible concept pieces that we are hoping to print in a limited production of 25 t-shirts through this campaign. If successful, we will continue to work with Jo to think up and release new designs.

Lets share Jo's artwork with the world and show people our passion for marine life whilst we're at it. Art isn't only to be admired on gallery walls - why not wear beautiful art on a hand printed, eco-friendly T-shirt!

How are the shirts eco friendly?

We've found a supplier of organic cotton T-shirts (free of plastic micro-fibres) produced using responsible social practices and renewable energy. The 'Earth Positive' T-shirts will be hand screen printed in Bristol, UK and shipped directly to you using as little plastic packaging as we can.

How do I make sure that  I get the right size and colour?

At the end of the campaign we'll send you a survey asking for which cut (M/F), colour and size combination you would like. We will then send them out

Why run an Indiegogo campaign for T-shirts - why not do a bulk print and sell them individually?

Consumer clothing produces an incredible amount of waste, some of which ends up in our oceans. The global average consumption of textiles is around 13kg per person, per year. Along the production chain there can be negative effects from agricultural practices, emissions of chemicals and plastic micro-fibres, and poor working conditions in factories. It sounds unthinkable, but a large portion of the budget fashion produced every year never ends up being worn before it enters landfill.

10,000 discarded clothing items in Hugh’s War on Waste;

Derick Melander's artwork Tollens (2017).

We want to ensure that any T-shirts we get made have as positive an impact on the people and environment as possible. For this to work, we need them all to go on to a happy new owner, with none left unworn or discarded as 'fashion waste'. When they can be worn no longer we hope they can be donated, mended, up-cycled, or composted rather than discarded into landfill. This campaign can help us make this happen - and if you've read this and become a supporter, it's already working!

What if you get more than 25 T-shirt orders? Will you run out?

No, we won't run out - we won't take your money or print the shirts if we don't get 25 orders, but we would love to print more. If you're a supporter and we make or exceed our goal, you won't miss out on a shirt.

Where will our money go?

Most of the funding will go towards actually purchasing and printing the T-shirts, since this is a minimum run. About 30% of each shirt sale will go towards collaborating on the next set of commissioned artworks with Jo Brown.

If we exceed our initial goal of funding 25 shirts, the cost of printing begins to decrease. If we get more than 25 orders, we'll donate 2.5% of the proceeds to Oceana, a charity which campaigns for global Ocean Conservation at a community level. If we pass 100 shirts we will increase this to 5%; at 150 shirts, 7.5%; for 200 shirts, 10%, and so on to a maximum of 20% of the overall funding.

The shirts look awesome, I want to support the campaign, what size should I order?

Here's the sizing guide direct from the t-shirt supplier. We'll hopefully get some samples soon, so we can give you a guide against real people. Please note that due to the small print run and screen-printing method, the size of the printed artwork will not scale to the size of the shirt.

Unisex/mens sizing guide:

Ladies cut sizing guide:

 

Click here to view the cuttlefish t-shirt campaign 

Click here to view the mantis shrimp t-shirt campaign 

Click here to view the leafy seadragon t-shirt campaign

click here to view the humpback whale campaign
