story:
The style is distinctive.    The quality, unmistakable.                           

It happens every time. You take your first look at a Blue Iguana Wood Watch – and you have to stop and look again.  There is something about the classic design - the wood grain - the way the light interacts with the contours.  You are drawn into it and the more you look at these amazing timepieces the more they capture your attention. It is a completely different experience than any other watch. The craftsmanship of each timepiece is apparent for all to see. 

It truly is a work of art. And you can wear it. 

 There are 3 styles of Blue Iguana Wood Watches - The first is The Havana.. (see our Apple Watch bands at the bottom of the page). (Note on Perks - we can create custom perks if you need - example: you want to buy a few different watches that are not grouped together in the Perks now. Just send us an email or comment and we will create it for you).  



The Havana - Red sandalwood and maplewood hardwoods. Take a moment to enjoy the handsome design of this classic timepiece.

Next is La Brisa (The Breeze). Made from Zebra-wood, rose-tone or gold-tone stainless steel links and mother-of-pearl pink or blue faces. 

La Brisa (The Breeze) has two styles. Pictured above is the Zebra-wood with blue mother-of-pearl face/dial. It is paired with Gold-tone stainless steel links and numerals and hands. There is also the pink mother-of-pearl face/dial. That one is paired with Rose-tone stainless steel links, numerals and hands.

Here are the two styles of La Brisa side by side. 

Then we have La Guardia (The Guard). There are 4 styles of this watch. You can choose from two face/dial colors - slate blue or black.  Also, there are two watch bands style - the All Wood style or the Wood and Stainless Steel.

 El Guardia (The Guard). Complete with precision chronograph, Ebony Wood and Stainless Steel. You can choose either the Slate Blue face/dial or the Ebony face/dial. Pictured above is the slate blue face/dial.

This beautiful watch comes with two face selections - black or blue and also two band selections. 

Now, let's take a few moments to look at these wonderful timepieces in depth.

Let's start with the Havana.  This really is our classic, signature look. It’s casual, it’s cool, it’s rugged, it’s a statement. The Havana timepiece is characterized by its classic, timeless elegance and it’s overall uniqueness. The vintage style of the The Havana is inspired by the tropics and Havana, Cuba during the time of Hemingway’s adventures. This timepiece has an old world style with a modern twist which gives it a truly unique look. Red sandalwood and maplewood highlight this beauty. 

Check it out people. This watch is as amazing as it looks. The quality is second-to-none.

Meticulously hand-crafted and with quality at every turn. We could not be more proud of this stunning timepiece.

Now, you Tell me, how beautiful does this watch look ?

The only thing better then looking at this beauty is wearing it on your wrist.

This is the back cover - The Blue Iguana logo is laser etched. 

Whether you are buying for yourself or as a gift, your Blue Iguana wood watch will come in this custom gift box.

The Havana - red sandalwood and maplewood - size details

The Havana includes:

Red Sandalwood and Maplewood hardwoods for the band

Red Sandalwood for the Watchcase

Movement: Citizen Miyota quartz 2315 3-hand, with date

Stainless Steel Clasp

Blue Iguana Logo laser printed on watch back

Custom Gift Box w/ Blue Iguana Logo

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Now's let check out El Guardia - The Guard.  

It’s bold, it’s beautiful… it is impressive. El Guardia (The Guard), with its' strong and sophisticated design, is the watch you wear when you want to command attention. This is not your everyday watch - this is the watch you wear when you want to impress.

This  quartz chronograph timepiece features exotic Ebony hardwood for the case. The Ebony wood color runs from a dark black to hints of brown in the grain.

The watch-band can be either Stainless Steel and Ebony Wood links or the All wood band. 

The face/dial can can be a Black Dial or the Slate Blue Dial. 

So we can track inventory and respond quickly for production, we have listed these as individual perks.    

Wow, just impressive. It's big, it's bold.. it's El Guardia. Ebony wood that runs from dark black to hints of brown in the grain. Sleek stainless steel links paired into the wood band. Fully functional chronograph set into either the slate blue or ebony dial. 

El Guardia looking cool just hanging out on the table.

The all wood watch band. It really is amazing. 

The back cover of El Guardia with the Blue Iguana logo laser etched. 

El El Guardia can have either the Slate Blue dial/face or ebony dial/face

 

Here is the All Wood band with the Black face/dial.

El Guardia in the custom gift box.

El Guardia size detail

El Guardia includes:

Ebony hardwood watchcase

Ebony hardwood and stainless steel for the watchband links or

All wood Ebony hardwood watchband

Movement: quartz 6-hand with date

Blue Iguana Logo laser printed on watch back

Custom Gift Box w/ Blue Iguana Logo

Stainless Steel Clasp

Slate blue or Ebony face/dial

 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Let's talk about La Brisa - The Breeze.  

This watch is gorgeous. See how the mother-of-pearl face reflects different tones of color depending on the light. La Brisa (The Breeze) captures the beauty of the tropics. The face is pink or blue to represent the pastel tropic colors. The natural Zebra-wood band is blended with either Rose-tone or Gold-tone stainless steel to reflect the earthy tropical landscape.

LaBrisa can be a gentle warm breeze or a force of nature. It is your decision how you wear it.

There are two styles of Labrisa - the Blueface mother-of-pearl with Gold-tone or the Pinkface mother-of-pearl with Rose-tone.La Brisa - the pink mother-of-pearl  reflects the light into subtle shades of pink and purple. The light may change but the watch remains spectacular.

 ~ ~ sigh ~

 

Double ~sigh~

If one is good - then two are better.

La Brisa ready to go in the custom Blue Iguana gift box.

La B

La Brisa size details

La Brisa includes:

Zebrawood hardwood for the watchcase

Zebrawood hardwood and Stainless Steel for the watchband

Movement: Citizens Miyota quartz 2025, 2-hand

Custom Gift Box w/ Blue Iguana Logo

Blue or Pink mother-of-pearl dial/face

Stainless Steel butterfly clasp

Rose-tone or Gold-tone links, numerals & hands

Blue Iguana Logo laser printed on watch back

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Apple watch bands in either All wood ebony or all wood Red sandalwood and maple wood.

Size 42-44mm

Apple watch bands in two styles. El Guardia Ebony wood and The Havana Red sandalwood and Maplewood

The Havana Apple watch band fits 42 - 44mm

The Havana watch and matching Apple watch band in Red Sandalwood and Maplewood

El Guardia Apple watch band in Ebony wood.  Firs size 42 - 44 mm

 

El Guardia watch and matching Apple watch band in Ebony wood and fits 42 - 44mm.

Nick Nicolino - creator of Blue Iguana Wood Watches - wearing The Havana.

Hi. I'm Nick Nicolino and I'm the owner and creator of Blue Iguana. The concept behind Blue Iguana was to create a fashionable, yet environmentally friendly line of clothing and accessories (our first product was Bamboo and Organic cotton yoga pants). As I was designing these wood watches, I drew inspiration from nature, the islands, and this beautiful planet we live on called Earth. It was important to stay true to the concept - natural products, natural processes, fashionable end results. Oh, and while we are at it - let's keep the pricing realistic.  I believe we have accomplished all of that. 

We are very excited about our  Indiegogo InDemand campaign and we will keep you posted as we move forward :)

As for the future, there are many more green, natural, fashionable and sustainable items we are working on and we want you to be the first to see them as we introduce these game-changing items into the fashion world. 

with gratitude,

Namaste

Nick Nicolino,   Blue Iguana

Links to our media:  

Website: myblueiguana.net     

Facebook: Blue Iguana Bamboo Clothing Co

Instagram: Blue Iguana Bamboo

Below is our extended video with additional scenes by Nick 

Risks and challenges

As you have seen from our video, we have already produced and sold our Blue Iguana Wood Watches in and around the Tampa, Florida area. We are at the Ybor City Saturday Market most Saturdays where we get instant feedback from our customers and that has been excellent. We will continue updates right from the Ybor Market as the campaign progresses. We foresee a seamless production, keeping with our timeline and our commitment to our Indiegogo backers. You will get the same personal attention we give at our markets and shows here in Tampa - we are with you every step of the way. We'll keep you informed as the Indiegogo Indemand campaign unfolds.  We will make sure the exact watch you ordered is being produced just for you. We'll pack and ship in a timely manner and we'll follow up with you to make sure you are happy. 
We are looking forward to a successful Indiegogo Indemand campaign and the beginning of a long relationship of bringing to you the latest in fashion and sustainability. 
Much appreciation, 
Blue Iguana

It really is amazing. The back cover of El Guardia with the Blue Iguana logo laser etched. El El Guardia can have either the Slate Blue dial/face or ebony dial/face Here is the All Wood band with the Black face/dial.El Guardia in the custom gift box.El Guardia size detailEl Guardia includes:Ebony hardwood watchcaseEbony hardwood and stainless steel for the watchband links orAll wood Ebony hardwood watchbandMovement: quartz 6-hand with dateBlue Iguana Logo laser printed on watch backCustom Gift Box w/ Blue Iguana LogoStainless Steel ClaspSlate blue or Ebony face/dial ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Let's talk about La Brisa - The Breeze.  This watch is gorgeous. See how the mother-of-pearl face reflects different tones of color depending on the light. La Brisa (The Breeze) captures the beauty of the tropics. The face is pink or blue to represent the pastel tropic colors. The natural Zebra-wood band is blended with either Rose-tone or Gold-tone stainless steel to reflect the earthy tropical landscape.LaBrisa can be a gentle warm breeze or a force of nature. It is your decision how you wear it.There are two styles of Labrisa - the Blueface mother-of-pearl with Gold-tone or the Pinkface mother-of-pearl with Rose-tone.La Brisa - the pink mother-of-pearl  reflects the light into subtle shades of pink and purple. The light may change but the watch remains spectacular. ~ ~ sigh ~ Double ~sigh~If one is good - then two are better.La Brisa ready to go in the custom Blue Iguana gift box.La BLa Brisa size detailsLa Brisa includes:Zebrawood hardwood for the watchcaseZebrawood hardwood and Stainless Steel for the watchbandMovement: Citizens Miyota quartz 2025, 2-handCustom Gift Box w/ Blue Iguana LogoBlue or Pink mother-of-pearl dial/faceStainless Steel butterfly claspRose-tone or Gold-tone links, numerals & handsBlue Iguana Logo laser printed on watch back----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Apple watch bands in either All wood ebony or all wood Red sandalwood and maple wood.Size 42-44mmApple watch bands in two styles. El Guardia Ebony wood and The Havana Red sandalwood and MaplewoodThe Havana Apple watch band fits 42 - 44mmThe Havana watch and matching Apple watch band in Red Sandalwood and MaplewoodEl Guardia Apple watch band in Ebony wood.  Firs size 42 - 44 mm El Guardia watch and matching Apple watch band in Ebony wood and fits 42 - 44mm.Nick Nicolino - creator of Blue Iguana Wood Watches - wearing The Havana.Hi. I'm Nick Nicolino and I'm the owner and creator of Blue Iguana. The concept behind Blue Iguana was to create a fashionable, yet environmentally friendly line of clothing and accessories (our first product was Bamboo and Organic cotton yoga pants). As I was designing these wood watches, I drew inspiration from nature, the islands, and this beautiful planet we live on called Earth. It was important to stay true to the concept - natural products, natural processes, fashionable end results. Oh, and while we are at it - let's keep the pricing realistic.  I believe we have accomplished all of that. We are very excited about our  Indiegogo InDemand campaign and we will keep you posted as we move forward :)As for the future, there are many more green, natural, fashionable and sustainable items we are working on and we want you to be the first to see them as we introduce these game-changing items into the fashion world. with gratitude,NamasteNick Nicolino,   Blue IguanaLinks to our media:  Website: myblueiguana.net     Facebook: Blue Iguana Bamboo Clothing CoInstagram: Blue Iguana BambooBelow is our extended video with additional scenes by Nick Risks and challengesAs you have seen from our video, we have already produced and sold our Blue Iguana Wood Watches in and around the Tampa, Florida area. We are at the Ybor City Saturday Market most Saturdays where we get instant feedback from our customers and that has been excellent. We will continue updates right from the Ybor Market as the campaign progresses. We foresee a seamless production, keeping with our timeline and our commitment to our Indiegogo backers. You will get the same personal attention we give at our markets and shows here in Tampa - we are with you every step of the way. We'll keep you informed as the Indiegogo Indemand campaign unfolds.  We will make sure the exact watch you ordered is being produced just for you. We'll pack and ship in a timely manner and we'll follow up with you to make sure you are happy. We are looking forward to a successful Indiegogo Indemand campaign and the beginning of a long relationship of bringing to you the latest in fashion and sustainability. Much appreciation, Blue Iguana

story:
About

 

INTRODUCING VIANETIC   (vee-uh net'ik). The meaning of the name draws from the usage of magnetic interface from point to point to bring about a super-fast and convenient way of diapering.

OUR STORY

A revolutionary new kind of diaper bag that makes traveling with a baby easier. Parents rarely have an extra hand to spare, which is why we designed a backpack that flips to diapering without having to use a zipper! 

 

Our mission is to help busy parents stress less about going outdoors or not having a place to change their little ones. Simply, pull and unlock the cover to a diaper change under 3 seconds (did you notice that it's done with a single hand?). 

All your items are within easy reach. No more wondering what's buried at the bottom of a bag.

 

PROBLEM WITH CAR CHANGES TODAY

 Zipper frustration.

 

 

Top-loading bags stacks items on top of each other — making items difficult to find.

Backpacks are meant to be helpful, not break your back.

 

 

OUR SOLUTION

 

  • Easy Reach Items
  • Organized
  • Diapering in 3-seconds
  • Easy Setup
  • Diapering within reach.

All in one compartment. Say goodbye to fishing..

Ease of use, speed to open, simple organization to be the drivers of this bag. By implementing a german-engineered magnetic pull-release lock, the bag is secure and allows for the fastest opening possible, without zippers. Magnetic connections run along both sides of the bag to help secure and keep items from falling out. A single main compartment for quick access of essential items such as wipes, diapers, creams, toys, without ever second guessing which zipper pocket or how deep into a bag I need to go to get to items.

 

 

SPEED AND EASE OF USE 

 

Self standing feet allows for easy changes on any flat surface. Get to diapering in under 3 seconds. How fast is your diaper bag? 

 

PRESS KIT

https://www.thevianetic.com/press-kit/

 

FASHION MEETS FUNCTION

 

BABY ESSENTIALS BUNDLE 

INCLUDES:  

  • BACKPACK  
  • VIANETIC THERMAL PAK  
  • DETACHABLE DIAPER PAD  
  • PULL-OUT CADDY  
  • CAR/ STROLLER ATTACHMENT

 EXTERIOR

Conceal Side Pockets maintains a minimalist look

Never run out of battery. Charge on the Go, simply plug in your battery (battery not included).

 

 

INTERIOR

Red Polyester Liner

Breast pump ready is just a flip and swoosh away!

 

INSULATED THERMAL PAK

  • 3X milk bottles
  • 3X food containers/ pouches
  • Standard wine bottle
  • ice pack ready
  • Attaches onto strollers
  • Anti-leak pull-out bottom insert

Easy clean pull-out bottom. Just rinse!

 

PREMIUM HARDWARE 

We source topgrade german magnetic buckles for a world class feel. Our patent-pending 3 position sternum strap system allows for multiple ways to carry..

 

 

  Cross body magnetic sternum strap for stabilization and support

 

 Magnetic Stroller straps are easy and fun. Just swipe and release..

 

Universal car attachment positions bag for optimal car changes and does'nt take up floor space..

 

EVERYDAY CARRY 

Our minimalist bag makes this a great everyday carry. Perfect for the commute, work, school or light travel. Compression straps stabilization items on the interior.

 INCLUDES: 

  • BACKPACK 
  • COMPRESSION STRAP 
  • RAINFLY

 

What makes this bag such a great everyday carry? There's interior wall pockets, plenty of them. With two inner and two outter loops, you can secure items with dimension without having to worry about it bouncing around in the bag. Here's here our compression strap works.

PHOTOGRAPHY

CAMERA ORGANIZER OPTIONAL (compatible with 20L bag) : 

 

Available in dark gray color only.

 

SPECIFICATIONS  

DIMENSIONS - STANDARD 20L

13.75” wide x 18.5” high x 6.5” deep 

4.3 lbs. weight (empty) 

5-in-1 bundle 5.3 lbs. weight 

BPA-free & Phthalate-free & PVC-free

DIMENSIONS - MINI 16L

13” wide x 17” high x 6.5” deep 

3.8 lbs. weight (empty)

5-in-1 bundle 4.9 lbs. weight 

BPA-free & Phthalate-free & PVC-free

MATERIALS: 

Exterior - 650D Polyester

Stain and DWR (water resistant coating).  

Interior - red polyester liner 20L & orange polyester liner 16L

German engineered premium magnetic buckles

Water Repellent Zippers

Easy clean materials (soap +water)

We're different. How does it compare to other bags out there?

Timeline

Perks

 

Add-ons

How do I add a bag? 

1. Go to "Manage your pledge"

2. Add the dollar amount  to your pledge (ex: 16L Mini $149, and you want to get another 16L Mini. $149 + $149 = $298. )

3. That's it! 

Stretch Goals

We're funded. Anything extra is gravy. Here's how much gravy and how savory this gravy can be:

 

Shipping

Shipping will be charged after the campaign in the post-campaign survey.

Shipping charges above are estimates, final shipping charges will appear on the post-campaign survey and may vary slightly from these estimates.  

U.S. estimates apply to the lower 48 contiguous states only.

Non-contiguous states Alaska/Hawaii shipping is charged at the "Rest of World" level.  

Rest of world prices depend on proximity to our EU and AU fulfillment centers.

If applicable, VAT will be calculated and added to all shipping costs to avoid customers having to pay later on. 

Within 24 hours of your order being shipped you will receive a tracking link with your shipping details. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package. We use a shared post shipping method to have your order delivered at an affordable price. Your order will ship out from our shipping facility in NYC and with certain hubs internationally located in Hong Kong and Europe. Your order will be handled by UPS, USPS, or DHL up to entry of your country. 

Once your order enters your country your order will be handed off to your local post office for final delivery. International transit will have a 7-21 Business day delivery time. U.S Domestic shipments will take 3-5 business days.     

Why Crowdfund?

The Vianetic is quite expensive to make. Features and complexity of the bag requires funding for production. That's where you come in. We truly feel our unique product makes parenting on the go so much easier. We know parenting can be super-stressful. We're here to help and guarantee you'll love this bag or send it back. Join us in smarter quicker, cleaner diapering on the go with the Vianetic! In return, you'll be the first to own this bag. 

Product Warranty

We stand behind all of our products. Any of the VIANETIC Backpacks will come with a 5 year warranty that covers normal wear and tear.  

Customs & Duty

Shipping will include VAT, GST or other country taxes into the costs. This is to save you time and rather provide a smoother transaction rather than having to pay at the door.

Risks & Challenges

Though we do not see any direct risks, there are always unforeseen circumstances that may present themselves during production. However, it is our top priority to get our backers/ supporters the same top quality bag that we’re enthused to introduce to the world. We look forward to sharing our invention with you and parents all over the world that can benefit from a better diaper change experience.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like or believe that our product can help parents with an easier or smoother experience, share it with the world:

 

Come #unlockchange with us!

story:
Optopus sunglasses are designed by You, 3D-printed by us.



What is Optopus?

With Optopus you can create your own sunglasses easily, online.

On our website you can get access to our online designing platform where you can modify multiple parameters of your sunglasses. You don't need to be a designer or engineer because our system is really easy to use.


What can you personalize?


We all know that many online personalization solutions give you really limited possibilities to modify the products. At Optopus we are striving to give you more freedom in customization so you can literally express and wear your creativity. The only limit to your imagination is that the glasses have to be 3D-printable, but these limits are built into our software.



Some cool features which you can personalize on your Optopus sunglasses:



After you have finished your design we deliver your completely unique sunglasses to your door.


The Sunglasses


Our sunglasses are made by 3D printing technology in awesome quality

We are using Selective Laser Sintering (SLS) industrial 3D printing technology for the production of our sunglasses. This technology allows us to materialize even your most extreme creations in a high-quality and cost effective way. If you compare the quality of our products with ordinary high-class sunglasses you won't realize the difference neither with your eyes or your hands.

Our special plastic material (Polyamide 12) makes our sunglasses extremely lightweight and durable, so you can wear them in almost every moment of your life.

They also come with UV protected lenses so you don't need to worry about the sunlight.


Some kickass features:

  • Unbreakable frame and temples
  • Lightweight yet strong structure
  • 100% full-spectrum UV protected lenses



Our current status


Couple of months ago, when we started to work on this project we didn't expect so much support from everyone. This kept us going forward with incredible momentum, even when we faced many challenges regarding the manufacturing of our prototypes. It was an incredibly exciting moment to hold them after we spent so much care and long hours in front of the computer designing them. We want to share the same passion and excitement with everyone who would like to wear their own unique creations.


Currently, we are developing the customizer software, which is now under testing and will be publicly released very soon. Of course, development continues ever after, so we need a lot of feedback on how should we enhance our software and improve its functionality.


Why we need you


We've come to Indiegogo because we want to show our project to the world. We need your feedback and support to get our product to the market faster. We would like to equip our designing platform with new functions (more customizable styles, perfect-fit technology) and develop our virtual try-on software and the mobile version of our platform but only your help will get us there. We have gathered the manufacturing know-how for producing our sunglasses in the best quality and we are also negotiating with manufacturing partners, but with your support this process will be much faster. We are sure that together we can make it!

Perks


 


Team


Béla Kummer - Co-founder, Business
Béla is a passionate entrepreneur who always makes his dreams reality. He has experience in  developing companies that working in the 3D printing industry. He co-founded my3Dreams where he worked in the B2B 3D printing market.

Richárd Nagy - Co-founder, Engineering

Richárd is a 3D printing expert who is always on the lookout for interesting new technologies. He gathered important experience by managing a motorcycle racing team at his university. He is enthusiastic about the geeky side of things.


Balázs Slezák - Co-founder, Operations

Balázs is a business informatics professional with years of project management experience. Great at creating order out of the chaos and connecting the dots. Big fan of experimentation and trying new approaches.


Daniel Asztalos - Software development

Daniel is a talented software developer who somehow always finds a solution for technological challenges. Has mastered server-client programming in a company providing security systems. 


György Surek - 3D designer

György is an industrial product design engineer with a solid base of graphic design. He has great experience in 3D modeling. He gets inspired by sci-fi novels.  


Adam Asztalos - Designer

Adam is a young and creative graphic designer. His fresh and revolutionary ideas make his works recognizable. He has great talent to find out the taste of the target market.



Risks & Challenges

Software

Even though we planned all the aspects of the software development carefully, difficulties can and will arise. This might cause delays in delivering new software features. But we have experience in dealing with these problems so we know what we have to do in such cases.

Manufacturing

Problems might arise with suppliers in some aspects that can cause delay in the production process. But we will avoid these by negotiating with multiple suppliers and selecting the most reliable ones for mass production.


What's next?


December
Promote the campaign and get our project funded!
January
Start the development of the virtual try-on software and negotiation with the potential lens and hinge suppliers.
February
Test the suppliers' products and finalize the negotiations. Start the development of the perfect fit solution and the mobile platform.
March
Pilot production, final testing before mass production.
April
Production ongoing, begin order fulfillment for the earliest birds. Finalize the development of virtual try-on software and perfect fit solution.
May
Shipping first batch.
June
Shipping another batch and finalize the mobile version of our platform.


FAQ


What will I actually get when I buy sunglasses as a perk now?
When you buy Optopus sunglasses now as a perk, you will get a code which you will be able to use for paying after you designed your sunglasses with our platform. You will be also among the firsts who will get noticed when our final version of our designer software is ready to use.

When will the final version of the online designer platform be ready to use?

We are working hard to finalize our platform and we expect it will be ready to use for creating and ordering designs in late January 2015. Until this time we always keep refreshing our trial platform and post the developments here as an update.
You can try our platform here: http://optop.us/design/

What will be the final price of the sunglasses which I can create?

The final price of our products will be between $99 and $149 depending on the basic styles you choose and the features you want to customize.

How can I know that the design I've created will look good on me?

1. All our basic models which you can modify will represent one style so you can choose the one that fits you best and after everything depends on your taste.

2. After you finished your design you will get a photo-realistic render (picture) of it so you can check how your sunglasses will look like in the real world.

3. We are working hard to finalize the development of our virtual try-on software so if it's ready you will be able to check your designs on your face real-time.


Our system is powered by

Pilot production, final testing before mass production.
April
Production ongoing, begin order fulfillment for the earliest birds. Finalize the development of virtual try-on software and perfect fit solution.
May
Shipping first batch.
June
Shipping another batch and finalize the mobile version of our platform.



FAQ


What will I actually get when I buy sunglasses as a perk now?
When you buy Optopus sunglasses now as a perk, you will get a code which you will be able to use for paying after you designed your sunglasses with our platform. You will be also among the firsts who will get noticed when our final version of our designer software is ready to use.

When will the final version of the online designer platform be ready to use?We are working hard to finalize our platform and we expect it will be ready to use for creating and ordering designs in late January 2015. Until this time we always keep refreshing our trial platform and post the developments here as an update. You can try our platform here: http://optop.us/design/


What will be the final price of the sunglasses which I can create?
The final price of our products will be between $99 and $149 depending on the basic styles you choose and the features you want to customize.

How can I know that the design I've created will look good on me?
1. All our basic models which you can modify will represent one style so you can choose the one that fits you best and after everything depends on your taste.
2. After you finished your design you will get a photo-realistic render (picture) of it so you can check how your sunglasses will look like in the real world.3. We are working hard to finalize the development of our virtual try-on software so if it's ready you will be able to check your designs on your face real-time.


Our system is powered by

story:
Our Philosophy                                                 

ZHBoston is the new design firm in town. We believe in creating beautiful products that you will use every single day. We strive for simplicity, but we use the most premium, locally-sourced materials. By relying on woods, leathers, and metals, we can ensure that every product - even when mass produced - is unique. 

For each product we design, we partner with a local manufacturer. All our products are made with care by American workers in American factories. Our supply chain is fully transparent. ZHBoston isn't one of those companies that sends our designs over to China - we are among the growing few that seek to revive American craftsmanship and ingenuity. We are so thrilled to have you with us on this journey. 


Meet WatchCradle

There's a bunch of new Apple Watch charging docks out there. For the most part, they all look the same. They elevate your Watch in midair; they place it on a pedestal. But that's not what your Apple Watch needs - it needs to rest and recharge (pun fully intended). That's how we came up with a better idea. Don't elevate your Apple Watch - cradle it!

WatchCradle takes up a small footprint on your desk, table, or nightstand. When your Watch isn't charging it looks elegant and unobtrusive. Place your Apple Watch around WatchCradle's center post, however, and it is abundantly clear that the two just belong together.

Real, locally sourced wood means each piece is unique. Supple leather from a local tannery cushions your Apple Watch. And each Cradle is hand-finished by an expert woodworker.

Everything about WatchCradle exudes minimalistic luxury. It's okay to indulge.

WatchCradle will come in different wood types. You will be able to vote on your favorites and select after the campaign ends!


We love pebbled leather.


How it Works

WatchCradle's design is so simple. First, feed the usb cable through the front hole and then insert the charger. The charger will either be held in with magnets, a residue-free adhesive pad, or a simple press fit (we are in the process of testing each method). Then, run the cable through the slot in the rear, and coil any slack inside the base. Finally, cover the base with the rubber bottom. It's that easy! To charge your Apple Watch, just place it on the WatchCradle as shown.

Prototypes

The below photos show our first round prototypes. The final version will have a slightly larger base with a wood rim surrounding the leather, just like in our rendered images throughout this page. The final version will also be much much glossier!



Lots of prototypes with a lovely Boston view!


Meet Our Manufacturer: Clean Air Woodworks


For this project we are working with Matt from Clean Air Woodworks, a small design-build-manufacturing firm located in the Hudson Valley of New York. CAW focuses on modern designs, zero-VOC (volatile organic compounds) finishes, reclaimed and sustainable wood, and wooden creations of all types. Matt has been a huge help with every aspect of this project. CAW makes everything from tables to cutting boards!




We find our manufacturers on Maker's Row.                                        

Maker's Row is a unique platform connecting American manufacturers with product-based businesses, making factory sourcing surprisingly easy and enjoyable.


About ZHBoston

Zach Herbert started ZHBoston in 2015 as CEO, with the WatchCradle as its first product. Zach studied mechanical engineering at Boston University and will attend Harvard Business School next year. He has previously both designed products and worked with local and foreign manufacturers. Zach looks forward to shipping out many many WatchCradles and growing the ZHBoston team!


The Project Plan

We've already completed the first round of prototypes - these are pictured throughout this page! Below is our plan for the rest of the project:
  • April 30: Indiegogo project launches!
  • June 1: Indiegogo project successfully ends.
  • Late May/Early June: Further prototyping, prep for manufacturing.
  • June: Manufacture and ship the first batches of WatchCradles, starting in mid-June and probably extending until mid-July (depending on how many backers we have!).
  • July: Finish shipping all units and set up online store.

Fund us early! 

The sooner we pass our goal, the sooner we will start preparing advanced prototypes and purchasing tooling for manufacturing. Also, we will ship out WatchCradles in the order in which contributions are received, so be sure to back us right away! You might just get yours in mid-June.

Risks

There are risks involved with funding any Indiegogo project, but we are confident we've done our best to minimize these risks. We've already made prototypes, lined up a manufacturer, and received a commitment that the manufacturer can produce a large number of WatchCradles. Moreover, our manufacturer has been involved in every step of the design process, so we anticipate no issues with manufacturing.


The Perks

We offer a few perks - purchase a microfiber cloth with our logo, purchase one WatchCradle (early bird in limited quantities), purchase two WatchCradles, or - if you are feeling generous - purchase 10 WatchCradles! We wanted to keep these perks simple, but if you are looking for an option that is not available, let us know! We are happy to add other perks if there is demand. 

Please note that you will be able to select wood type, leather color, and cradle size after the funding period ends.


FAQs

  • Why is a wood cradle a better idea?
    Great question! Think about it this way - why would you want to use a large chunk of metal or wood, around 5-6 inches tall, just to charge your small Apple Watch? Why would you want to let its band dangle in mid-air? Why would you want to rely on some sort of adhesive pad to stop the top-heavy pedestal from falling over every time you brush up against it? That's the approach most of our competition has already taken, and we just can't accept it. Moreover, wood cannot scratch metal, no matter how hard you try! We dare you to try  to place your fancy Apple Watch on a metal charging stand without scratching it.
  • Why would I want to charge my Apple Watch on its side?
    We've tested the Apple Watch since launch day, and we've learned something that our competition has not - you're not going to want to use your Apple Watch while it's charging. Your Watch is meant to be worn, and there isn't much you can do with it when it's not on your wrist. We suggest placing your WatchCradle on your nightstand, and charging your Watch while you sleep.
  • How do I know my Apple Watch will fit in WatchCradle?
    We already possess a 42mm Apple Watch Sport, which includes both small and large band sizes. The photos and renderings throughout this project are with this Watch. Once we pass our goal, we will order the 38mm Watch as well as a bunch of other bands from Apple, and will ensure that our final prototypes will work all bands. This may mean making the WatchCradle in two different sizes. The main challenge is bands that are not adjustable on the fly (i.e. Modern Buckle and Link Bracelet). We may add a leather strip around the center post in order to accommodate these bands. 
  • What colors of leather will you offer?
    We plan on offering a range of colors. We are 100% certain we will offer black and brown, and we are experimenting with other colors, like white and navy. As a backer, you'll be able to vote for the colors we'll offer, and then select the color of your choice after the funding period ends. Leather will come from Pergamena Leather in Montgomery, NY.
  • What types of wood will you offer?
    We created most of the prototypes from NY Black Walnut. This wood comes from upstate NY. We are still deciding what other options to offer - let us know if you have requests! It is very easy for us to use other wood types. In the future, we may also offer special editions. 
  • Will I really receive my WatchCradle in July?
    That's what we are planning! If we reach our goal in the first week or two, we will immediately get started on advanced prototypes and planning for manufacturing. The earlier we meet our goal, the earlier we ship! The first batches may go out as early as mid-June. Also, we will ship WatchCradles out in the order in which contributions are received, so be sure to back us right away!
  • How did you manage to obtain a real Apple Watch on the 24th?
    Zach stayed up past 3am to preorder. It was well worth it. He will always go to great lengths to ensure this project's success! 


Thank you so much for your support!

story:
Our Story

Mathieu Brissette Forte is an aspiring social entrepreneur. The idea for a second hand clothing store came to him when he asked himself where could he get rid of his excess clothing that were barely used? Surely they were worth something.

After a few trips to the big apple Mathieu found precisely what he had been looking for: a place to get cash for his clothes. He wanted to bring the idea home.

The idea was tested by putting up a few signs on McGill College and in the McGill ghetto. Since, people have been calling daily to sell their clothes and Chez-Vous, as a business, was pursued.

Our Mission

Chez-Vous wants to provide an astouding service to buy, sell and trade new and gently used clothing.

Re-using and recycling is the key to our heart.

*Click for a preview of our collection*

What We Need & What You Get

Your funds will be transformed into clothes - with the addition of other bonuses.

It's that plain and simple!

In exchange we get our project funded and we get to open shop!

- If you would like to distrubute your funding to multiple people, your kids, your spouse or as a gift certificate please let us know. Note: For the time being Chez-Vous will only be targeting adults and teenagers.

- If the project is funded we will be looking to hire 3-4 part-time and full time positions. There will be an update for this later on. Keep a look out!

*This project will only launch if the full amount is reached. You will not be charged otherwise*

*To keep things flowing during the first two months should the store get funded there will be a daily limit of $150 for IndieGoGo funders. You will always be able to return the next day when there will be fresh inventory!*

The Impact

There is currently no market for people to sell or trade their clothes in Montreal.

- Chez-Vous will provide a place for Montrealers to get a fair buck for their clothes (33% resell price CASH or 50% for store credit).

- This service is re-using and recycling precious materials that would otherwise get thrown out, lost in Village des Valeurs or pile up in your closet or parent's attic.

- Rather than purchase brand new clothes you can get gently used (if not brand new) items at a fraction of the price. Try not to think about the energy it costs to create the materials, to put them together, package them and ship them. YIKES!

- We are creating jobs! Boosting the economy!

How Your Money Will Be Spent

The money is being leveraged as a bank guarantee to the landlord we want to work with. It's what is holding us back from moving in.

The honest truth: We hope we never have to spend this money.

The Location

Should the project be funded Chez-Vous will be located at 269 Sherbrooke Ouest.

*We plan on opening October 2012.*

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this page with your friends and family.

Share it on facebook, twitter and your blog.

Tell someone who LOVES clothes.

story:
This page is for the Giant Australian Cuttlefish design. If you would like to order one of the other four limited edition designs, click the links at the bottom of this page.

 

Illustrator Jo Brown produces incredible artworks that showcase animal life from around the world. We have been following Jo's artworks since we came across her unique style of drawings several years ago. Recently we reached out to Jo with the idea of producing new artworks based on underwater photographs of our favourite ocean animals from around the world.

Jo has created some incredible concept pieces that we are hoping to print in a limited production of 25 t-shirts through this campaign. If successful, we will continue to work with Jo to think up and release new designs.

Lets share Jo's artwork with the world and show people our passion for marine life whilst we're at it. Art isn't only to be admired on gallery walls - why not wear beautiful art on a hand printed, eco-friendly T-shirt!

How are the shirts eco friendly?

We've found a supplier of organic cotton T-shirts (free of plastic micro-fibres) produced using responsible social practices and renewable energy. The 'Earth Positive' T-shirts will be hand screen printed in Bristol, UK and shipped directly to you using as little plastic packaging as we can. 

How do I make sure that  I get the right size and colour?

At the end of the campaign we'll send you a survey asking for which cut (M/F), colour and size combination you would like. We will then send them out.

Why run an Indiegogo campaign for T-shirts - why not do a bulk print and sell them individually?

Consumer clothing produces an incredible amount of waste, some of which ends up in our oceans. The global average consumption of textiles is around 13kg per person, per year. Along the production chain there can be negative effects from agricultural practices, emissions of chemicals and plastic micro-fibres, and poor working conditions in factories. It sounds unthinkable, but a large portion of the budget fashion produced every year never ends up being worn before it enters landfill.

10,000 discarded clothing items in Hugh’s War on Waste;

Derick Melander's artwork Tollens (2017).

We want to ensure that any T-shirts we get made have as positive an impact on the people and environment as possible. For this to work, we need them all to go on to a happy new owner, with none left unworn or discarded as 'fashion waste'. When they can be worn no longer we hope they can be donated, mended, up-cycled, or composted rather than discarded into landfill. This campaign can help us make this happen - and if you've read this and become a supporter, it's already working!

What if you get more than 25 T-shirt orders? Will you run out?

No, we won't run out - we won't take your money or print the shirts if we don't get 50 orders, but we would love to print more. If you're a supporter and we make or exceed our goal, you won't miss out on a shirt.

Where will our money go?

Most of the funding will go towards actually purchasing and printing the T-shirts, since this is a minimum run. About 30% of each shirt sale will go towards collaborating on the next set of commissioned artworks with Jo Brown.

If we exceed our initial goal of funding 25 shirts, the cost of printing begins to decrease. If we get more than 25 orders, we'll donate 2.5% of the proceeds to Oceana, a charity which campaigns for global Ocean Conservation at a community level. If we pass 100 shirts we will increase this to 5%; at 150 shirts, 7.5%; for 200 shirts, 10%, and so on to a maximum of 20% of the overall funding.

The shirts look awesome, I want to support the campaign, what size should I order?

Here's the sizing guide direct from the t-shirt supplier. We'll hopefully get some samples soon, so we can give you a guide against real people. Please note that due to the small print run and screen-printing method, the size of the printed artwork will not scale to the size of the shirt.

 

To view the octopus t-shirt campaign click here

To view the leafy seadragon t-shirt campaign click here

To view the humpback whale t-shirt campaign click here

To view the mantis shrimp t-shirt campaign click here

story:
Why You Should Never Ever Keep a Fat Wallet in Your Back Pocket ！

Ultra-thin design makes you hardly feel it is there, and also meet all challenges of your day, such as shopping, business, travel and all other outdoor activities.

Lining material: RFID blocking, Anti-demagnetization

A perfect front/back pocket fit. Holds up to 7 cards on both side, plus a cash compartment between.

                                                     ② Cash compartment  ①③④⑤ Card slots

A very sleek and minimal design that will last through the ages. 4 cards slots, 1 bill compartment. 

A cool magnet design will prevent your wallet from dropping from your pocket anytime and anywhere.

Let's keep slim. Holds up to 4cards on both sides, plus cash compartment inside

 

Secret Pocket is perfect for your coins, bills, receipt and other privacy items.

A perfect choice for your travel activities. Organizer wallet that holdds up to 4 cards , one secret pocket, plus bills compartment.

Secret pocket designed without zipper is easier to access coins or other privacy items.

Speifications

Handmade

Premium WAX PAPER Leather is a kind of leather craft, which needs to be separated from the ordinary leather craft in the waterworks process. The main difference is the tanning stage. The common leather is mainly made of chrome tanning, vegetable tannins, and aldehydes. The oil wax is made of oil, and the leather is dyed with tanning. The leather is soft, elastic and has great tension.

Hand-made, well-designed. The WAX PAPER is a special skin effect formed by grinding, oiling, and waxing the first layer of leather. It is a fashion leather craft with antique artistic effects, and is also the preferred leather material for major world brands. Due to its technical characteristics, oil wax skin surface is easily left scratches, and disappears when the shoe cloth or shoe wax is repeatedly applied along the grain direction. 

Unique. On the one hand, this wallet shines with retro style, hand-crafted retro look and unforgettable elegance. The oil wax has strong water absorption and oil absorption, and it sticks to the part after the water and oil, and the skin color becomes deeper. In fact, these characteristics of oil wax skin, giving it a feeling of nostalgia and vicissitudes, is the main reason for its popularity.

                             Meet Your Day

                                      Have SK Wallet, Have Wealth & Health Guard

 

Who We Are?

Our position is to bring best products to consumers all over the world through the Internet, and to persevere in this path. We specialize in researching, developing and selling high quality new products. We have more than 20 professional product developers from across China and Hong Kong. From product development to design to marketing and service, they take on important aspects of the company. We have a history of more than 10 years in the field of electronics, which have an important position in the consumer market. We have established long-term and stable cooperative relations with many retailers and agents. With strength, credit and quality guarantee, we have won the trust of our customers. We will continue to provide more and best products in terms of operational fluency and quality.

Timeline

2018.6  Launch on Indiegogo

2018.8  Mass production

2018.9  Packing and delivery

Risk & Challenge

Taking prototypes to mass production involves sophisticated logistics and relationships with suppliers. To minimize these risks, we will try our best to stick to the original plan, but may also rely on your generosity of patience. If there is any potential delay, we will inform you immediately to ensure your wallet will arrive as soon as possible. Thanks so much!

FAQ

1. Which colors are availble?

Colors : black, brown

2.How much does shipping cost ?

We offer free shipping to United States.

story:
Short Summary

Spread the messages that help promote much needed conversations regarding veganism, animal cruelty and animal welfare. With a Calico Dragon bag you can start the process without saying a word!

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for a little support to get this going! With your purchase, know you are helping animals both directly with our financial contributions and as a result of spreading these messages.

The Impact

We have been supporting animal charities for almost a decade. With your help we can help even more and you can get a nice item for less than $20. Great stocking stuffer idea!!

Risks & Challenges

No risks, zero challenges, these are currently in production and will arrive in time for the holidays.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can donate directly at www.sanwild.org

story:
Antimicrobial CVK Mask

Made of CVK Alloy, which has been drawn into very thin wires and woven into a fine, comfortable mesh.  The alloy has been scientifically proven to kill microbes.  Born out of medical research into antimicrobial metals for making surgical instruments, this alloy has been adapted for everyday use.

How does it work?

The oligodynamic effect is responsible for the antimicrobial properties of CVK Alloy. It is an inherent property of the alloy, killing all sorts of microbes by rapidly transferring ions through their membranes. The ion transfer “shreds” the membranes, killing microbes. As long as you keep the surface clean from grime, oil, and other materials that prevent the microbes from touching it, the effect is permanent.

 

How long will it last?

The CVK Mask is will keep its bright appearance.  The alloy it is made from is corrosion-resistant and very durable.  The technology was adapted from an application for making surgical instruments that need to be autoclaved thousands of times in their lifecycle.  It can go into your washing machine and your dryer without damaging it or reducing the antimicrobial effect.  As long as you keep the surfaces clean, the antimicrobial effect is permanent.  

 

Is it comfortable?

The wires are so fine as to be almost like cloth.  The mesh is light and breathable.

 

The Research

We were initially looking for alloys and coatings with antimicrobial properties to use on surgical instruments.  The CVK alloy inactivates a broad range of microbes.  

 

The Future

The virucidal effect of the CVK alloy has been scientifically proven at a reputable research laboratory.  Your backing will help us to conduct further research into understanding how viruses are affected by the alloy.
 

Disclaimer:

There is no evidence to show that wearing a mask made of antimicrobial materials will in any way reduce disease transmission, prevent a person from getting ill, or cure any disease.  This product does not diagnose, cure, treat, or prevent an illness or condition.

story:
Héron is an emerging luxury watch brand based in Montreal. It strives to bring quality timepieces adding its own touch to bring sempiternal classics at competitive prices.

The Sturgeon model is the first of many to come that Maison Héron is proposing. Inspired by the Sturgeon-class Submarines, the Sturgeon watch lures attention thanks to its elegance and its robust silhouette. Being Swiss Made, it is not only sophisticated on the outside but also inside, thanks to the skilled Swiss craftsmanship involved in its fabrication. Automatic watches are the best in the business and Sturgeon brings no less than the cream of the crop: the Swiss Ronda Mecano, mechanical movement.

The Sturgeon watch is the fruit of an extensive amount of work and collaboration with our manufacturer from the design of the watch to developing the first prototype. As mentioned before, it was inspired by the Sturgeon Submarines; the infamous nuclear-powered submarines that were used by the Navy since the 60s. Their quality, precision and vigor were what made them great and the Sturgeon watch is no different.

 

The Sturgeon was designed with one goal in mind. It needed to be dressy enough to go with a suit but also sturdy looking to convey the empowering feeling provided by a tool watch.

 Sturgeon also needed a distinctive feature to make it unique despite its timeless design. The thick arrowed arms were conceived to be the model's aesthetic signature all while serving the purely utilitarian purpose of being easy to read underwater.

 We collaborated with a Swiss manufacturer that has more than 15 years of experience in the industry to produce our watch. The quality of the prototype they manufactured for us is an example of their professionalism.

 

Upon receiving the prototype, we inspected thoroughly every detail: the polishing of the case and strap, the ceramic bezel brightness and feel, the engraving of the logo on the dial, movement and crown to finally verifying every dimensions. We were very pleased with the prototype and opted to move on and use it as our model.

 

 

 

“SwissMade” engraving is synonym with excellence and the highest quality of craftsmanship. A timepiece who has the honour to showcase this writing is without a doubt reliable, highly durable and polished to the smallest details.

STURGEON - A MECHANICAL POWERHOUSE

 

The Sturgeon watch is the result of ultimate luxury paired with unmatched quality. We spared no expenses, our goal was to create a powerhouse of specs and we are extremely satisfied with the outcome.

Specifications like 500M-1640FT, Helium Release Valve, 120-minute click Ceramic Bezel are only found on models that range between 5000$ - 10,000$. 

 CASE: Ø44 mm

 MEASURES: Lug width 22mm, lug to lug 53mm, thickness 13mm

 MOVEMENT: Swiss Made Ronda Mecano

 CRYSTAL: Sapphire Glass

 HANDS/INDEXES: Snowflakes hands

 LUME: Swiss Super-LumiNova

 BEZEL: Ceramic unidirectional 120-minute graduated bezel

 WATER RESISTANCE: 500M - 1640FT

 HELIUM RELEASE VALVE 

 CASE & BRACELET: Marine grade Stainless Steel

 CROWN: Screw Down Crown


The Sturgeon is powered by a decorated RONDA Mecano R150 movement, which has been praised since it's unveiling at Baselworld. As a matter of fact, it's being used exclusively with a manufacturer that has a partnership with Ronda. It's a mechanical luxury movement with bidirectional automatic winding with ball bearing, date-complication and a 40 hours power reserve.

Featuring 25 jewels, this calibre allows us to guarantee an unparalleled level of performance.

Swiss movement manufacturer Ronda has been developing astonishing calibers for over 70 years now, placing itself next to the top and most recognized Swiss manufactures. As one of the world's largest manufacturers of mechanical and precision electric quartz watch movement, fundamental values such as precision, reliability and manual craftsmanship are parts of Ronda's core values.

Inspired by the Navy’s nuclear submarine, the Sturgeon watch is made of 316L Stainless Steel due to unique resistance properties and popularity among high-end watches. In fact, it is also used in nuclear reprocessing and marine use, hence its nickname as the Marine Grade stainless steel. It was therefore only logical to use this material for both the watch case and the bracelet.

The clasp is also made of Marine Grade stainless steel and has a smooth yet solid close. It also has three micro-adjustments for a quick change and a perfect fit on your wrist. 

Swiss Super-LumiNova® Photoluminescent Pigments is the reference for Swiss-made lumens. We decided to apply pigment C1 to every single timepiece. 

For the STURGEON watch, we had no other choice but to go with the strongest and most reliable glass, Sapphire Glass. This crystal goes through extreme pressures and long manufacturing processes, in fact, it's made of crystallizing pure aluminum oxide at very high temperatures of 4000°F in order to be moulded into clear disks. The last stage consists of precise cuts to make them suitable for our watch case. Sapphire glass is used in high-end watches thanks this it's extreme properties, hence being virtually scratchproof. Only diamonds can scratch them.

The ceramic bezel was first widely introduced by Rolex in 2007 for the GMT-Master II and was later added to their most popular models, such as Daytona, Submariner, DeepSea, Sea-Dweller and many more. Rolex didn't only choose ceramic bezels for their extreme durability and near indestructible features, but also for their unique shine that will make your watch stand out.

 

Even though ceramic bezel is more expensive than regular steel bezel, we had no other option but the have the utmost best for the Sturgeon watch, hence an astonishing unidirectional 120 minute-grade ceramic bezel that matches the face of the watch.

Since Rolex introduced it in the 60s, the Helium valve has been standard practice in high-end diver watches. When divers stay for long periods of time underwater, the change in pressure when they come back to the surface can damage the watch. The Helium valve protects the watch from that sudden change of atmosphere.

Maison Héron is launching a new ambitious project that boasts only top of the line materials inside out. Whether it’s the exclusive Mecano movement, the stunning ceramic bezel or the unique craftsmanship to bring a helium release valve, the Sturgeon watch is a beast that won’t go unnoticed.

 

In order to bring this behemoth to life, we need your help and ask for your support, so it could become the all-time classic that it was supposed to be.

 

Our watches come with a 2-year international warranty. In case of a defect during this time period, your watch will be repaired free of charge. Thanks to our manufacturer, we have access to a global network of repair centers. If repairing a watch is not possible in a certain country, we will repair the watch at our manufacturer in Switzerland.

 Pledge now and enjoy stretch goals exclusively created for Kickstarter backers.



 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Shipping does not necessarily include customs and taxes applicable for all countries (VAT). Rates are based on a normal transaction via a logistics service such as DHL/FedEx/UPS and applicable fees may apply in some countries.

 

Each watch is subject to a quality control testing regime for a full 48 hours prior to sign off. We are confident that we will meet our estimated shipping dates. Our backers will be in the loop as we communicate updates at every stage of the process. COVID-19 could impact production and/or shipping dates.

 

Our manufacturers stand ready to start production as soon as we meet our Kickstarter funding goal.

story:
. Help us spread the word - We need your support

  • Get one set of extra straps for every 3 watches referred.
  • Get 1 free watch for every 10 watches referred
  • Get  10$ off  by posting about our campaign on your Google plus, facebook and twitter.
  • Get 30$ off by posting about our campaign on your Facebook page that has a minimum of 200 friends/followers  or 1000 followers in Twitter or 200 google plus circle
  • Bloggers special - get 50$ off by posting article about our campaign in your blog or other websites (Tech related , should be followed by at least 500 persons / 1000 visitors per day to the particular article page). 

Please  use your own referral  link below our video.  

Ever imagined you could be wearing an LCD smart watch, E-paper smart watch, and a Power bank all strapped to your hand as one wearable device? 

It’s now time to get introduced to the world's first smart watch that has dual display, including TFT and E-paper. Another convenient thing? It has a power bank to charge  cell phones. 

Key features

Dual Display

Oru Watch has two type of displays, 

  •  Full colour high resolution TFT touch screen
  •  Low energy, always ON E-paper display

Power bank:

Oru watch has in-built power bank, that charges any cell phones, gives 2 to 6 hours of Extra talktime. 

Well designed universal charging cable charges any cellphone, No matter what phone you use!

Other Smart Features:

  • 5ATM water resistance, meaning you can even swim with it.

  • Has a vibrating alert with caller ID. when you receive any calls, just shake your hands to reject the call.
  • Can compose sms messages or emails, and includes skpe calling
  • Various notifications: including email and sms, even from apps including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, whatsapp,QQ, etc.

  • When programmed, gives off alarm, reminders, calendar, even weather and flight alerts

  • Listen and control music from your phone and  built-in music player.

  • Is also beneficial to your health: can track Heart rate and sleep with the health monitor. 

  • If you want to go out and exercise, it even has a golf range tracker, a cycle speedometer, and an activity monitor for any sport (swimming, running, etc.)

  • With  anti-theft features integrated into the watch, you will NEVER loose your mobile again.

This well- crafted Oru watch is truly one of a kind. Made of sleek elegant stainless steel as the main body, followed by a smooth silicone rubber strap for easy movement. The watch acts as an elegant piece of jewelry more than a smart watch.

 

Choose from a wide range of colour options.

 

Tech specifics

  • Stainless steel dial(316L) with silicone strap.
  • Gorilla® Glass 3
  • The Dial size measurements:  44x42x11mm
  • Water resistance - 5 ATM
  • 3 Axis accelerometer
  • 1.54 inch TFT touch, 240x240 pixels
  • E-paper - 144 x 168 pixel display (black and white) Non-Touch screen
  • OS - Android Kit kat
  • Internal storage - 4GB
  • 800 MHz Single core processor with 512 MB RAM
  • Bluetooth -  Bluetooth 2.1+ EDR and 4.0 BLE
  • NFC

Battery

  • 300 mah battery inside the watch dial and 400 mah battery in the silicone strap.
  • With the E-paper display, the battery lasts 30+ days, and TFT as long as 5+ days.

Compatibility

iOS and Android devices  runs on the Bluetooth system 2.1+ EDR and 4.0

Available colors

Red, white, black, Green, Pink, Gold (special edition)

 

Stretch goals

Kindly help us to unlock all stretch goals, so that you can avail more special benefits.

Development

Frequenty Asked Questions

How can we switch between E-paper and TFT?

You pull the watch crown to release the dial lock and rotate the dial to desired screen to lock it again.

Can both screens be ON at the same time?

No, once you rotate the screen and lock it, the screen on the top side will be switched on and screen on  back will go off automatically.

When can I choose the option of the color of the watch?

After your payment, we will send you a confirmation email within 24 hours along with a secret code to input into the webpage to register, choose the color and shipping details.

Will Oru Watch work with Blackberry or Windows Phones?  

No, at the present it only supports most iOS and Andorid devices, but we are planning to develop our own OS to support Blackberry and windows phones.

What are the languages it supports?

At present we are planning for English,Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, German, French, Italian, Spanish and Arabic.  in the future we will work on more languages.

Specifics about warranty?

You will have 1 year full replacement warranty. Shipping will be paid for by the buyer. In the future, we will try to establish service centers in all over the world.

Is open source SDK available for developers?

Yes, we will release open source SDK.

Is there any referral programs to support Oru Watch?

Yes, please see the referral program description here.

 

.... We will add more Q&A as more supporters contact us.

If any questions, please leave us an E-mail to support@oruwatch.com
story_txt:
. Help  us spread the word - We need your support


Get one set of extra straps for every 3 watches referred.



Get 1 free watch for every 10 watches referred




Get  10$ off  by posting about our campaign on your Google plus, facebook and twitter.



Get 30$ off by posting about our campaign on your Facebook page that has a minimum of 200 friends/followers  or 1000 followers in Twitter or 200 google plus circle



Bloggers special - get 50$ off by posting article about our campaign in your blog or other websites (Tech related , should be followed by at least 500 persons / 1000 visitors per day to the particular article page). 


Please  use your own referral  link below our video.  

Ever imagined you could be wearing an LCD smart watch, E-paper smart watch, and a Power bank all strapped to your hand as one wearable device? 

It’s now time to get introduced to the world's first smart watch that has dual display, including TFT and E-paper. Another convenient thing? It has a power bank to charge  cell phones. 


Key features

Dual DisplayOru Watch has two type of displays, 


 Full colour high resolution TFT touch screen


 Low energy, always ON E-paper display


Power bank:

Oru watch has in-built power bank, that charges any cell phones, gives 2 to 6 hours of Extra talktime. 

Well designed universal charging cable charges any cellphone, No matter what phone you use!

Other Smart Features:


5ATM water resistance, meaning you can even swim with it.





Has a vibrating alert with caller ID. when you receive any calls, just shake your hands to reject the call.


Can compose sms messages or emails, and includes skpe calling


Various notifications: including email and sms, even from apps including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, whatsapp,QQ, etc.





When programmed, gives off alarm, reminders, calendar, even weather and flight alerts





Listen and control music from your phone and  built-in music player.





Is also beneficial to your health: can track Heart rate and sleep with the health monitor. 





If you want to go out and exercise, it even has a golf range tracker, a cycle speedometer, and an activity monitor for any sport (swimming, running, etc.)





With  anti-theft features integrated into the watch, you will NEVER loose your mobile again.


This well- crafted Oru watch is truly one of a kind. Made of sleek elegant stainless steel as the main body, followed by a smooth silicone rubber strap for easy movement. The watch acts as an elegant piece of jewelry more than a smart watch.



			 

Choose from a wide range of colour options.



			 

Tech specifics


Stainless steel dial(316L) with silicone strap.


Gorilla® Glass 3


The Dial size measurements:  44x42x11mm


Water resistance - 5 ATM


3 Axis accelerometer


1.54 inch TFT touch, 240x240 pixels


E-paper - 144 x 168 pixel display (black and white) Non-Touch screen


OS - Android Kit kat


Internal storage - 4GB


800 MHz Single core processor with 512 MB RAM


Bluetooth -  Bluetooth 2.1+ EDR and 4.0 BLE


NFC


Battery


300 mah battery inside the watch dial and 400 mah battery in the silicone strap.


With the E-paper display, the battery lasts 30+ days, and TFT as long as 5+ days.


Compatibility

iOS and Android devices  runs on the Bluetooth system 2.1+ EDR and 4.0

Available colors

Red, white, black, Green, Pink, Gold (special edition)

			 

Stretch goals

			Kindly help us to unlock all stretch goals, so that you can avail more special benefits.



Development



Frequenty Asked Questions

How can we switch between E-paper and TFT?

You pull the watch crown to release the dial lock and rotate the dial to desired screen to lock it again.

Can both screens be ON at the same time?

No, once you rotate the screen and lock it, the screen on the top side will be switched on and screen on  back will go off automatically.

When can I choose the option of the color of the watch?

After your payment, we will send you a confirmation email within 24 hours along with a secret code to input into the webpage to register, choose the color and shipping details. 

Will Oru Watch work with Blackberry or Windows Phones?  

No, at the present it only supports most iOS and Andorid devices, but we are planning to develop our own OS to support Blackberry and windows phones.

What are the languages it supports?

			At present we are planning for English,Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, German, French, Italian, Spanish and Arabic.  in the future we will work on more languages.

Specifics about warranty?

You will have 1 year full replacement warranty. Shipping will be paid for by the buyer. In the future, we will try to establish service centers in all over the world.

Is open source SDK available for developers?

Yes, we will release open source SDK.

Is there any referral programs to support Oru Watch?

Yes, please see the referral program description here.

			 

.... We will add more Q&A as more supporters contact us.

If any questions, please leave us an E-mail to support@oruwatch.com

story:
Bitcoin Paper Wallets are recognized as the most secure way to store bitcoins.

However a single mistake during the paper wallet printing process can reveal your private key to a hacker.

The issues range from

  • Malware and keyloggers running on the machine used to generate the wallet.

  • Malware on the actual printer forwarding printed documents to a 3rd party

  • Hacks against the site/software used to generate the wallet.

The solutions to these problems are cumbersome,error prone and expensive.

Any device with an externally accessible port is vulnerable to malware infection. We live in a world where even your smartphone can be hacked by a charger.

Bitfrore solves these issues.

With the push of a single button a paper wallet can be generated with no risk of malware/keyloggers or hacks.

The software and hardware designs are open source and open to peer review.

The hardware can be audited at any time to verify it matches the published software.

The design is microcontroller based,runs without any operating system and has no externally accessible ports. The attack surface is as minimal as possible.

The perfect balance of convenience and security. 

What We Have And What We Need

We have a fully functional prototype.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=noW77GqmNBQ

The corresponding source code is published here https://github.com/bitfrore/bitfrore

This series of blog posts gives more details on the technology behind Bitfrore.

http://blog.bitfrore.com/2013/08/inside-bitfrore-part-1-basic-components.html

Unfortunately bringing a consumer device to market is expensive. There are several legal directives and requirements that have to be fulfilled before an electronic device can be made available to the public e.g.

  • CE Certification

  • Environmental Impact and Waste Management

  • Liability Insurance


Properly fulfilling these requirements unfortunately leads to a high initial startup cost but ultimately protects you the customer from harm or loss. We need sufficient funds to cover these startup costs and to fund an initial production run.

Risks

This is our first project of this nature. There is always the risk off hidden costs that will push the project into being unprofitable. Through months of planning I have hopefully covered all these bases. The campaign is configured with fixed funding to match the break even point for 1 years running costs of the business + a margin for error to absorb the unknown costs. If we can't achieve this break even point then all funds will be returned.

story:
'Low Poly' Lace Tips 

                                                 Designed in NYC, Developed in Berlin

 

Hi, my name is Daniel Bailey and i'm a design geek. I'm also a product/footwear designer, charming grizzly bear & shoe entreprenerd.

The Story

I originally started to work on this project after receiving a pair of Yeezy 2's, and then subsequently losing one of my metal lace-tips after the first wear! I thought the idea of having a screw on/off metal lace-tip was super innovative, but thought it could be brought forward to another level in both function, aesthetics & the level of customization (being able to use them for any pair of shoe laces). 

What i've come up with is a sculptured lace-tip that's a little more art than just a functional aglet, that fastens onto your shoe lace securely. Simply unscrew the screw on the Lace-Tip, slide the Lace-Tip over your shoe lace and then fasten the screw tightly with the custom screw driver to secure the Lace-Tip in place. 

After a lot of sketches and 3D models, the first samples were all 3D printed out of black ABS plastic & gold plated stainless steel to make sure everything would look great & work properly when I moved forward with the moulding process to have them produced.

I also printed the packaging in 3D, though I have decided to make the final packaging (which will be the same design) in thick card so it has a cleaner finish, with my logo embossed into the lid, and a foam lining at the base to secure the tips, screws & screw driver.

The Impact

I'm currently working on producing my first line of Italian Hand-Made casual/fashion shoes, and plan to use the funds from these Lace-Tips to help with the first order.

Design aesthetics, function & production quality are at the forefront of any product I produce and put my name too, these Lace-Tips and shoes being no exception. 

From the packaging, special hidden details & unique upper patterns to top quality materials & manufacturers, every aspect of the lace tips and shoes has been designed & developed by me personally to give you the ultimate end product & overall user experience.

Immediate Goals

Aside from purchasing the moulds and getting everything ready for production, this project is bigger than just these beautiful Lace-Tips! I'm planning on using them to help fund the first order of Italian hand-made MrBailey casual shoes (you can see a sneak peek of me helping in the atelier to make the first samples in the perks below).

Help Spread the Word

Please help let people know about this project.  Repost, retweet, re-whatever is possible, Indiegogo makes it easy with their handy share tools.

Thanks for taking the time to check out my project, if you have any questions please feel free to contact me at - info@MrBailey.co.uk or on Instagram - MrBailey_

Cheers!

The Perks

From the aglet's to the screws, the screw driver to the mini-shoe box packaging, everything has been custom designed by myself to give you the best product that I can.

With each order you'll receive 4 'Low Poly' Lace Tips w/custom screws & screw driver in either gold or gun metal black at the wholesale price. You'll also receive your tips in a custom mini MrBailey shoe box, lined with foam at the base to protect the Lace-Tips and screw driver.

(First 3D Printed Test Samples)

Finished Product Renders

Inspiration 

Initial Concept Sketches

 

 

Thanks for taking the time to check out my project, if you have any questions please feel free to contact me at - info@MrBailey.co.uk

 

Cheers!
