story:
Pet Tech is the first international training center dedicated to CPR, First Aid & Care for dogs and cats.  We have been promoting education and the importance of being trained in pet CPR, first aid & care for over 16 years.  The Pet Parent is getting more involved with the daily decisions of their pets’ care and is in need of information.  They need resources, products and services to help them better care for their pets.

Our Million Internet Petizen Campaign (MIPC) is a movement to reach and educate 1 million pet parents to prevent 1 million Pet ER visits.  Just last year there were over 45,000 calls to poison control due to pets ingesting prescription and over the counter medications. That’s definitely a preventable accident and one that could be drastically reduced with just a little knowledge.  Pet Parents aren’t aware of the many dangers that exist for their four legged family members.

The Million Internet Petizen Campaign will consists of products and services that will help Pet Parents better care for their pets for a lifetime.  It centers around education and the internet but has other tangible components as well.

We are kicking off our MIPC with the launch of our first Indiegog Campaign.  We are calling all pet lovers to help us and support our project.  In doing so, you will be part of an elite group of pet parents or Petizens.  What we like to call the Caring, Conscientious, Responsible and Loving Pet Parent.  We usually don’t need a reason to do something nice for our pets and most of the pet parents that we meet tell us they would do whatever it takes to keep their pet healthy, happy and safe from puppyhood to adulthood.  In most cases they just don’t know how.  That’s where we come in we are going to educate pet parents of the world to understand the health and safety needs of their pets. 

Introducing the 2013 Pet Tech Holiday Bandana complete with on-trend fashion and online training! The bandanas measure 22 inches square, machine washable and silk-screened in full color. The online trainings are accessible using QR codes scanned with your smartphone giving you a quick, easy, convenient and mobile way to stay informed and prepared, on your own schedule. While you and your pet are sporting about town in fashion 2.0.  

A student in one of our trainings shared this story.  She received a nicely wrapped gift box and put it under the tree. Unbeknownst to her it was a gift of cured meats & cheeses from that shop that opens up in your mall every year for the holidays. You know the one. :)  The danger of that present under the tree may be out of sight but not out of scent. Pets can smell and get into food or candy boxes placed under the tree. And that is exactly what happened to this women while she was at work, her dog ate the entire 5 pound box! When she came home she found her sick dog and rushed him to the Pet ER. This incident turned into pancreatitis which is a common Pet ER occurrence during the holidays. This kind of incident can costs several thousands of dollars!  

So our Pet Tech Tip: If you have a pet, don’t just place gifts under the tree without asking if there is any food, candy, or edible items inside.   And now that you know this it is soooooo much less likely that it will happen to your pet. See how quick and easy it can be to learn about your pet's health and safety?   

The first online training videos we are scheduling for the 2013 Pet Tech Holiday Bandana are…  

Holiday Hazards 
From Halloween to Thanksgiving to Christmas there are many dangers you may not be aware of that could harm your pets. Halloween kicks off the holiday danger season with the excessive candy, treats and stress for your pets. We change their den or habitat, putting up all these sparkly and interesting moving decorations. We have a full house with friends and family coming and going and pets can easily get stressed or lost. (Delivered November 15, 2013)

Christmas Tree, Oh Christmas Tree, You Dangerous Christmas Tree 
Numerous dangers from the top of tree to the bottom and all around it. This is a new and improved update of the spiel that I have done on dozens and dozens of radio shows. The Pet Safety Guy goes from the top of the tree to the bottom of the tree highlighting the dangers or risks to our dogs and cats and offers specific Pet Tech Tips to prevent a potentially dangerous situation. (Delivered December 1, 2013)  

Keep your pets safe during the holidays.  From Halloween to Thanksgiving to Christmas and the New Year, your pet’s safety and health could be at risk.  Don’t let the Holidays become an expensive Vet bill. Your pet can be stylish and safe with the 2013 Pet Tech Holiday Training Bandana.  Your pet will look great and be safe from harm all at the same time.  The Pet Tech Holiday Safety Bandana has pertinent information for the pet parent to keep their dogs and cats safe and well.  Included on the bandana are safety tips for the winter holidays as well as actions for survival for a medical emergency.  AND with the purchase of each bandana, you receive online training (Value $29.95) to reinforce health and safety strategies for the holidays. For only $20 you can have peace of mind knowing your pet is the talk of the dog park with it’s stylish attire and safe and well this holiday season.

story:
Setting the pace for innovation, in 2008 Navy Veteran and Pooghe founder Steve Monte saw a need for a true American Made clothing label with undeniable comfort that fitted a person's body better than what was available in the market. Steve went even further on the principles that fashion, and technology can work in unison to create the ideal clothing line that also provided an authentic eco-friendly solution to that natural, yet daily occurrence everyone can identify with - body odor.

A little bit on how we got here:

An athlete doesn't train endlessly to enter the Olympics with the hopes of only getting a bronze metal; they train with perseverance in going into that arena carrying the conviction at winning the gold.  I approached creating the Pooghe clothing brand with the same mindset. My goal was to create from the ground up, an authentic American Made clothing label that was more than just another brand name.  It had to be an elite and versatile label that addressed an issue relatable to almost anyone, and above all; feature a signature softness and comfort that stood above the rest.

I'll admit to all of you reading this, that we certainly had our fair share of trial and errors getting Pooghe to where it is today, which didn't come easy - nor overnight.  In-fact it took all of four-plus years, along with many personal and family sacrifices that definitely put my determination to the extreme test.

With touring numerous manufacturing, knitting and dye companies, eventually, we strategically partnered ourselves with the right facilities and material sourcing groups.  Endless hours were spent researching and testing just about every type of textile technology for our platform; then producing sample run after sample run that clearly gave an intense education and OJT I never would have anticipated.

Additionally, I felt it was crucial to beta-test Pooghe clothing with real-life consumers across America to include men and women from all walks of life between the ages of 18 - 50. After-all, regardless of how good I may think I am at creating really comfortable garment; the true barometer test in "getting it just right" would be in the feedback we would get from actual potential customers who gave all of our samples a decent trial run.

These testing phases turned out to be very extensive and time consuming in making many adjustments to the weight and design of our fabrics; along with multiple silhouette alterations through each stage of our product development.  However, it was an invaluable process that we could ultimately conclude once receiving the communal feedback and visceral response we were aiming for...the "WOW" factor.

Next to offering a clothing label that people can certainly benefit from having; the words Made in the USA is unquestionably one of our "sacred cows" in business practices. We not only hold it very dear to us, but it will ALWAYS be a prideful and cardinal part of the Pooghe identity.  As you can probably guess, being a Navy Veteran, I have incredible enthusiasm as we look forward to in contributing on a much larger scale to the social and economic arenas with an exclusive apparel brand that is authentic, enjoyable to wear and truly Made in America.

The Impact of your contributions:

The impact of your contributions has much to do with bringing Pooghe to fruition. In order for us to offer Pooghe to the public for both retail and wholesale, we now have to do a production run of fabric and manufacturing the silhouettes we created with final cut & sew and finish. Just about all fabric manufactured here in the US that are similar to ours (Jersey knits, French Terry, etc.) is done by using ready-made yarns which almost always have a denier in 20s, 30s, or 40s (thickness).  However, we created our "Signature" fabric which is a an exclusive Supima cotton jersey made from a particular 24/1 denier yarn.  Conventionally, it's unheard of in using that specific yarn weight to make fabric here in America, and I'll tell you why...

When you move to a precise yarn weight/thickness outside of the standard three that everyone typically uses; a knitting mill has to rethread and recalibrating their production machines for that specific yarn weight. Most companies will not want to go through the trouble so they will stick with what's already being made.  Knitting mills are willing to do small yardage runs on their sampling machines of which they charge you dearly for that.  But, when it comes to manufacturing beyond the sampling/prototype phases, the minimum yardage you have to order for a unique yarn weight is very large, and it can range anywhere from 5,000-10,000 yards. To put it into perspective, we have to order all of that fabric before we can even cut & sew one shirt.

Now as I stated earlier we strategically partnered ourselves with the right knitting & manufacturing facilities that are willing to work with us, but we still have to meet their large minimum production guidelines. Our family has gone as far as we could on our own financially, so without being able to do a production size run on both fabric and manufacturing we can't bring the Pooghe label to fruition.

The funding we need to cover the costs is $25,000, which we set our goal under the Fixed Funding guidelines [meaning, our project campaign cannot happen unless we raise the full amount]. Currently, we have a good bundle of companies from boutiques to commercial businesses that are all interested in the Pooghe label. However, before we can proceed with even attempting to materialize any of those strong potential platforms, we need to make this campaign happen.  Additionally, we want to offer Pooghe clothing to the open market on our website as well. 

Thus...when I say, I wholeheartedly thank you in advance for all of your generous contributions to this campaign; please know that I deeply and humbly mean it. Because folks, the actualization is simple - in that it's truly YOUR contributions that will launch Pooghe.   

Pride in using The World's Finest Cotton:

Supima® Cotton is 100% American Pima Cotton trademark named Supima for superior-pima. Known as the "World's Finest Cotton," Supima is so exclusive, less than 1% of the world's cotton can be called Supima which is grown only in California and the southwest region of the United States. It's superior in softness to all other cottons due to the physically longer strands of fiber that make up the cotton threads.

 

We use Supima cotton in our fabrics because it creates a stronger but incredibly soft, smooth and lustrous surface that is simply UNMATCHED. Once you have it next to your skin, it'll leave no question as to why Supima cotton carries the respected title worldwide as "The Cashmere of Cottons."

Supima has shown us nothing less than amazing support and encouragement since we introduced our plans for Pooghe to them in the beginning. We are very humbled and proud to now be a member and licensee of Supima since 2010, for both our exclusive garments and the fabrics created for Pooghe Clothing Company of America.

About our fabric technology:

Revolutionary Biocompatible Eco-Friendly Fabric Technology  - Keeping You Confidently Fresh Day In & Day Out

• Biocompatible - Meaning we use the same active: Hydrogen Peroxide H202 that the human body produces to defend itself from bacterial invaders (the phagocytosis process). Unlike other antimicrobials on the market, our exclusive fabric technology is NON-leaching and FREE of organic halogens such as Triclosan or PCBs, Cationic finishes, Silvers or Coppers. Our revolutionary antimicrobial fabric technology is safe, non-toxic, non-irritating and non-sensitizing to the skin.

• Controls Odor and Staining - No more irritating fabric discoloration's most people can relate to with the infamous "yellowing" of the armpits. The rapid acting and long lasting treatment controls odors and staining by inhibiting bacteria and fungi growth, which are the culprits in causing unpleasant odors, discoloration, staining and deterioration of garments.

• Environmentally Friendly Technology—the only antimicrobial fabric technology containing hydrogen peroxide approved by US EPA (United States Environmental Protection Agency) for imparting antimicrobial preservation of textiles. It degrades to water and oxygen leaving no dangerous or negative ecological decomposition products. It's the superior most eco-friendly antimicrobial/antifungal textile technology available today.

• Superior and Long lasting – independent lab analysis confirms the effectiveness of our fabrics lasts through 75 laundering cycles as compared to the other antimicrobials that only maintain their efficacy from 1-10 washings.

• Consumers have moved to short-cycle cold-water washes to save energy and decrease the wear and tear on clothing and other fabrics; however, this unfortunately can leave bacteria and viruses largely intact. With your Pooghe apparel, there's no special handling, you can wash in hot or cold water, with or without bleach.

How does our antimicrobial fabric treatment basically work?

Pooghes' revolutionary textile treatment locks the power of hydrogen peroxide into its fabrics. It's specially designed to allow very low concentrations of hydrogen peroxide to effectively inhibit the growth of bacteria and fungi, which cause unpleasant odors, discoloration, staining, deterioration or corrosion of garments. The two fabric samples below were heavily inoculated, incubated and then photographed after three days. The untreated fabric to the left shows almost complete overgrowth while Pooghe's treated fabric shows no growth.

Microbes can feed off human perspiration and body oils, resulting in odorous by-products. Our eco-treatment suppresses the generation of odors by inhibiting microbial growth on the fabric.

 

If you made it through reading all of this, then I'll assume you're ready to get on to the really fun stuff - The Rewards!  So without further adieu:

Note:  Once you've decided which pledge level you would like and have gone through the "claim this perk" pre-order process to the right; you can download the simple order forms to choose the quantity, sizes & colors of the clothing items you selected in our Gallery-Files. 

 

OUR HEARTFELT GRATITUDE

PLEDGE LEVEL 1

As you know, every dollar counts and for this pledge contribution level we offer you our sincerest gratitude. You'll be recognized on our website among the others who played a role in bringing a cardinal American Made clothing label under the unique name of Pooghe to market. A simply brilliant line, which anyone would enjoy having in their choice wardrobe.

 

POOGHE SIGNATURE ESSENTIALS

PLEDGE LEVELS 2 & 3 FOR HIM OR HER

Fabric Content:  These items are made from our exclusive 100% Supima Cotton jersey that we coined our "Signature" core fabric.  Preshrunk and finished with our revolutionary eco-treatment that keeps you feeling positively comfortable and confidently fresh - day in and day out.

Sizes for Him or Her:   S   M   L   XL   2XL

The Pooghe Short Sleeve Signature Essential for Him or Her:

It's taken us a couple of years for us to refine this ultimate comfort tee with perfecting its gender cuts, fits and quality construction.  A perfect fabric weight and fit for this heavenly soft, classic wardrobe staple. 

The Pooghe Long Sleeve Signature Essential for Him or Her:

This long-sleeve top takes the causal essential to a new versatile and luxe level. Like its short-sleeve cousin, the silhouettes are gender specific with a remarkable fit.    

During the numerous consumer beta testing rounds we did with real market customers on the Pooghe signature essentials; one of the most repeated descriptive comments returned to us for both this Pooghe long sleeve and short-sleeve tops alike was..."I'm addicted to these shirts!"

This is why we can confidently and humbly state that we've created a perfect fabric weight and garment cut for this heavenly soft, classic wardrobe staple that we JUST KNOW YOU'LL TRULY ENJOY WEARING :-).

 

THE DARCEY TOP

PLEDGE LEVEL 4 [OPTION FOR HER]

Fabric Content:  Constructed from the Pooghe Blended Micro Jersey; an exclusive blend of 50% Supima Cotton and 50% MicroModal® finished with our revolutionary eco-treatment that keeps you feeling positively comfortable and confidently fresh - day in and day out.

Sizes:   S   M   L   XL   2XL

The Darcey Top for HER:

This capacious luxe top with its generous boat neck and wide cut is simply delicious.  Adorable with jeans, leggings or just about any bottom. In short, it's one of those garment pieces that's perfectly paired with YOU! 

Garment dyed, washed and preshrunk; this light-weight fabric with its butterfly soft feel is specifically designed to effortlessly charm your skin with its brilliant hand. With its loose fit and beautiful drape, you'll find this multi-functional top ideal for any casual venue you so choose.  Made in the United States of America. Please see size chart to the bottom of campaign page.

Made in the United States of America. Please see size chart to the bottom of campaign page.

 

THE AMERICAN VEE

PLEDGE LEVEL 4 [OPTION FOR HIM]

Fabric Content:  Constructed from the Pooghe Blended Micro Jersey; an exclusive blend of 50% Supima Cotton and 50% MicroModal® finished with our revolutionary eco-treatment that keeps you feeling positively comfortable and confidently fresh - day in and day out.

Sizes:   S   M   L   XL   2XL

The American Vee for HIM:

You'll stand out in this charming American Vee simply because you're going to feel so good wearing it! Unlike typical T-shirts with a conventional boxy fit, this lightweight cardinal shirt has a modern and fashionable fit that's absolutely flattering.

We spent a long time perfecting and refining its fit and materials to create what we believe and have been told by the numerous consumer beta testing rounds we did on this piece, that it's one of the most comfortable casual luxe basics you'll ever wear. An ideal shirt on its own and perfect for layering.  An awesome top to go with your favorite pair of jeans or shorts.

Made in the United States of America. Please see size chart to the bottom of campaign page.

Sizes for Him or Her:   S   M   L   XL   2XL

Tank Top for HIM:

We have our signature classic staple men's tank with a cut that's well-fit and current. Both are luxuriously soft and sure to be your new favorite tanks.

Made in the United States of America.Please see size chart to the bottom of campaign page. 

 

THE WEEKENDER

PLEDGE LEVEL 6 [OPTION FOR HER]

Fabric Content:  See below

Sizes:   S   M   L   XL   2XL

The Jacket for Her:

This ultra comfy luxe zip hoodie was made with versatility and style in mind. Features convenient front pouch pockets, self-fabric waist band, metal nickel zipper and dyed-to-match drawstring. It can be worn with unrolled sleeves for a full long length or rolled to 3/4 sleeve with concealed snap button straps.

You'll experience a new level of comfort in this premium hoodie made from our exclusive LuxeBlend™ Spandex French Terry fabric. A brilliant blend of 47% Lenzing Modal®, 47% Premium Combed cotton and 6% spandex. Preshrunk and finished with our revolutionary eco-treatment that keeps you feeling positively comfortable and confidently fresh - day in and day out.

This relaxed raglan cut has a refined softness you'll feel the moment you put it on. It wears effortlessly chic and a definite must-have basic jacket for just about any casual use.

The Pants for Her:

This ultra soft French Terry pant with a hint of spandex makes this your first grab for running around, and by far - it's the perfect lounge pant. It features a low-rise self-fabric banded waist, relaxed legs with drawstring tie for a comforting fit.

A brilliant blend of 47% Lenzing Modal®, 47% Premium Combed cotton and 6% spandex. Preshrunk and finished with our revolutionary eco-treatment that keeps you feeling positively comfortable and confidently fresh - day in and day out.

story_txt:
Setting the pace for innovation, in 2008 Navy Veteran and Pooghe founder Steve Monte saw a need for a true American Made clothing label with undeniable comfort that fitted a person's body better than what was available in the market. Steve went even further on the principles that fashion, and technology can work in unison to create the ideal clothing line that also provided an authentic eco-friendly solution to that natural, yet daily occurrence everyone can identify with - body odor.

A little bit on how we got here:
An athlete doesn't train endlessly to enter the Olympics with the hopes of only getting a bronze metal; they train with perseverance in going into that arena carrying the conviction at winning the gold.  I approached creating the Pooghe clothing brand with the same mindset. My goal was to create from the ground up, an authentic American Made clothing label that was more than just another brand name.  It had to be an elite and versatile label that addressed an issue relatable to almost anyone, and above all; feature a signature softness and comfort that stood above the rest.
I'll admit to all of you reading this, that we certainly had our fair share of trial and errors getting Pooghe to where it is today, which didn't come easy - nor overnight.  In-fact it took all of four-plus years, along with many personal and family sacrifices that definitely put my determination to the extreme test.
With touring numerous manufacturing, knitting and dye companies, eventually, we strategically partnered ourselves with the right facilities and material sourcing groups.  Endless hours were spent researching and testing just about every type of textile technology for our platform; then producing sample run after sample run that clearly gave an intense education and OJT I never would have anticipated.
Additionally, I felt it was crucial to beta-test Pooghe clothing with real-life consumers across America to include men and women from all walks of life between the ages of 18 - 50. After-all, regardless of how good I may think I am at creating really comfortable garment; the true barometer test in "getting it just right" would be in the feedback we would get from actual potential customers who gave all of our samples a decent trial run.
These testing phases turned out to be very extensive and time consuming in making many adjustments to the weight and design of our fabrics; along with multiple silhouette alterations through each stage of our product development.  However, it was an invaluable process that we could ultimately conclude once receiving the communal feedback and visceral response we were aiming for...the "WOW" factor.

Next to offering a clothing label that people can certainly benefit from having; the words Made in the USA is unquestionably one of our "sacred cows" in business practices. We not only hold it very dear to us, but it will ALWAYS be a prideful and cardinal part of the Pooghe identity.  As you can probably guess, being a Navy Veteran, I have incredible enthusiasm as we look forward to in contributing on a much larger scale to the social and economic arenas with an exclusive apparel brand that is authentic, enjoyable to wear and truly Made in America.
The Impact of your contributions:
The impact of your contributions has much to do with bringing Pooghe to fruition. In order for us to offer Pooghe to the public for both retail and wholesale, we now have to do a production run of fabric and manufacturing the silhouettes we created with final cut & sew and finish. Just about all fabric manufactured here in the US that are similar to ours (Jersey knits, French Terry, etc.) is done by using ready-made yarns which almost always have a denier in 20s, 30s, or 40s (thickness).  However, we created our "Signature" fabric which is a an exclusive Supima cotton jersey made from a particular 24/1 denier yarn.  Conventionally, it's unheard of in using that specific yarn weight to make fabric here in America, and I'll tell you why...
When you move to a precise yarn weight/thickness outside of the standard three that everyone typically uses; a knitting mill has to rethread and recalibrating their production machines for that specific yarn weight. Most companies will not want to go through the trouble so they will stick with what's already being made.  Knitting mills are willing to do small yardage runs on their sampling machines of which they charge you dearly for that.  But, when it comes to manufacturing beyond the sampling/prototype phases, the minimum yardage you have to order for a unique yarn weight is very large, and it can range anywhere from 5,000-10,000 yards. To put it into perspective, we have to order all of that fabric before we can even cut & sew one shirt.
Now as I stated earlier we strategically partnered ourselves with the right knitting & manufacturing facilities that are willing to work with us, but we still have to meet their large minimum production guidelines. Our family has gone as far as we could on our own financially, so without being able to do a production size run on both fabric and manufacturing we can't bring the Pooghe label to fruition.
The funding we need to cover the costs is $25,000, which we set our goal under the Fixed Funding guidelines [meaning, our project campaign cannot happen unless we raise the full amount]. Currently, we have a good bundle of companies from boutiques to commercial businesses that are all interested in the Pooghe label. However, before we can proceed with even attempting to materialize any of those strong potential platforms, we need to make this campaign happen.  Additionally, we want to offer Pooghe clothing to the open market on our website as well. 
Thus...when I say, I wholeheartedly thank you in advance for all of your generous contributions to this campaign; please know that I deeply and humbly mean it. Because folks, the actualization is simple - in that it's truly YOUR contributions that will launch Pooghe.   
Pride in using The World's Finest Cotton:


Supima® Cotton is 100% American Pima Cotton trademark named Supima for superior-pima. Known as the "World's Finest Cotton," Supima is so exclusive, less than 1% of the world's cotton can be called Supima which is grown only in California and the southwest region of the United States. It's superior in softness to all other cottons due to the physically longer strands of fiber that make up the cotton threads.

 
We use Supima cotton in our fabrics because it creates a stronger but incredibly soft, smooth and lustrous surface that is simply UNMATCHED. Once you have it next to your skin, it'll leave no question as to why Supima cotton carries the respected title worldwide as "The Cashmere of Cottons."
Supima has shown us nothing less than amazing support and encouragement since we introduced our plans for Pooghe to them in the beginning. We are very humbled and proud to now be a member and licensee of Supima since 2010, for both our exclusive garments and the fabrics created for Pooghe Clothing Company of America.

• Biocompatible - Meaning we use the same active: Hydrogen Peroxide H202 that the human body produces to defend itself from bacterial invaders (the phagocytosis process). Unlike other antimicrobials on the market, our exclusive fabric technology is NON-leaching and FREE of organic halogens such as Triclosan or PCBs, Cationic finishes, Silvers or Coppers. Our revolutionary antimicrobial fabric technology is safe, non-toxic, non-irritating and non-sensitizing to the skin.
• Controls Odor and Staining - No more irritating fabric discoloration's most people can relate to with the infamous "yellowing" of the armpits. The rapid acting and long lasting treatment controls odors and staining by inhibiting bacteria and fungi growth, which are the culprits in causing unpleasant odors, discoloration, staining and deterioration of garments.
• Environmentally Friendly Technology—the only antimicrobial fabric technology containing hydrogen peroxide approved by US EPA (United States Environmental Protection Agency) for imparting antimicrobial preservation of textiles. It degrades to water and oxygen leaving no dangerous or negative ecological decomposition products. It's the superior most eco-friendly antimicrobial/antifungal textile technology available today.
• Superior and Long lasting – independent lab analysis confirms the effectiveness of our fabrics lasts through 75 laundering cycles as compared to the other antimicrobials that only maintain their efficacy from 1-10 washings.
• Consumers have moved to short-cycle cold-water washes to save energy and decrease the wear and tear on clothing and other fabrics; however, this unfortunately can leave bacteria and viruses largely intact. With your Pooghe apparel, there's no special handling, you can wash in hot or cold water, with or without bleach.

Pooghes' revolutionary textile treatment locks the power of hydrogen peroxide into its fabrics. It's specially designed to allow very low concentrations of hydrogen peroxide to effectively inhibit the growth of bacteria and fungi, which cause unpleasant odors, discoloration, staining, deterioration or corrosion of garments. The untreated fabric to the left shows almost complete overgrowth while Pooghe's treated fabric shows no growth.

Microbes can feed off human perspiration and body oils, resulting in odorous by-products. Our eco-treatment suppresses the generation of odors by inhibiting microbial growth on the fabric.

Hip           36 - 38              38 - 40               40 - 42               42 - 44               44 - 46
 
For all of the Canadian & International Backers Please refer to the shipping below. Thank you.
Canada:  $25-$50 dollar pledge levels - please add $5 $75-$150 dollar pledge levels - please add $8 $350 pledge level - please add $12
Internationally: $25-$50 dollar pledge levels - please add $8 $75-$150 dollar pledge levels - please add $10 $350 pledge level - please add $16

story:
Summary

I love Dogecoin and the community around it.  I thought I'd reach out and see if any of my fellow Shibe are interested in a Dogecoin Backup Card Wallet!  I'd like to get one myself, and as we all know, everything is cheaper in bulk!


What We Need & What You Get

Let's start off with what you'll get.  You will get a 1GB USB drive in the form of a card.  You'll be able to carry a digital copy of your Dogecoin Wallet (or anything for that matter).  If you get the $12 version, it will come with an area for you to put your QR Code for you Wallet address.  For the $20 version, we will ask you for your Address and we will personally put it on the card!  Since this is unique to each card, we can't get them printed on the card itself, but we can print stickers of your address as a QR code and slap on there for you before we ship them out!


What do we need?  Funds to buy a bulk set of cards with the Shibe image on them, as well as funds to print out the stickers, a bit of labor, and ship everything to you!  That's it!


The Impact

By getting a Dogecoin Backup Card Wallet, you'll be able to keep your full wallet with you on the go, pop it into what ever computer is available, back up you wallet, display your QR code to others for exchanging DOGEs, and most importantly, you'll be able to spread to word about Dogecoin!

Other Ways You Can Help

Just spread the word about Dogecoin and help us get TO THE MOON!

Also, give me feedback on the design!  I'm still working on it, and I'll be posting updates as I make changes!

story:
High speed, ultra secure and easy to use. Instant setup. The best VPN Network.

Meet Ziggit

Ziggit is for Everyone- This is a device that can be used by anyone in order to safely browse the internet.

Keep yourself and your loved ones safe. Nowadays the online world is becoming more and more dangerous. Databases, private profiles, emails, personal computers and many other places are getting hacked, but it is up to us to protect ourselves.

-Unblock websites

Access any website or app without geographic restrictions or censorship.

-Online privacy

Encrypt you Internet traffic and hide your IP address from hackers and spies. Stop them from seeing what you do online.

-Videos from anywhere

Watch the content you want from any country on earth, at blazing fast speeds.


What is VPN? 

VPN is a Virtual Private Network. What this helps with is by hiding your IP, you won't be able to be found. Keep your content secure, and keep others from accessing your devices. Hide the apps that you’re using on your computer, tablet, and smart phone.


How does the Ziggit VPN service work?

In this business we are getting together and going to work with the best network providers. This is the only way to get great quality from the VPN technology from all around the world. You will also be getting high quality service at competitive prices. When contributing to our project, you get one year of this service. Our premium plan will cost 10$ per month, and 5 $ per month if you buy a yearly membership. Our basic plan will be absolutely free, so anyone can use it. It will have less locations, but fully functional.


In the old days VPN was used, so that people at the office could access data from their home network. Now VPN technology is becoming available for all internet users. It helps people from all over the world connect in a secure way. It helps you stay safe, secure and anonymous online.


When is VPN useful?

When doing your online banking

When using Wi-Fi hotspots

When shopping online

When accessing media

When securing communication



Get started with Ziggit, just switch it on with one button, get your privacy, feel secure and connect to whatever you want!

How to use Ziggit?

When designing Ziggit, simplicity was one of the most important factures that we paid attention to. We want to make it easy for absolutely anyone to use. There are 3 simple steps to follow in order to use Ziggit. Just press the on button, choose what country you want to connect from and lastly, use any browser, or app from any device like you normally do.

Select Ziggit Wi-Fi

  Press the button on your Ziggit. Your device can now find your Ziggit Wi-Fi. Connect to it.

Connect to the Internet

  You can now control you Ziggit and connect it to a nearby network. Any network works as long as you have access to it.

Browse the internet

  Now use your device like you normally would, from browsing to using any apps that need internet connection.


Ziggit creates a secondary Wi-Fi network for your security.

Ziggit connects to Wi-Fi networks, and afterwards creates a secure network just for you. No installation is needed when using Ziggit, just connect and GO!

Ziggit works with open source encryption technology in order to protect your data. This is what the big boys in government and big companies are using.


Visit whatever websites you want.

Any governments censor the internet, blocking voices, one thing or the other from social media like Facebook, Twitter and other websites. This a a big problem for people because they can’t get access to information.

Some TV shows, websites, and even some YouTube channels can only be accessed from certain countries. Ziggit fixes this problem by letting you choose what country you want to browse the internet from.

Connect with Ziggit and use the internet as if you are there!


Which Wi-Fi devices can use Ziggit? All of them!

Now all your devices can enjoy online freedom, by simply connecting to your personal Ziggit. It’s as simple as that.


Ziggit is recommended for everyone that is trying to stay safe on the internet.



Ziggit- 9300 mAh battery

Ziggit has a powerful battery of 9300 mAh, which can come in handy when you’re away from a plug for a long time. You can even use a USB cable to link Ziggit to your device and charge it when running out of juice.



Timeline:


Retail price of Ziggit.


Ziggit device- $ 49

1 year of Premium VPN- $69

This service lets you use the worldwide network that Ziggit provides.

Stretch mark

If we reach $100,000 we want to open an open market where developers can start building apps and explore the possibilities of Ziggit. Our team can only do so much for this product, but by making it open source we can all work together and do so much more.


Frequently asked questions

Q:Does Ziggit work with all devices?

A: Yes, Ziggit works with all devices that have a Wi-Fi connection. As long as it is a regular Wi-Fi connection you can connect it any devices like smart phones, tablets, laptops, smart TV’s, media players.

Q:Is it necessary to contribute to the premium service in order to use Ziggit?

A: It is not necessary to have the premium service active in order to use Ziggit, but the premium service does give you access to more locations and greater speeds.

Q:Can I watch movies, series, TV shows on Ziggit?

A:Ziggit does not provide online content, but rather gives you access to areas to allow you to follow your favorite shows, or channels online. An example would be if you are travelling to Eastern Europe, and when trying to watch a TV show that can only be accessed from an IP in the USA you can’t access it. In this case you would need to use Ziggit and choose a network from the USA, and you will be able to watch the show as if you are back home.

Q: What do I do if I changed my address after contributing to the campaign?

A: We will contact everyone once more before shipping Ziggit and ask everyone for any changed names addresses, etc. You can also email us at any time if changes occur.

Q:Can I connect to other VPN services with my Ziggit?

A: There is no possibility to use other VPN services with Ziggit. We are trying to make Ziggit as simple to use as possible and this would make it to complicated, so we have decided to make the software preinstalled. With have chosen the best network providers to work with, so all you will have to do is turn it on and use it.

Q: Does Ziggit work absolutely everywhere?

A: Ziggit will work where it finds an internet connection, and isn’t restricted by network administrators that block ports. We will work with the best VPN partners in the game to make it possible to access the internet through Ziggit from as many locations as possible. We will do our best to make these occasions as rare as possible.

Q: Where is Ziggit shipped for free?

A:Ziggit will be shipped for free within the USA. If you are ordering Ziggit from another country it is best to add the international shipping perk to your package. When doing so please indicate the postal address, so that we can sort out all deliveries correctly.

Q: Can I use more than one device on my Ziggit?

A: Short answer is yes.

Q: What if I want to order a different perk?

Just add the perk that you want and contact us to let us know and work out the details. We will also contact everyone 4 weeks before shipping to ask if the postal address hasn't changed. If it has changed we will change the details to make sure that the perk gets delivered to the correct contributor.

A BIG THANK YOU TO EVERYONE INVOLVED!

Risks and challenges

story:
Snap on the sunglasses attachment when going outside or snap on a colored frame to match your outfit when you dress up for the next event. These aren't your grandma's glasses.

Morpheye Eyewear will minimize and modernize your wardrobe by eliminating the need for multiple frames to fit your life. 

 Choose any of the five shapes!

Titanium is naturally hypoallergenic and anti-corrosive which is perfect wearing all day, everyday. The lightweight and durability factors also make titanium the best choice for these versatile frames. Titanium is 40% lighter and as strong as traditional steel. These frames have great flexibility and memory, which is important for strength and longevity.

With the durability of titanium we are able to do cool things like the fish skeleton cut on the ear piece. This allows you to create your own custom fit with your bare hands. Bend the ear pieces to contour to the shape of your ears and head.

Revolutionary manufacturing methods made Morpheye Magnetic Snaps possible. These lightweight and colorfully designed shells, magnetically snap onto the front of the Morpheye frame. They can quickly change the look and function of your eyewear.

To see the Snaps up close, CLICK HERE

All Snap colors and textures come in all five frame shapes!

All varieties of sunglass lenses can be placed into any Snap.

Whether you leave them in the sun of your car or accidentally sit on your Snaps, the nylon material will hold its shape unlike acetate frames. Paired with neodymium magnets to connect them to the frames, they will not fall off in any outdoor activity.

The manufacturing process is only found in the Morpheye factory and is the secret to the thin Snaps. We wanted to create a frame material that would be light, thin and durable so you can carry them in your pocket without a care. This material didn’t exist in the market, so we created it.

No more stacking cheap 3D theater frames on top of your Rx glasses. With a simple Snap, you can comfortably wear your own Morpheye frames and watch the latest movie in 3D. 

Add on or trade out one of your Sunglasses Snaps for the 3D Movie Package and you will get two 3D Snaps built for RealD and IMAX 3D movies. The two Snaps come in a standard black color. Add on this package for $25.

Overexposure to blue light can lead to eye strain, headaches and disruption of the natural sleep cycle. The lens of the Morpheye Base Frame has an included blue light filter to provide you a better digital screen viewing experience all day and long into the night. This will help you stay focused on your work for longer time periods.

Included in every reward package are free single-vision prescriptions up to +/- 3.0. Visit any optometrist to get your prescription and we will fill it once the campaign ends. Our lenses are made from the high quality CR39. This material is half as heavy as glass, far less likely to shatter and has optical quality nearly as good as glass. After +/- 3.0 there will be $20 upgrade fee because we will have to choose a high index lens that is much thinner than the standard lens and is meant for higher prescriptions.

For more information about prescriptions please visit our FAQ section.

You wear sunscreen when you go outside so why not wear eye protection? Ultraviolet light can be a major cause of eye damage. It is important that you shield your eyes and prevent UV damage. Sometimes you don’t always have sunglasses on you and that is why the base frame lenses have 100% UV protection. Instead of carrying eyeglasses and sunglasses you can carry Morpheye Eyewear and a Snap to save space. Choose between 10 different lens colors.

Tom was formerly was a computer programmer and network engineer, but after having worked in the computer world for 10 years he craved a different path. In 2005, he started his own wholesale eyewear company and has been working hard at it ever since.

Being in the eyewear industry for a long time, Tom has seen many products and trends, but he has yet to find a product that met his needs, so he built them. Tom has a high prescription and in order to go from indoors to outdoors he either had to use transitions, which he never liked or switching to prescription sunglasses, which he would have to carry with him everywhere. This is why he created Morpheye. By combining never seen before lightweight material and powerful magnets, Tom can now wear one comfortable frame and quickly turn them into sunglasses with a quick Snap.

story:
Photo By Alvin Lew, Author, Microbrand Watch World

Our dive watch design concept is inspired by, is a deep-sea creature which dwells at 200-4800 meters beneath the ocean. The umbrella octopus species, aka Dumbo octopus, is the cutest octopus in the world.

The name “Dumbo” originates from their resemblance to 1941 Disney's film "Dumbo, the elephant", having a prominent ear-like fin which extends from the mantle above each eye.

The Dumbo octopuses use these ear-like fins to propel themselves through the water and arms to steer through water currents. Their arms are connected by a web of skin, causing them to resemble umbrellas when their arms are spread apart.

Unlike most octopuses, the Dumbo octopus doesn’t have an ink sac because it rarely encounters predators in the deep sea. Even so, they still have the distinctive octopus capability and ability to “flush” or “camouflage” themselves to their environment when danger occurs.

A 46mm watch case

“This watch is too big for my wrist!”

Not to worry, guys.

The watch design concept is inspired by the Dumbo Octopus, which has the capability and ability to “flush” and “camouflage” into the environment.

“FLUSH”

Traditional watches have either protruding crown or “intentionally protruding” crown guard added to protect their fragile crown. 

For Dumbo, its screwed-down crown “FLUSH” with the watch case. The crown is protected by the watch case even in the most extreme use.

This design made it both functional and aesthetically pleasing. 

“CAMOUFLAGE”

Dumbo uses a “CAMOUFLAGE” lug. Using this design concept, wearer will find the 46mm diameter case equivalent to a traditional 36.60mm watch case. 

 

1) Marine Grade Bronze CuSn8

CuSn8 is a industry standard for marine grade alloy. It contains a composition of 92% copper and 8% tin. 

For many centuries, bronze is used in many nautical applications for its unique metal characteristics. Bronze is highly corrosion resistant to seawater. It shows no sign of corrosion even after years of exposure to seawater.

During manufacturing, the watch case is polished to rose gold shine. A layer called “patina” is then allowed to form on the watch. “Patina” is a layer of oxide that protects the metal from corrosion. Every “patina pattern” is unique and different, depending on wearer’s usage and the enviroment. Wearer can revert back to it “polish state”, by polishing it with any polishing agent on the market to bring back its rose gold shine.

2) Diamond Like Carbon (DLC) 316L Stainless Steel

DLC stands for Diamond-Like Carbon. It is a nanocomposite coating that has unique properties of natural diamond - low friction, high hardness, and high corrosion resistance. 

DLC coatings are usually found on high end watches as it is scratch & corrosion resistant, which is more superior to PVD coatings.

3) Surgical Grade 316L Stainless Steel

316L is also referred to marine grade stainless. Its primary alloying constituents are iron, chromium, nickel and molybdenum. The additional of molybdenum strengthens its corrosion resistant properties. The “L” refers to its low carbon content. 

Why SW200 and NH35 movements? 

The answer is obvious - the best of both worlds (28.8kph/4Hz & 21.6kph/3Hz). 

They are the most reliable, versatile and robust movements on the market. Both companies have long history in watch movements manufacturing, which they have perfected over the years.

1) SELLITA SW200

This movement needs no introduction as SW200 is well known to every watch lover. The SW200 is precise, reliable and robust. Its quality and reliability are comparable to ETA 2824, some may even say SW200 is better.

2) SEIKO NH35

Another popular movement used in many dive watches. NH35 is well known for its reliability. It can outlast Swiss movement with minimum or no servicing. 

Most watchmakers play it safe when it comes to dial design. It’s either in common plain or sunburst finish.

MMI Watches wants every part of the watch’s design to be unique and stands out from the rest.

The Dumbo's dial is given an ultra fine horizontal brushed finish. With this textured finish, the dial is able to present two tones, dark and brillant effects, depending on the enviromental lighthings.

A particular dial deserves a special mention – the great “White”.

The great “White” is available on model DB6NHS, DB6SWS, DB7NHS and DB7SWS. This intially an experimental dial. We are astonished by its end result. The effects came out far better than we had anticipated.

The great “White” is actually a silver dial. Instead of the other two changing tones of the other DUMBOs, the great “White” changes colors from Silver to Magnificent Cream to Brilliant  White, depending on the environment lightings, like an octopus camouflaging into its enviroment.

Silver

Magnificent Cream

Brilliant  White

There are 2 models for each design. 

The 2 sets of alpha-numeric under each design represent their model numbers.The model number indicates the model, color combination, type of movement and case material.

Example: DB6NHS (WWXYYZ)

WW=DB (refer to Dumbo model)

X= 6 (refer to blue bezel insert,  blue chapter ring and white dial color combination)

YY= NH (refer to NH35 movement)

Z= S (refer to stainless steel case material)

Example: DB3SWC (WWXYYZ)

WW=DB (refer to Dumbo model)

X= 3 (refer to green bezel insert,  green chapter ring and green dial color combination)

YY= SW (refer to SW200 movement)

Z= C (refer to CUSN8 case material)

Case: 

- 46mm Diameter / Lug To Lug

- 24mm Concealed Lug

- 14.6mm Thickness Without Dome Sapphire Crystal

Case Material:

- 316L Surgical Grade Stainless Steel, 

- DIamond Like Carbon (DLC) Black 316L Surgical Grade Stainless Steel

- CuSn8 Marine Grade Bronze

Bezel/Insert:

- 120 Clicks Uni-Direction Bezel

- Ceramic Insert filled with BGW9 Swiss Super LumiNova

Dial:

- Horizontal Brushed Dial

- Hands and Indexes filled with BGW9 Swiss Super LumiNova

Movement:

- SELLITA SW200

- SEIKO NH35

Water Resistance:

- 500m with Helium Escape Valve

Crystal:

- 4mm Dome Sapphire Crystal With Anti Reflective Coating

Crown:

- Signed Screw Down Crown

Rather than packaging the watch in cardboard or plastic box, which most likely will end up in a trash bin, every watch comes with a multi-purpose watch travel case, which is suitable for daily use. 

The travel case will not only hold your precious watch, it can also store your personal belongings such as your passport, handphone, charging cables, power bank and etc.

We have kept the cost of the watch to the lowest possible without sacrificing its quality, so as to make Dumbo accessible to all backers. 

Currently, the multi-purpose travel case is made out of PU leather material. Please be assured that if “Stretch Goal #3” target is unlocked, I will upgrade genuine leather for the travel case as standard issue.

316L STAINLESS STEEL VERSION -

Come in 2 packages:

“Steel Bracelet Pack”

- 24/22mm quick release multi-link stainless steel bracelet 

- 24mm quick release diver rubber strap

- strap tool bar

- warranty card

- PU leather multi-purpose travel case

“Leather Strap Pack”

- 24mm quick release brown vintage genuine leather strap

- 24mm quick release diver rubber strap 

- strap tool bar

- warranty card

- PU leather multi-purpose travel case 

 

DLC 316L STAINLESS STEEL VERSION -

Come in 2 packages:

“DLC Steel Bracelet Pack”

- 24/22mm quick release DLC multi-link stainless steel bracelet 

- 24mm quick release diver rubber strap

- strap tool bar

- warranty card

- PU leather multi-purpose travel case

“Leather Strap Pack”

- 24mm quick release brown vintage genuine leather strap

- 24mm quick release diver rubber strap 

- strap tool bar

- warranty card

- PU leather multi-purpose travel case 

 

CUSN8 BRONZE VERSION -

Come in standard leather strap package:

“Leather Strap Pack”

- 24mm quick release brown vintage genuine leather strap

- 24mm quick release diver rubber strap 

- strap tool bar

- warranty card

- PU leather multi-purpose travel case

All prices stated on the Reward Section is inclusive of shipping charges. However, every backer is responsible for their respective country custom/import duty tax, VAT or GST.

story_txt: Photo By Alvin Lew, Author, Microbrand Watch WorldOur dive watch design concept is inspired by, is a deep-sea creature which dwells at 200-4800 meters beneath the ocean. The umbrella octopus species, aka Dumbo octopus, is the cutest octopus in the world.The name “Dumbo” originates from their resemblance to 1941 Disney's film "Dumbo, the elephant", having a prominent ear-like fin which extends from the mantle above each eye.The Dumbo octopuses use these ear-like fins to propel themselves through the water and arms to steer through water currents. Their arms are connected by a web of skin, causing them to resemble umbrellas when their arms are spread apart.Unlike most octopuses, the Dumbo octopus doesn’t have an ink sac because it rarely encounters predators in the deep sea. Even so, they still have the distinctive octopus capability and ability to “flush” or “camouflage” themselves to their environment when danger occurs.A 46mm watch case“This watch is too big for my wrist!”Not to worry, guys.The watch design concept is inspired by the Dumbo Octopus, which has the capability and ability to “flush” and “camouflage” into the environment.“FLUSH”Traditional watches have either protruding crown or “intentionally protruding” crown guard added to protect their fragile crown. For Dumbo, its screwed-down crown “FLUSH” with the watch case. The crown is protected by the watch case even in the most extreme use.This design made it both functional and aesthetically pleasing. “CAMOUFLAGE”Dumbo uses a “CAMOUFLAGE” lug. Using this design concept, wearer will find the 46mm diameter case equivalent to a traditional 36.60mm watch case.  1) Marine Grade Bronze CuSn8CuSn8 is a industry standard for marine grade alloy. It contains a composition of 92% copper and 8% tin. For many centuries, bronze is used in many nautical applications for its unique metal characteristics. Bronze is highly corrosion resistant to seawater. It shows no sign of corrosion even after years of exposure to seawater.During manufacturing, the watch case is polished to rose gold shine. A layer called “patina” is then allowed to form on the watch. “Patina” is a layer of oxide that protects the metal from corrosion. Every “patina pattern” is unique and different, depending on wearer’s usage and the enviroment. Wearer can revert back to it “polish state”, by polishing it with any polishing agent on the market to bring back its rose gold shine.2) Diamond Like Carbon (DLC) 316L Stainless SteelDLC stands for Diamond-Like Carbon. It is a nanocomposite coating that has unique properties of natural diamond - low friction, high hardness, and high corrosion resistance. DLC coatings are usually found on high end watches as it is scratch & corrosion resistant, which is more superior to PVD coatings.3) Surgical Grade 316L Stainless Steel316L is also referred to marine grade stainless. Its primary alloying constituents are iron, chromium, nickel and molybdenum. The additional of molybdenum strengthens its corrosion resistant properties. The “L” refers to its low carbon content. Why SW200 and NH35 movements? The answer is obvious - the best of both worlds (28.8kph/4Hz & 21.6kph/3Hz). They are the most reliable, versatile and robust movements on the market. Both companies have long history in watch movements manufacturing, which they have perfected over the years.1) SELLITA SW200This movement needs no introduction as SW200 is well known to every watch lover. The SW200 is precise, reliable and robust. Its quality and reliability are comparable to ETA 2824, some may even say SW200 is better.2) SEIKO NH35Another popular movement used in many dive watches. NH35 is well known for its reliability. It can outlast Swiss movement with minimum or no servicing. Most watchmakers play it safe when it comes to dial design. It’s either in common plain or sunburst finish.MMI Watches wants every part of the watch’s design to be unique and stands out from the rest.The Dumbo's dial is given an ultra fine horizontal brushed finish. With this textured finish, the dial is able to present two tones, dark and brillant effects, depending on the enviromental lighthings.A particular dial deserves a special mention – the great “White”.The great “White” is available on model DB6NHS, DB6SWS, DB7NHS and DB7SWS. This intially an experimental dial. We are astonished by its end result. The effects came out far better than we had anticipated.The great “White” is actually a silver dial. Instead of the other two changing tones of the other DUMBOs, the great “White” changes colors from Silver to Magnificent Cream to Brilliant  White, depending on the environment lightings, like an octopus camouflaging into its enviroment.SilverMagnificent CreamBrilliant  WhiteThere are 2 models for each design. The 2 sets of alpha-numeric under each design represent their model numbers.The model number indicates the model, color combination, type of movement and case material.Example: DB6NHS (WWXYYZ)WW=DB (refer to Dumbo model)X= 6 (refer to blue bezel insert,  blue chapter ring and white dial color combination)YY= NH (refer to NH35 movement)Z= S (refer to stainless steel case material)Example: DB3SWC (WWXYYZ)WW=DB (refer to Dumbo model)X= 3 (refer to green bezel insert,  green chapter ring and green dial color combination)YY= SW (refer to SW200 movement)Z= C (refer to CUSN8 case material)Case: - 46mm Diameter / Lug To Lug- 24mm Concealed Lug- 14.6mm Thickness Without Dome Sapphire CrystalCase Material:- 316L Surgical Grade Stainless Steel, - DIamond Like Carbon (DLC) Black 316L Surgical Grade Stainless Steel- CuSn8 Marine Grade BronzeBezel/Insert:- 120 Clicks Uni-Direction Bezel- Ceramic Insert filled with BGW9 Swiss Super LumiNovaDial:- Horizontal Brushed Dial- Hands and Indexes filled with BGW9 Swiss Super LumiNovaMovement:- SELLITA SW200- SEIKO NH35Water Resistance:- 500m with Helium Escape ValveCrystal:- 4mm Dome Sapphire Crystal With Anti Reflective CoatingCrown:- Signed Screw Down CrownRather than packaging the watch in cardboard or plastic box, which most likely will end up in a trash bin, every watch comes with a multi-purpose watch travel case, which is suitable for daily use. The travel case will not only hold your precious watch, it can also store your personal belongings such as your passport, handphone, charging cables, power bank and etc.We have kept the cost of the watch to the lowest possible without sacrificing its quality, so as to make Dumbo accessible to all backers. Currently, the multi-purpose travel case is made out of PU leather material. Please be assured that if “Stretch Goal #3” target is unlocked, I will upgrade genuine leather for the travel case as standard issue.316L STAINLESS STEEL VERSION -Come in 2 packages:“Steel Bracelet Pack”- 24/22mm quick release multi-link stainless steel bracelet - 24mm quick release diver rubber strap- strap tool bar- warranty card- PU leather multi-purpose travel case“Leather Strap Pack”- 24mm quick release brown vintage genuine leather strap- 24mm quick release diver rubber strap - strap tool bar- warranty card- PU leather multi-purpose travel case  DLC 316L STAINLESS STEEL VERSION -Come in 2 packages:“DLC Steel Bracelet Pack”- 24/22mm quick release DLC multi-link stainless steel bracelet - 24mm quick release diver rubber strap- strap tool bar- warranty card- PU leather multi-purpose travel case“Leather Strap Pack”- 24mm quick release brown vintage genuine leather strap- 24mm quick release diver rubber strap - strap tool bar- warranty card- PU leather multi-purpose travel case  CUSN8 BRONZE VERSION -Come in standard leather strap package:“Leather Strap Pack”- 24mm quick release brown vintage genuine leather strap- 24mm quick release diver rubber strap - strap tool bar- warranty card- PU leather multi-purpose travel caseAll prices stated on the Reward Section is inclusive of shipping charges. However, every backer is responsible for their respective country custom/import duty tax, VAT or GST.Website: https://www.mmiwatches.comInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/mmiwatchesFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/mmiwatchessingaporeTwitter: https://twitter.com/MmiWatchesPatrick, Watch Reviewer, YouTube, Take Time, w/Patrick Marlett:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BbAFANoBYyo Bob, Watch Reviewer, YouTube, TimeToGo Travel And Timepieces:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D_D81a9SOI4 Aron, Watch Reviewer, YouTube, Aron Dunlap-OFD Watch Channel:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W9AzvS-wTog Chris, Watch Reviewer, YouTube, Marshall Time:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HqVZwKfUB0c Rob, Watch Reviewer, YouTube, Random Rob:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CULhOylqhrg Zach Kazan, Author, Worn & Wound:https://wornandwound.com/introducing-the-mmi-dumbo-diver-a-500m-diver-that-wont-break-the-bank/ Alvin, Watch Reviewer and Author, Microbrand Watch World:https://microbrandwatchworld.com/reviews/the-dumbo-illusion-by-mmi-watches/ Mark, Watch Reviewer, YouTube, Average Bros:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DWe7s5PWBs8 ​Scott, Watch Reviewer, YouTube, Watches Galore:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wyzb4vo_zBM Sam, Watch Reviewer, YouTube, The Causal Watch Reviewer:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mbckLlA6CHM  Photo from Alvin Lew, Microbrand Watch World Photo from Alvin Lew, Microbrand Watch World

story:
Myself and fellow entrepreneur, Noel Tate, right after he snatched up his 1st release cap.

ROKN APPAREL

Premium apparel made for your everyday active lifestyle. Finally a brand that promises pop culture classics you'll be ROKN for years to come.


3 of the initial release belt buckles. I built 8 different styles in Cinema4D and sent them to the manufacturer so they can make exact die molds. One piece alloy buckles with enamel color. Brass buckles coming too. Real Brass.

PREMIUM BRAND AT MID LEVEL PRICING.

ROKN Apparel uses only premium materials to make the best everyday fun wear you'll ever find. Caps, Tees, Jackets and Accessories designed to fit right into your lifestyle. With simple bold designs you'll be ROKN pieces for years, keeping it classic and in style. 

Designed for the everyday self-stylist, this brand is made to add to and enhance with the sneakers, casual kicks, heels, suits, jeans, and everything else in that wardrobe you worked hard to put together.

However, ROKN will accommodate any body type and any style type. Even if you are not the biggest fashion lover I promise you will find so many different ways to and places to wear ROKN. 

Keeping it exclusive, all design pieces will be limited production. What this do? It gives you something only very few in the world have. Signature series pieces will be numbered just like the first release snapbacks available for delivery right now.

WHAT MAKES ANY OF THIS SPECIAL?

Well, I promise top quality apparel that will stand the test of style, limited designed pieces, and all will come at everyday prices you see on everyday brands like new era, gap and others.

THE DETAILS

1. DESIGN BASED ON EXPERIENCE:  ROKN Apparel is the culmination of years of love for fashion, art, design, music, manga and even anime refined into to fun, simple designs that will stand the test of time. I love what I do. I gave up every secure path in life to jump on this one.

 2. FREE TO MIX: My top priority was designing a line that you could feel completely free to mix with sport, casual, street and even a suit. Limitless while wearability is very important to me, because I know it's important to you. 

 3. DETAILED CRAFTSMANSHIP: I have been researching manufacturers for 2 years now. Every graphic design and art piece is designed by me myself and I. Every detail of the measure, cut, and assembly is reviewed with every sample. I have personally worn the samples for months. I mean I have worn them out and they still look great. I get compliments every time.

4. INCREDIBLE STYLE: Not only do I want you to feel amazing in ROKN Apparel, I want you to look amazing as well. With years of international design experience and the input of leading fashion designers, ROKN utilizes a fashion conscious design that mixes the fun of modern pop culture with the classic element of simplicity for a look that is truly versatile, stylish and timeless. 

  5. TRULY LIMITED: No designs will ever be repeated. None! No more than 300 pieces of any graphic design element will ever be made. No graphic element will ever be used the same way. This means you are guaranteed unique pieces. Collect a series and feel good knowing very few people have it.

CHECK OUT YOUR REWARDS

The sticker pack

ROKN's official representative, O-Boy, decided to pose for 5 Heavy duty vinyl stickers just for our indiegogo supporters

The Signature Series IBless Tank

These fitted cut, long tank tops feature 100% cotton jersey material. You'll be ROKN these to the beach, to the office under the suit jacket, and anywhere else. What's not to love? 100 of each. Choose yours, any size between XS and XXL. 

The Signature V-Neck

100% American made from the cotton to the seems. This tee features a soft flexible lightweight jersey material that will only get better as time goes by. All black with red embroidered O-Boy logo, this tee can go from the office to the bar or from the train to the bicycle without missing a step. Get yours before they're gone.

That MILSPEC Jacket


This is the setup I've already discussed and built. With your support I can start the first production run of ROKN's signature series jacket. 

OBSTACLES & THE UNKNOWN

1. I already have two production runs under my belt. One run of tees and caps in my first attempt as RDCD Apparel and the current run of O-Boy Grin snapbacks that customers are enjoying right now. Though my work is not done in finding the exact combination of fabrics for some items I am confident that I am on the right track with the right manufacturers.

2. I have ample experience creating and delivering various products for designs, concepts, and products for other companies. It took a punch in the face life experience to get up and do it for myself. I anticipate a smooth manufacturing and production experience with prompt and easy delivery once the project is funded and the first run of these signature items is made.

3. Delays and unforeseen obstacles are always possible. I find the likelihood of anything serious occurring to be extremely unlikely. With that said, my community of supporters will be the first to know if anything unexpected happens. I've learned from two and a half years of mistakes and pitfalls and I'm ready to step out again and make this happen. With your support I can do this without a doubt.


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Help get the word out. Share it and tell the people you know would love to be a part of ROKN's start and receive a limited edition item at the same time.
  • Facebook, twitter, google+, SHARE SHARE SHARE


I will have more details about he rewards available through this campaign and actual mock ups of the rewards I am going to produce tomorrow. 

Thank you for checking me out.
