story:
The10 Watches

A startup brand aims to create the next generation of “most affordable watch” on the principle “simplicity of designs”. Nothing new, nothing ground-breaking, just a pure rendition of what watches would have looked like.


Brand Message

In a timepiece, “10" can stand for Ten seconds, Ten minutes, Ten hours or the 10th of each month. “10" always appears when it comes to time telling. “10" is also the number of styles in this project. That is the reason why we took “10" to be our brand name and the DNA that every of our designs carries. 

Lifestyle brand empowers people to look good and get the best out of themselves. We take it one step further by inspiring people to look for and get even more out of their life. You pursue what you love and cherish, and you make every moment counts.

Messages enrooted in our products:

- Producing affordable, high-quality and practical timepieces

- Exploring the possibility of wrist fashion

- Timepieces are not necessarily luxurious. They can be optimized for everyday wear

We will be selling our watches via our website: www.the10watches.com. We can thus eliminate all the unnecessary expenses on advertising, dealers and trade shows, and make the price more affordable to our Backers.

Chronograph Collection

Redefine Gentlemen Chronograph as an everyday watch. 

The case is 42mm in diameter and 11.5mm thick. The chronograph collection is driven by six-hand premium Japanese quartz chronograph movements. This watch also features a quick-release strap pin for interchanging to all 22mm straps. No muss, no fuss.

We believe The 10 Watches will be your perfect companion to all different occasions of your life.

Specification

Case: 316L Surgical grade Stainless Steel. 42mm diameter. 

Case thickness: 11.5mm

Glass: Sapphire Crystal 

Strap: 22mm Genuine Leather with quick release pin for interchangeable 

Movement: Seiko VK63 6 hand chronograph movement

Water Resistant: 5 ATM / 50 Meters

*The watch is rated 5 ATM water-resistant. You wouldn’t have to worry about your watch when you are out there in the rain or washing hands. However, you’d better take it off before going for a swim or shower.


Quick release pin for interchangeable



All of our selected suppliers and manufacturers from Japan, Hong Kong and China are well-experienced and reputable in their professional fields. They are all partners of the top brands you might have heard of, and there is no doubt they will maintain the same high quality and craftsmanship when producing The 10 Watches.


Product name: Pulsation

Inspiration:

Enhanced vintage feeling through the application of Pulsometer introduced in the early 1920s. The Pulsometer provides a simple yet reliable method to measure heart rate. The seamlessintegration of vintage styling and practical function makes this piece irresistible.


Product name: RS I

Inspiration:

Racing brings speed and excitement to men. This inspires the high contrast double-layer dial and sub dials which look just like instrument panel. The eye-catching dial arrangement along with the tachymeter and genuine leather NATO strap perfectly fulfill all masculine details and achieve an all-around timeless look.


Product name: Everyday man

Inspiration:

Achieve a minimal style through the use of a distinctive innumerate dial. The dial is made readable by subtle cut out markings and decent green color accent. The chronograph function combined with its effortless style and genuine leather strap makes it an everyday wear.


Product name: Noir

Inspiration:

Black, timelessness and monotone are the foundation of this minimalist style piece in the collection. Different shades of black found in the monotone dial makes it readable. The black genuine leather strap makes this piece an essential of daily life.


Product name: 70’s

Inspiration:

Faded brown and yellow always give a vintage feel. The brownish markings, hands, natural brown leather and beige dial are what constitute this classic piece. The simple sub-dial opening and reading demonstrate the timeless character of chronograph watches.


Product name: Flight

Inspiration:

For optimal legibility, white reading on black background has been the standard for instrument panel, which is also the source of inspiration of this pilot watch. The black double-layer dial, large numerals, white sub-dial readings and the studded genuine leather strap add up to be a perfect interpretation of pilot’s spirit.


Product name: Pop up

Inspiration:

A playful style in the collection – a matte black dial goes with a polished black steel case, the neon pop-up accent stands out from this totally black style. It sets a new depth for the all-black trend. The character of The 10 was reiterated. Its casual styling makes it a proper everyday timepiece.


Product name: Sundial

Inspiration:

A casual style inspired by the simplicity of vintage timepieces. The blue hands and markers contrast with the silver face and polished steel case. This stylish piece slots in between an eternal classic and an easy-going everyday wear. The etched minute markings are inspired by the appearance of a sundial, the ancient instrument for time telling.


Product name: RS II

Inspiration:

A racing sports style which achieves a perfect balance between functionality and style in the collection. The masculine blue accent goes with the black sunray dial creates a timeless automotive look. The black genuine leather NATO strap provides steady comfort in every occasion.


Product name: RS III

Inspiration:

The streamlined dial detail and the masculine red accent form an irresistible automotive style. The sub-dial resembles speedometer and the red pointed second hand simply arouses a man’s primitive desire for speed. The black genuine leather NATO strap is no doubt a perfect match to the racing style.

Timeline


Shipping

We are excited to announce that we will ship worldwide, with the exception of Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. Prices stated includes shipping charges. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes that are applicable to your region. First batch of watches estimated to be shipped at early December.

We Need Your Support 

Our Dream + Your Support = Success!

We have turned to Indiegogo to help us turning our dream into reality. However, we need to fulfill the minimum order quantity required by our manufacturers and that's where we need your help. In return for your help to our first production run, we will offer you our amazing watches at just a fraction of the final retail price.  Like us on Facebook, share with your friends and family and tell them about The 10 Watches. This will help making our dream come true and allow you to stay up-to-date with our latest developments.

Risks and challenges

1. Poor quality products – we have seen campaigns that over-promised and under-delivered on quality, leaving Backers nothing but disappointment. Therefore, “how to deliver quality products to our Backers” has always been one of our most significant concerns. We don’t want The 10 watches to deliver the same disappointment, and so we have spent almost 8 months to go through prototypes and to look for the perfect supplier. We have also visited the supplier’s production facility to make sure it is up to our quality requirement.

2. On-time delivery – we greatly appreciate the support from our Backers and understand late delivery can be very disappointing. Therefore, “how to avoid hiccups and to deliver on time” has also been one of our most significant concerns. We have checked numerous times with our suppliers to make sure everything is ready to go once the green light is on, and have also made an agreement with them that production will start once the campaign is sufficiently funded. We will not wait until the funds are released at the end of the campaign, in hope that our Backers can get the watches they have been longing for as soon as possible.

In light of the risks and challenges outlined above, we would keep our Backers updated with our project status and progress we have made.

Need Helps

If you have any questions at any time, during or after our campaign, please feel free to reach us at info@the10watches.com or leave us a comment.
story_txt:
The10 Watches


A startup brand aims to create the next generation of “most affordable watch” on the principle “simplicity of designs”. Nothing new, nothing ground-breaking, just a pure rendition of what watches would have looked like.




Brand Message
In a timepiece, “10" can stand for Ten seconds, Ten minutes, Ten hours or the 10th of each month. “10" always appears when it comes to time telling. “10" is also the number of styles in this project. That is the reason why we took “10" to be our brand name and the DNA that every of our designs carries. 
Lifestyle brand empowers people to look good and get the best out of themselves. We take it one step further by inspiring people to look for and get even more out of their life. You pursue what you love and cherish, and you make every moment counts.
Messages enrooted in our products:
- Producing affordable, high-quality and practical timepieces
- Exploring the possibility of wrist fashion
- Timepieces are not necessarily luxurious. They can be optimized for everyday wear
We will be selling our watches via our website: www.the10watches.com. We can thus eliminate all the unnecessary expenses on advertising, dealers and trade shows, and make the price more affordable to our Backers.
Chronograph Collection
Redefine Gentlemen Chronograph as an everyday watch. 
The case is 42mm in diameter and 11.5mm thick. The chronograph collection is driven by six-hand premium Japanese quartz chronograph movements. This watch also features a quick-release strap pin for interchanging to all 22mm straps. No muss, no fuss.
We believe The 10 Watches will be your perfect companion to all different occasions of your life.
Specification
Case: 316L Surgical grade Stainless Steel. 42mm diameter. 
Case thickness: 11.5mm
Glass: Sapphire Crystal 
Strap: 22mm Genuine Leather with quick release pin for interchangeable 
Movement: Seiko VK63 6 hand chronograph movement
Water Resistant: 5 ATM / 50 Meters

*The watch is rated 5 ATM water-resistant. You wouldn’t have to worry about your watch when you are out there in the rain or washing hands. However, you’d better take it off before going for a swim or shower.



Quick release pin for interchangeable



All of our selected suppliers and manufacturers from Japan, Hong Kong and China are well-experienced and reputable in their professional fields. They are all partners of the top brands you might have heard of, and there is no doubt they will maintain the same high quality and craftsmanship when producing The 10 Watches.



Product name: Pulsation

Inspiration:
Enhanced vintage feeling through the application of Pulsometer introduced in the early 1920s. The Pulsometer provides a simple yet reliable method to measure heart rate. The seamlessintegration of vintage styling and practical function makes this piece irresistible.





Product name: RS I
Inspiration:
Racing brings speed and excitement to men. This inspires the high contrast double-layer dial and sub dials which look just like instrument panel. The eye-catching dial arrangement along with the tachymeter and genuine leather NATO strap perfectly fulfill all masculine details and achieve an all-around timeless look.





Product name: Everyday man
Inspiration:
Achieve a minimal style through the use of a distinctive innumerate dial. The dial is made readable by subtle cut out markings and decent green color accent. The chronograph function combined with its effortless style and genuine leather strap makes it an everyday wear.





Product name: Noir
Inspiration:
Black, timelessness and monotone are the foundation of this minimalist style piece in the collection. Different shades of black found in the monotone dial makes it readable. The black genuine leather strap makes this piece an essential of daily life.





Product name: 70’s
Inspiration:
Faded brown and yellow always give a vintage feel. The brownish markings, hands, natural brown leather and beige dial are what constitute this classic piece. The simple sub-dial opening and reading demonstrate the timeless character of chronograph watches.





Product name: Flight
Inspiration:
For optimal legibility, white reading on black background has been the standard for instrument panel, which is also the source of inspiration of this pilot watch. The black double-layer dial, large numerals, white sub-dial readings and the studded genuine leather strap add up to be a perfect interpretation of pilot’s spirit.





Product name: Pop up
Inspiration:
A playful style in the collection – a matte black dial goes with a polished black steel case, the neon pop-up accent stands out from this totally black style. It sets a new depth for the all-black trend. The character of The 10 was reiterated. Its casual styling makes it a proper everyday timepiece.





Product name: Sundial
Inspiration:
A casual style inspired by the simplicity of vintage timepieces. The blue hands and markers contrast with the silver face and polished steel case. This stylish piece slots in between an eternal classic and an easy-going everyday wear. The etched minute markings are inspired by the appearance of a sundial, the ancient instrument for time telling.





Product name: RS II
Inspiration:
A racing sports style which achieves a perfect balance between functionality and style in the collection. The masculine blue accent goes with the black sunray dial creates a timeless automotive look. The black genuine leather NATO strap provides steady comfort in every occasion.





Product name: RS III
Inspiration:
The streamlined dial detail and the masculine red accent form an irresistible automotive style. The sub-dial resembles speedometer and the red pointed second hand simply arouses a man’s primitive desire for speed. The black genuine leather NATO strap is no doubt a perfect match to the racing style.




Timeline

We are excited to announce that we will ship worldwide, with the exception of Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. Prices stated includes shipping charges. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes that are applicable to your region. First batch of watches estimated to be shipped at early December.

Poor quality products – we have seen campaigns that over-promised and under-delivered on quality, leaving Backers nothing but disappointment. Therefore, “how to deliver quality products to our Backers” has always been one of our most significant concerns. We don’t want The 10 watches to deliver the same disappointment, and so we have spent almost 8 months to go through prototypes and to look for the perfect supplier. On-time delivery – we greatly appreciate the support from our Backers and understand late delivery can be very disappointing. Therefore, “how to avoid hiccups and to deliver on time” has also been one of our most significant concerns. story:
Keep it boring?

Inspired by a trip to Portland, Oregon, and their slogan “Keep Portland Weird!” Alex Gilbert wanted to find a corresponding characteristic to identify Loma Linda, his hometown. And thus, the “Keep Loma Linda Boring” movement was born.

In 2015, he successfully launched a small run of shirts calling for the support of all native Loma Lindians. To let everyone know, “Hey, we’re boring. And we like it.”

Well, we’re bringing it back.

 

3 Designs

We'll be bringing back our two original designs, as well as an all new warhol-style vege franks design--all done on softer, higher quality, cotton t-shirts. 

Boring?!

Loma Linda is a hub for kind hearts, vegetarians, and medical professionals...and that’s about it. People spend their days attending church, hiking Hulda Crooks Park and going to potlucks. The rest of the world might see this as uneventful, but we’re generally pretty happy with our lives here.

What’s Loma Lindia?

Loma Lindia is an expansive universe that encapsulates Adventist ideas, education, foods and culture. It’s not so much a place as it is a state of mind.

 

Who are we?

We’re three filmmakers, born and raised in the world of Loma Lindia. Our creative endeavors are fueled by vege meat and Martinellis, and we hope this latest project will help capture the essence of our hometown.

 

What we need?

We’re raising $3500 for this movement. With this amount, we will be able to cover our production run on much higher quality, ultra-soft cotton shirts along with all shipping and operational expenses. There will be an initial run of 200 shirts per design and we’ll be working with a local apparel company to have these shirts ready by mid-November. If we don’t meet our goal, we won’t be able to make this project happen.

story:
VALIMOR is a Hong Kong based watch & jewellery brand that aimed at creating original and unique designs for the global market. At VALIMOR we focus on the combination and harmony of the old with the new. Inspired by traditional eastern & western patterns, and using the latest technology, we create a stunning and original watches that are sure to get you compliments. Our philosophy is that life is a battle and we want to equip you with the confidence you need to stay strong and fight like a warrior in order to succeed.

These virtues are the main inspiration behind our brand. The name VALIMOR is a combination of VALiant and arMOR, the most important elements for every warrior, while our brand trademark logo is inspired by auspicious patterns.

Eternity Sword Collection

Each watch in this collection is equipped with a Japanese-made automatic mechanical movement from renowned movement maker, Miyota. The designs are inspired by powerful symbolic elements found on ancient swords and armour. Each part of this watch is an original design and developed independently to suit the individual watch. 

Our designer and engineers have spent more than a year, using their excellent watch-making skills to perfect our vision for the ultimate wristwatch design. With an intense level of craftsmanship our engineers turn hard metal materials into every unique and stylish watch part: Including the watch case inspired by dragon scales engraved on ancient armour, the sword shaped hands, the crown shaped watch crown, the dragon hide inspired leather strap, the hilt shaped metal strap buckle and the natural stone dial designs; all combine ancient elements with modern technology and watch making, creating a timeless and different watch series.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Extra straps and choosing your strap options!

You will be able to choice any strap model for your original pledge or buy extra straps and expand your strap choices by comments on our project page. 

All Caliburnus straps are equipped with a Quick Release Pin, so you don't need any tools to change the strap. You can easily switch between different straps, including leather straps and metal bracelets.

Aged metal bracelet

We finally chose ‘Option C’s' Metal Bracelet by our Kickstarter backers, which will use high-quality Solid Links structure, and doublebutton butterfly clasp. With the interchangeable structure, you can exchange our new metal bracelet for leather straps without any tools. The metal strap is now officially in the development stage. The design and drawings have been completed. And we expect that all tests will be completed in 4 weeks. After the sample progress is completed, photos of the finished bracelet will be available. We will try to provide photos after we completed the development of all fine-tuned details of the first sample. The expected delivery is in Oct, 2018 which is same as your watches.

 

DETAILS:

While the originality and uniqueness of the exterior design is important, it’s in the quality of the production and the movement underneath the dial that our watches really stand out from bulk of entry level to mid tier wristwatches on the market. A lot of attention goes into every detail of the watches to create timepieces that will serve you for many years to come. Below we will introduce some of the key features of our designs.

CASE & CROWN: 

VALIMOR fuses traditional high precision craftsmanship and contemporary design into a hard-stainless steel case through delicate engraving. The manufacturing process simplifies our trademark dragon design into a unique watch case with a dragon scale engraved steel bezel. The final look births a unique yet classic watch series. We use innovative PVD coating to add the antiquing effect to the solid and hard-wearing 316L stainless steel. PVD coated stainless steel ensures tough quality and maximum durability from our cases. In 2018, the VALIMOR design was patented in 28 members states of the European Union (EUIPO Design Patent #004742294-0001).

Dial:

This unique design is inspired by the legendary story of King Arthur and the Sword in the Stone. With jewellery-grade natural stones, each dial has a rich and unique texture, pattern, colour and personality. No two watches are the same do to the one-of-a-kind nature of the materials, making it a unique watch for watch lovers and collectors.

HANDS: 

In addition to using DIAMOND-CUT technology to cut the outline of the hands with ultimate precision, the hands feature a complex semi-polishing techniques that is usually reserved for high-end watches. Using this technique the hands are polished on one side and brushed on the other for a unique, yet subtle and understated, aesthetic. This design does not just serve to provide a high-end look, it keeps the contrast of the hands against the dial throughout different reflection and lighting conditions, to improve legibility and make it easier to read time. 

Taking into account the activities of the night, we use Swiss SuperLumiNova® BGW9 pigments for the lume on the watch hands to secure perfect legibility in the dark. The pigments are non-radioactive and environmental friendly. SuperLumiNova® is the preferred luminous pigment of Swiss watch industry and is renowned for keeping its luminescence well as time passes, to serve you for many years to come.

MOVEMENT: 

To attain maximum reliability we employ the stable Japanese-made MIYOTA 821A Automatic Mechanical Movement in all our watches. Whether you are a watch collector or a casual watch wearer, you will be very satisfied with the accuracy and stability of this movement. We even improved its efficiency by doing a few performance enhancing upgrades ourselves, e.g., we increased the weight of the automatic rotor to have extra mass, and decorated the movement to match the exterior of the watch in craftsmanship and design.

STRAP & BUCKLE: 

The Crocodile Leather Hornback Strap is an extremely rare feature on a watch, because each crocodile hide only makes for a few crocodile hornback straps. So we applied state-of-the-art technology to a real crocodile skin to get a detailed 3D scan of its texture. Based on these scans we developed a set of precision moulds to produce imitation crocodile hornback pattern on genuine top grain cowhide leather, providing a durable, soft and high quality hornback shaped leather strap. Accompanied by our buckle design inspired by the hilt of a sword, the strap adjusts to sit comfortably on any size of wrist, providing you with one of the most unique and stylish straps on the market.

PACKAGING:  

The watches ship in a custom designed dragon scale watch box with our brand symbol. The watch box is specially made with precision mould to keep the watch in place and protected during transport. The box will contain a card holder, an instruction manual, an official certificate of authenticity, and a unique serial number for each certificate authenticity card.

 

TIMELINE:

We Need Your Support!

We spent over a year on the design and communication with our vendors, all of them are ready for production. What we need now is your funding and support. We offer a very special price for early supporters as thanks for helping us get this project off the ground. Our watches will not be available at these prices on the market later, they are strictly for our backers and supporters. We promise to deliver quality and unique watches for every supporter. Your watch is estimated to be shipped out by Oct 2018 and we will provide free shipping for global buyers. It will provide a traceable number to guarantee that every supporter will receive their watch. In addition to purchasing our watches, we would like to invite you to join our FACEBOOK or INSTAGRAM fan page to be among the first to get exclusive first-mover offers and original backer benefits. We have more designs in the plans, so stay tuned for more great watches! Thank you again for taking the time to come to our project! We wish you joy with your unique new watch!

Still Have Question?

If you have any further questions, please contact us by Messenger or Email: info@valimor.com , we are pleased to help. 

Risks and challenges

VALIMOR is a brand new watch brand, but the team behind it has over 15 years of experience in the watch industry and a deep passion for beautiful watches. We work closely with world class manufacturing partners, already have tried and tested prototypes and are confident in the quality. We have full confidence in our partners so we foresee no issues in delivering the product to you. If we are not able to ship to you, we’ll refund your money. 
We realize creating and delivering a product is a complicated process and sometimes with unexpected delays, however this is why we have taken the utmost care and diligent preparation. If any of the information provided in this project changes then we will notify all of our backers in a transparent and timely manner.

story:
Love Nowadays ：

We live in a generation, filled with rich resources and multiple ways of life. Material abundance gives us a con-sumer-oriented world, an era of universal material consumption...This abundance gives us more choices to love others. However, is love still the way it was? Our spirit world is getting barren constantly. The message is so simple that can not satisfy various ways of communication between the lovers. Developing diversified ways for communication is becoming more and more necessary and urgent.

Material abundance gives us comfortable life without peace and happiness in our innermost being. Living in a world like this, love can also be materialized. It becomes expensive flowers, luxurious jewelries and famous perfume, however, can they represent love? No. Love is a spiritual journey with the couple hand in hand, en-joying the scenery on road and awareness exists in memory. If the couple lose their own memories, love will be gone with the wind and the most precious memory will have nowhere to store.

A witness of love：Rilove is unique, only could be owned by couples. Its duty is to guard love, to serve couples, to record triviali-ties and to advocate the idea “true love can transcend common customs and money”. So, once you store a piece of memory. Minds will give 50 cents back to you, until the products are free, which means totally return-ing $300 to you. Meanwhile, you get 600 pieces of memories through Rilove. With present crowd-funding price, the couple can not only possess their memories and Rilove for free, but also can earn more love fund!！ Besides,we also have surprise for faithful couples: if both of you use Rilove for 1314 days and get married, you can use Rilove to exchange a diamond ring which costs ＄6000 ,precious memory and our heartfelt bless! Minds contributes to create a token of promise that we really need. Rilove will guard your love and accompany you into marriage.The diamond ring witnesses your love into eternity.

About Rilove：

Rilove could only be owned by couples or the single with the person you are chasing for and deliver your true love to him or her. Rilove has a particular function of delayed push technology --- to push your most affective and complete memory to the other after 14 days or at the most appropriate moment.

Diamond represents eternal love while Rilove witnesses the growth of love. Rilove, as the guardian of love, believes it should be represented not only by material and money but help and care for each other. During the love period, Rilove collects unique and precious photos and videos and is presented by taking time as a clue. Rilove has delayed push function which can conceal the most affecting and complete memory for some time and then push them to the other at a particular moment.

About Minds Team:

Minds Wear Team mostly consists of professors and students in artistic universities. We are from all kinds of majors ,have different specialties but all do well in our own area.We are here for the same artistic perception of life , learn from each other for the same dream and make progresses together. We believe that technology is just a way----to give life more convenience, high quality and art. Although we are not“Industry Elitists”, we are a group of about 20 people now, developed from one person originally due to the same hobby. It has been approximately two months since the last failed crowdfunding, the money we received before will be returned to our supporters gradually. Now we are back in Indiegogo, because we find the Real Mission of our products. It’s not only a combination of fashion and technology, but also more close to our daily life, helping us lead a more humanized life. Combined with technology, but not restricted by technology, we publicize Youth itself. We always believe technology makes our life more beautiful.Internet is restarting everything now. However, it’s not universal or sole.But we believe Minds is universal and sole, cannot be copied. She will restrike life.We shall be thankful for living in such an age.

About Minds Platform:

How to face and solve the problems:

Considering the present technology in market, the bulk of ring restricts its function development unavoidablely. ALthough we have more advanced ideas on Rilove function in the early. We only reserved the most core part of Rilove. In fact, the product doesn't need much function at present, because it just serves for love, not other things. On technology, there are professional technicians in our team. However, due to poor experience, we have some problems in product design, material quality and inner structure design. With long period exploration and improvement, including asking for help , searching on the Internet, continous trial , finally we go to one of the most well-developed and mature city which is famous for producing electronic products ----Shenzhen ,to solve our technological problems. It is all known that some leading corporation such as Apple, Sumsang and Huawei etc. all have representative factory to produce in Shenzhen. After several trips, the program can go on with high quality. We cooperate with the most suitable factory for Rilove and are looking forward to find a professional marketing group to exhibit our expected products together.

Why support us?

Rilove is the witness of your love. Due to Rilove, you will know how to show and manage love well. We create this product with insipriation of art, to achieve what you want with smart product. All these need your help too. Your help will give us endless energe and confidence. We are looking forward to your joining. Through the Indigogo program to accomplish Rilove and Minds. Recently we are looking for investments in China, the crowd funding on Indidgogo is also quite important for us. It will be a marketing report for our investors. We know the aimed money is not enough for production. We shall set up a public e-mail box to interact with the supporters promptly and know people's ideas about Rilove. Come with us to witness the success of Rilove and listen to the call of age !

How to deal with the crowd funding money.

The exhibition of Rilove on Indiegogo is mainly for collecting the public'sc response before its mass production. The growth and change of Rilove depends on your suggestion and support. The money received from crowd funding will only be used to a small quantity of Rilove manufacturing and production. To achieve our pursuit for Rilove perfect quality, we will insist on the standard no matter how much it costs. Recently, we need investment in China to make the manufacturing go on and we will establish a strong group to run a national company.It's a big challenge, we know, it's not easy for us to manage a national company at present. However, it's not impossible. First, he needs your help. Then we will merge the resources. Business courses and to do more outstanding management staff with the help of Chinese government and risk investment, because of Rilove, Minds as well as you. It is the most important thing for us now to pay attention to the product itself and supporters. We have no splendid funds to make large-scale promotion over the world, thus your support are quite significant for Rilove and Minds team. To some extent, you decide the oriention of our development for a long time. While supporting Rilove, you are also supporting our dream. For now we are one. A friend in need is a friend indeed. Join us, friends! As a return, you will receive a well-created product with a much lower price than market price since Rilove comes true due to your support.

Normal Q & As:

Shipping: For INTERNATIONAL orders, you may need to add extra $20 for postage. For the claimed perks in which the postage hasn't been charged , we may charge the postage when we are shipping. Thanks for your understanding. 

Estimated Shipping date: December.

Water Resistence: Daily using.

Material: Not certain yet. It still needs a professional test to determine the final material which needs your fund to support but it is totally feasible with high-quality plastic. We're hoping that the front part for the LED lights be high-quality glass.

Ways to contact us: Facebook community: Minds Wear. Our team members' message in the introduction as you can see.

More supporters here!

story:
Das Klub (HTTP://DASKLUB.COM)

Das Klub is an industrial dance kommunity website. It needs to reach at least 20 t-shirt orders to justify production.

If the campaign reaches funding by the deadline, you will receive the t-shirt in your requested size. If not, the amount will be refunded. Once you have paid the amount, you will be contacted for the size you want in the case this campaign succeeds. 

 

LIMITED EDITION, ONLY 20!

story:
Dangle, the world's first minimalist credit card case for a new titanium Apple Card. A card case redefined as a versatile lifestyle accessory and a lifehacker. Regular card cases available in the market are just variations of a wallet that is stored in a bag or pocket, and the credit card needs to be taken out of the bag and then out of the wallet for transactions. With Dangle, you no longer need to dig through your bag and then struggle to get the card out of the wallet. Dangle is worn around neck, wrist, or waist or clipped onto a bag. All you have to do is flip the cover and touch the machine. Dangle is a verb that means an object is hang or swing loosely that perfectly translate our product and our brand. Dangle provides a subtle but innovative lifestyle experience while functioning as an accessory statement.

* Dangle is born from idea inspired by the launch of Apple Card from Apple Inc. in 2019 

 

 

Product Design Concept

Dangle is thin, slim and convenient for you to wear and carry it however you prefer. Dangle’s soft and elastic silicone encapsulates your beautiful titanium Apple Card from scratching, getting dirty, and chipping out. The connector on the top left side, made with more solid material joined with soft silicone, adds structural element to stabilize the case while preventing potential damage when connected with a ring or a necklace. Dangle offers different color options for the connector as an accent to the design and provides individualistic style element.

 

Intuitive Design and Form Factor

Dangle’s intuitive design is inspired by our own experience and created based on our ergonomics research and observing user interactions with credit card and payment machine. We strongly believed convenience and ease of use is achieved by simplicity in form factor that ultimately gives greater moment of pleasure for users. Minimalist aesthetics of Dangle translates to functions that are self-explanatory. Users are attracted by soft and elastic texture and naturally and gently flip the case whenever they swipe or insert Apple Card into credit card machine and intuitively understands to flex back slip. 

 

Material: Silicone

Dangle’s minimal but multi-functional design was achieved by high-performance material silicone. Silicone offers the right amount of elasticity, and its stable material lasts long while retaining its color. In addition, its durability withstands extreme temperature and is resistant to heat and moisture. Silicone has smooth and non-stick surface that is easy to clean and dismisses odor or grease. It is safe to human and widely used such as in medical or kitchen appliances. Therefore, it is a perfect material to cover your titanium Apple Card preventing scratches, dirt, and damage. Dangle intentionally uses translucent silicone to highlight form and colors of Apple Card.

 

Wear with Style

Designing Dangle as a wearable was one of our key ideas. You can essentially wear it on your body or play with it as a ring, band, necklace or whatever you like to mix and match like a fashion accessory and let it “dangle”. You can hang AirPod, car keys, house keys, and Dangle to complete your fashion style head to toe.

 

 

Wear Dangle when you... 

  • Riding: Scooter & Skateboard
  • Athleisure: Yoga, Gym, Running & etc.
  • Travel: Hiking, Travel Carrier
  • Party: Hang on Tote or Belt Bag
  • Urban life: Bike, Subway, Yellow taxi

 

How to use when you insert chip

 

 

Design Problems We Discovered. 

Our idea started from our own experience and the need for an intuitive and versatile credit card case. After receiving the first ever physical Apple Card, as much as we love the beautiful aesthetics of the new credit card, we saw the need for a case to safely carry the card.

We found that Apple mentioned protecting and maintaining the condition of titanium Apple Card  in the Apple websiteand provided cleaning, storing, and carrying guide. According to Apple, a titanium Apple Card comes into contact with hard surfaces or materials, it's possible that the coating can be damaged and also comes in contact with contaminants that can cause stains. Apple provides guides as below on how to safely store and carry titanium Apple Card. (*excerpted from Apple website)

  • Store your titanium Apple Card in a wallet, pocket, or bag made of soft materials.
  • Place your card in a slot in your wallet or billfold without touching another credit card. If two credit cards are placed in the same slot your card could become scratched.
  • Don't place or store your titanium Apple Card card near magnets. If your card is placed close to a magnetic latch on a purse or bag, the magnetic strip can become demagnetized.
  • Don't place your titanium Apple Card in a pocket or bag that contains loose change, keys, or other potentially abrasive objects.

Imagine a few different scenarios: You are trying to go for a run after work with a cell phone in your hand and AirPod on your ears. You ponder ‘Should I bring my wallet or credit card holder?’ for a few minutes. Your hands are full of your belongings and you have a thirst for water, and you are struggling to find your sweaty pocket while everyone behind you is waiting for you to pay the cashier.

From our experience and user observation for a typical wallet or card case usage, we learned about pain points; users first need to find the wallet from a bag, then take out the card from the wallet to swipe or insert the card onto the machine only to then put the card back to the wallet and to the bag. Mobile payments and wireless RFID card made life much easier for users but in reality, payment infrastructures are not always up-to-date. We researched products in the market and we were not satisfied with existing products as they are too bulky, overcomplicated, too gimmicky, too expensive, and moreover it did not look stylish. 

 

How We Solved.

In the very beginning, our team brainstormed to improve an existing card case with more functions to protect the Apple Card containing sensitive Titanium.

Unlike other credit cards, Apple Card only has user name engraved on the card without any information typically written on a credit card. We assumed such minimalistic design was possible because the society is becoming cashless with more virtual transactions on digital platforms. A credit card is more of a symbolic medium of a lifestyle than a physical object with values. Therefore, our team agreed that a wallet no longer has the same meaning or value to users. After careful trend and culture research, our team came up with a bold idea of a credit card case as a wearable accessory.

Our design goals contained threefolds; subtle design that improves your daily life and reflects the change in society, material that is easy to manufacture and manipulate, and a wearable product that can be customized and fashionable.

 

 

DANGLE on connector with key chains, necklace, or anything you hold to wear

 

FLIP  to swipe to hook with key ring, necklace, anything you hold on to wear

 

LIGHT lightweight made with silicone 

 

COLOR three different color options : white, gray & orange

 

 

WEARABLE hook on connector with any type of rings, bands, or necklace to wear

 

* Dimension : Outer - 60*105mm / Inner - Standard Card Size

 

 

Brand Identity

Dangle means to hang or swing loosely. This word perfectly summarizes our product and design philosophy to create a subtle lifestyle intervention through innovation. Our product shares Apple Card’s minimalistic aesthetics while the connector on our case gives a fun twist by letting users be creative and complete their individualist style. This idea reflects our team collaboration. Our team members are located in different coasts, countries, and continents, but we are well structured and organized, sharing love for design and creativity. 

 

Dangle is a human-made.  

Our team are located in Seoul, Los Angeles, and New York with different work and lifestyle but share love for creativity, design, and entrepreneurship. We collaborated with best of our talent, creativity, entrepreneurship, and best local resources from our own cities to bring Dangle to you.

Andy, Seoul : Industrial Design, Design Research, Product Management

 

​Ellen, New York : Design Research, Brand Design, Social Media Design, Communication Strategy

 

Wade, Los Angeles : Project Management, Design Research, Content Design, UX/UI Design

 

 

Style Pack : $10 (save 16%)

1 Dangle & 1 Premium Carabiner / Limited Quantity: 100 / Free Shipping

(*Actual carabiner somewhat differs from the image above)

 

Traveler Pack : $10 (save 16%)

1 Dangle & 1 Luggage Name Card / Limited Quantity: 100 / Free Shipping

(*A printed and plastic luggage info card will be included.)

 

[FEATURED] Starter Pack : $12 (save 50%)

2 Dangles / Free Shipping

 

Quadra Pack : : $24 (save 50%)

4 Dangles / Free Shipping

 

Penta Pack : : $28 (save 53%)

5 Dangles / Free Shipping

 

Hexa Pack : : $32 (save 55%)

6 Dangles / Free Shipping

 

Volume Pack : $50 (save 58%)

10 Dangles / Best for small retailers and corporate merchandises

 

 

Dangle will be produced by assembling silicone and plastic parts that are manufactured with injection molding. Silicone products are widely manufactured and sold in the market. Silicone is a material that is relatively easy to create molds and manufacture by injection molding with a single mold instead of using two molds. We are already in discussions with few manufacturers since October 2019 and will arrive on decision after reviewing manufacturers’ production capacities and track records.

 

Manufacturing Plan (8 weeks+)

  1. Search manufacturers based in Guangzhou(China) and discuss manufacturing process
  2. Improve final product design updating with feedback from both internal team and crowdfunding supporters (7 days)
  3. Produce sample mold and final checkup on production capacity (7 days)
  4. Create final molds and conduct test injection - Check up injection materials, finalize colors and material strengths (14 days)
  5. Improve with feedback from testing and finalize mold (4 days)
  6. Start injection (7 days)
  7. Print logo on case surface and assemble with connector part (5 days)
  8. Packaging and U.S delivery (7 days)

 

Technical Considerations

Texture is critical for silicon products. To achieve high quality soft texture without post-production finishes, material selection and decisions for strength is incredibly important and we need to figure out the right strength to hold the card that is easy to flex and durable to movement. For this reason, we will run numerous testings and our timeline could be delayed.

 

Roadmap : From Idea to Backer
story_txt:
Dangle, the world's first minimalist credit card case for a new titanium Apple Card. A card case redefined as a versatile lifestyle accessory and a lifehacker. Regular card cases available in the market are just variations of a wallet that is stored in a bag or pocket, and the credit card needs to be taken out of the bag and then out of the wallet for transactions. With Dangle, you no longer need to dig through your bag and then struggle to get the card out of the wallet. Dangle is worn around neck, wrist, or waist or clipped onto a bag. All you have to do is flip the cover and touch the machine. Dangle is a verb that means an object is hang or swing loosely that perfectly translate our product and our brand. Dangle provides a subtle but innovative lifestyle experience while functioning as an accessory statement.
* Dangle is born from idea inspired by the launch of Apple Card from Apple Inc. in 2019 



 
 


Product Design Concept

Dangle is thin, slim and convenient for you to wear and carry it however you prefer. Dangle’s soft and elastic silicone encapsulates your beautiful titanium Apple Card from scratching, getting dirty, and chipping out. The connector on the top left side, made with more solid material joined with soft silicone, adds structural element to stabilize the case while preventing potential damage when connected with a ring or a necklace. Dangle offers different color options for the connector as an accent to the design and provides individualistic style element.
 
Intuitive Design and Form Factor

Dangle’s intuitive design is inspired by our own experience and created based on our ergonomics research and observing user interactions with credit card and payment machine. We strongly believed convenience and ease of use is achieved by simplicity in form factor that ultimately gives greater moment of pleasure for users. Minimalist aesthetics of Dangle translates to functions that are self-explanatory. Users are attracted by soft and elastic texture and naturally and gently flip the case whenever they swipe or insert Apple Card into credit card machine and intuitively understands to flex back slip. 
 
Material: Silicone

Dangle’s minimal but multi-functional design was achieved by high-performance material silicone. Silicone offers the right amount of elasticity, and its stable material lasts long while retaining its color. In addition, its durability withstands extreme temperature and is resistant to heat and moisture. Silicone has smooth and non-stick surface that is easy to clean and dismisses odor or grease. It is safe to human and widely used such as in medical or kitchen appliances. Therefore, it is a perfect material to cover your titanium Apple Card preventing scratches, dirt, and damage. Dangle intentionally uses translucent silicone to highlight form and colors of Apple Card.
 
Wear with Style

Designing Dangle as a wearable was one of our key ideas. You can essentially wear it on your body or play with it as a ring, band, necklace or whatever you like to mix and match like a fashion accessory and let it “dangle”. You can hang AirPod, car keys, house keys, and Dangle to complete your fashion style head to toe.
 
 

Wear Dangle when you... 

Riding: Scooter & Skateboard
Athleisure: Yoga, Gym, Running & etc.
Travel: Hiking, Travel Carrier
Party: Hang on Tote or Belt Bag
Urban life: Bike, Subway, Yellow taxi


 
How to use when you insert chip

 
 

Design Problems We Discovered. 

Our idea started from our own experience and the need for an intuitive and versatile credit card case. After receiving the first ever physical Apple Card, as much as we love the beautiful aesthetics of the new credit card, we saw the need for a case to safely carry the card.
We found that Apple mentioned protecting and maintaining the condition of titanium Apple Card  in the Apple websiteand provided cleaning, storing, and carrying guide. According to Apple, a titanium Apple Card comes into contact with hard surfaces or materials, it's possible that the coating can be damaged and also comes in contact with contaminants that can cause stains. Apple provides guides as below on how to safely store and carry titanium Apple Card. (*excerpted from Apple website)

Store your titanium Apple Card in a wallet, pocket, or bag made of soft materials.
Place your card in a slot in your wallet or billfold without touching another credit card. If two credit cards are placed in the same slot your card could become scratched.
Don't place or store your titanium Apple Card card near magnets. If your card is placed close to a magnetic latch on a purse or bag, the magnetic strip can become demagnetized.
Don't place your titanium Apple Card in a pocket or bag that contains loose change, keys, or other potentially abrasive objects.

Imagine a few different scenarios: You are trying to go for a run after work with a cell phone in your hand and AirPod on your ears. You ponder ‘Should I bring my wallet or credit card holder?’ for a few minutes. Your hands are full of your belongings and you have a thirst for water, and you are struggling to find your sweaty pocket while everyone behind you is waiting for you to pay the cashier.
From our experience and user observation for a typical wallet or card case usage, we learned about pain points; users first need to find the wallet from a bag, then take out the card from the wallet to swipe or insert the card onto the machine only to then put the card back to the wallet and to the bag. Mobile payments and wireless RFID card made life much easier for users but in reality, payment infrastructures are not always up-to-date. We researched products in the market and we were not satisfied with existing products as they are too bulky, overcomplicated, too gimmicky, too expensive, and moreover it did not look stylish.

Unlike other credit cards, Apple Card only has user name engraved on the card without any information typically written on a credit card. A credit card is more of a symbolic medium of a lifestyle than a physical object with values. Therefore, our team agreed that a wallet no longer has the same meaning or value to users. After careful trend and culture research, our team came up with a bold idea of a credit card case as a wearable accessory.
Our design goals contained threefolds; subtle design that improves your daily life and reflects the change in society, material that is easy to manufacture and manipulate, and a wearable product that can be customized and fashionable.

story:
Ever Had an App Idea?

Ever wish you could design it using tools you already know like Powerpoint or Keynote on your PC or your Mac? Mockapp 2.0 will enable you to do just that. No learning curve. No new software to install. Welcome to app design heaven!

 

Mockapp 2.0 Includes

- App Design Library file with all the iPhone's user interface elements (bars, buttons, etc.) that you can just copy and paste into your own app designs.

- App Canvas file that you paste your app's buttons, etc. into.

- App Icon Maker template to design your own app icon.


mockapp comes with 2 sets of templates, one for Microsoft Powerpoint and the other for Apple Keynote to satisfy PC and Mac users alike.


Huge Design Library

The library file includes a complete set of high-resolution, pixel-perfect iPhone user interface elements you can copy, paste into your app designs, customize, etc. 

It also teaches you when you should use each UI element and when not to use it all according to Apple's own guidelines.

The user interface elements you'll get include:

  • Bars (Status bars, Navigation bars, Toolbars, Tab bars)
  • Buttons
  • 500 (!!!) icons
  • Alert messages
  • Map elements
  • Date and time pickers
  • Action sheets
  • Modal views
  • Keyboards
  • Backgrounds
  • etc.


500 Resizable iOS 7 Icons

All 500 icons will be provided in vector format which means they can be resized to ANY size and colored in any color. And in the unlikely case you can't find the icons you need, mockapp will put you in touch with the designer of this iOS 7 icon set so they can make you the custom icons you need.


Precise Replica of iOS 7

Each UI element has been drawn as a vector shape and colored manually by me to be an exact replica of its iOS original. You can for example rename the buttons, resize them, etc. And the only pre-requisite is that you are familiar with Powerpoint or Keynote.


Just Copy and Paste UI Elements

The mockapp canvas file is the high-resolution representation of an iPhone screen onto which you can paste UI elements to layout your design. Each screen can be designed on a separate slide and you can even use Powerpoint or Keynote's animation feature to create clickable hyperlinks and simulate navigation between slides.


App Icon Maker Template (Pro version only)

mockapp Pro will even include an App Icon Make template with many app icon backgrounds and foreground elements to choose from as well as Apple's new golden ratio grid system so you can properly place and size your icon graphics.


Completeness Guarantee

If you get mockapp 2.0 Pro, you'll even benefit from my 100% Completeness Guarantee: If you can't find a standard iOS 7 user interface element you need for your app design, I will make it and provide it to you at no extra charge!

Who Am I?

My name is Dotan Saguy. I've been designing iPhone and iPad apps for 3 years under the brand Lifelike Apps. My apps have had over 10 Million downloads to date and several of them are regularly #1 in their App Store category. 

You may also have seen some of my mobile accessory inventions on Kickstarter:

http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/dotan/smarter-stand-for-ipad

http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/dotan/smart-cargo-for-ipadtm

http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/dotan/smarter-stand-for-iphone-and-ipod-touch

Why Did I Create mockapp?

When I first started designing apps in 2009, I ran into a big problem:

I'm not a professionally trained designer and I'm not an app programmer so I could not find any tools to design apps.

That's when I started drawing toolbars, buttons and other iOS user interface elements into Keynote (the only design tool I knew well enough to design into).

And that's how Mockapp 1.0 was born back in 2009. It was incomplete, low resolution and is now out of date since it was based on the iOS 3 user interface (current version is iOS 7). Still, mockapp 1.0 was downloaded by tens of thousands of people who like me were looking for an easier way to design apps using tools they already knew. It's been used extensively in schools. universities, by professional design firms and by hobbyists alike.

It's now been over 3 years and I've been so busy that I've not had the time to upgrade Mockapp to the latest iPhone UI and screen resolution and the latest iOS look and feel.


Why I Need Your Support

I've been trying to create a new version of mockapp for a couple of years now but each time I get delayed by client projects and other paid distractions... So I haven't been able to find enough downtime to spend on mockapp and each time I try a new version of iOS comes out, requiring me to start for scratch...

That's why this time I've decided to release mockapp 2.0 using a crowd funding campaign: I want to raise enough money to turn down client projects and focus entirely on releasing an insanely great mockapp 2.0 in December. I've already started designing (as you can see from some of the screenshots above) and it's going to be amazing!

 

FAQ

Can one use Mockapp to design directly on an iPhone or an iPad?

I get this question A LOT. But when you think about it: Why would anyone ever want to perform something as important and precise as designing an app on the tiny screen of a mobile device and without the precision of a mouse or a trackpad? Designing an iPhone app requires a lot of control and precision as you position and customize lots of tiny user interface elements down to the pixel. As glamorous and ironic as it would be, trying to design an iPhone app on an iPhone or even an iPad is a bad idea.

So I'm sorry to say that the simple answer is no. You'll need a Mac or a PC and believe me: you'll make much better iPhone apps that way!

Why design in Powerpoint or Keynote as opposed to Photoshop?

2 simple reasons: (1) Everyone knows how to use Powerpoint or Keynote and (2) Even expert designers who use Photoshop all day can't use it efficiently enough to create app mockups. So they're having to use a mockup tool and then design in Photoshop. And since the app design process is iterative in nature, they have to repeat this inefficient process many times to make necessary changes. With mockapp, you can mockup and design right in Powerpoint and Keynote and iterate your design faster and more efficiently.

Is mockapp an application?

No. mockapp is composed of template files that can be opened in Powerpoint and Keynote. No need to install any software.

Will it work on Mac and PC?

Yes. mockapp will work on either a Mac or a PC as long as you have Powerpoint or Keynote installed.

Can I also design iPad apps with mockapp or only iPhone apps?

There is a version of mockapp available for iPad app design. It is quite good but is currently only available in non-retina resolution and it only includes iOS 5 UI elements (as opposed to iOS 7). You can buy it now at mockapp.com and download it immediately if you wish but be aware it won't be of much use to design iOS 7 styled apps.

Will mockapp create a finished app?

No. mockapp is a design tool. Not a programming tool. Just like when designing an app in Photoshop, an app designed in mockapp still needs to be programmed.

story:
Quotes from some of the letters we have received since announcing Artemis:





If you encounter an emergency, simply tap the Artemis necklace 3 times. 

  1. Artemis uses a wireless connection with your smart phone to send an emergency transmission to our private security agency which is available 24/7.
  2. The necklace buzzes to confirm your request has been received. 
  3. The security operator uses live audio from your necklace, coupled with GPS data and your personal profile to determine whether to contact police, fire or medical staff to help you. 
  4. Artemis simultaneously sends a text message to your choice of loved ones with your current location and a  request for help. 


Canceling A Request

Artemis is difficult to trigger by accident, but if you change your mind you can cancel it via the Artemis smart phone app (see the FAQ for more detail).

Checking That Artemis is Connected

If you want to check if your Artemis module is connected to your phone and able to send emergency requests, simply pop it out of the necklace and flip it back and forth briefly to look for a green light.
You will have access to your audio recordings, location and motion data, which may be useful in potential legal proceedings. This data is immediately streamed to the cloud and stored securely for you. Here is the final design for the module:



Moving the Artemis Module to a New Piece of Jewelry

Just pop the module into the back of any Artemis-compatible jewelry. A magnet attaches it securely so you won't have to worry about losing it. The module contains all the intelligence of Artemis and it listens for your taps and requests help for you.

(We are continuing to decrease the size of the Artemis pendant and Module and a larger working prototype is shown in the picture.)

Charging

Charging Artemis is as simple as placing your necklace on a wireless charging pad once every 2 weeks before you go to bed. In the morning, pick it up and you're good to go.

Size

The pendant necklace is slightly larger than a quarter. The Artemis module which inserts into the back is slightly smaller in diameter than a quarter.

Note: The final design shown here is smaller than the larger prototypes shown in the videos.6



How Does Artemis Compare?




We need to have a subscription fee to cover the expense of having security operators standing by 24/7, maintaining our internal emergency response systems, and wirelessly updating your Artemis with new security features in the future.

Artemis will deliver emergency messages to pre-defined contacts via email if you do not have a subscription plan. International plans currently support SMS text messages or email only (See INTERNATIONAL COVERAGE section below). A plan with direct security operator response is $19/mo and is currently only available in the USA. Limited text-messaging plans are available for as little at $1/mo.



  • PHONES and OS:
    iPhone 4 or later supported- Dec 2015.
    Android supported - Jul 2016.
  • BATTERY:
    You will need to charge Artemis overnight roughly once every 2 weeks. Your phone must also be operational to use Artemis.
    (We recommend purchasing an external phone charger to keep your phone topped up if it gets low.)
  • CONNECTIVITY:
    As long as your phone has a working data connection (e.g. WIFI, GPRS, LTE, etc) then Artemis can communicate with the emergency response center
    (if a data connection is not present when an emergency request is received, then the app will store the request and try to send it when it reconnects.)
  • SUBSCRIPTION:
    For most services, Artemis requires an affordable monthly subscription. This is used to pay for the security operations staff, other security infrastructure, and so that we don't have to charge you a large fee for accidental false alarms like other companies do. Plans will range from $1/mo to $19/mo depending on the support level (see Price List above). Artemis comes with a free full-coverage-subscription for the first 60 days. There is one subscription per/user and each Artemis module is personalized to that user and plan. Artemis will process emergency requests without a subscription, but reverts to email-based alerts to friends.
  • INTERNATIONAL COVERAGE: LIMITED SUPPORT FOR NOW
    Currently our security operations partners can only cover verbal emergency requests that require fire/medical/police response if they are made in the USA. Travel within the USA is fully supported. At launch, international buyers (or international travelers with an international data plan) will be able to have Artemis send international text messages and alert emails to predefined contacts with current GPS location, audio recordings, and a request for help (depending on their subscription level). We are looking to expand police/fire/medical/security coverage to other countries in the future. (see the Price List above for International Plan pricing)
  • AGE:
    Artemis is designed for active fashionable adults age 16-70. Other products such as Filip, LifeAlert and SmartStones are more suitable for children and for less-active seniors.


We are confident that we will be able to manufacture, deliver and support necklaces for all backers if we reach our $200,000 base goal. 

If we do not raise the $200,000 by December 12, then if you backed us, all of your money is automatically returned by Indiegogo at the end of the campaign.

Alternatively, if we reach funding milestones past 200k, then we will be able to provide additional perks to all customers (see chart).




Sense6 Design has four additional team members who contribute fashion, electrical engineering, social media, jewelry design, safety and business expertise. The founders have known each other for 7 years and have collaborated on two mobile startups previously.

Our team members are seasoned travelers who have experienced adventure, street crime, and worry over the safety of loved ones. We are passionate about making the world a safer place and we feel that wearable computing has a role in making that happen. We believe smart jewelry can simultaneously aid personal empowerment, beauty, and safety. Artemis is our first step towards living in a world free from the threat of personal violence.

The world is still a dangerous place. Regardless of whether you look at crime statistics (see below), read your local newspaper headlines, or simply talk to your friends about their crime experiences, it's clear that we don't live in a safe environment. While the longer term goals of improving education, opportunities and mutual-respect deserve support, they don't solve the problem of you having to walk home alone tonight. We think it is surprising that more of our advanced technology hasn't been designed for women, and to solve problems relevant to them.

A Weekend in San Francisco

Source: SpotCrime.com- Dates: Oct 10th - Oct 12th - See Live Crime Data

Registered Sex Offenders in San Francisco

Source: City-Data.com

Recent News Stories

  • Arkansas Real Estate Agent Beverly Carter Targeted Because She Was 'Woman That Worked Alone'
  • Suspect In Missing UVa Student Case, Jesse Matthew, Linked To 2009 Murder
  • 40 Years of College Football's Sexual-Assault Problem

When our CEO Jeff Axup was assaulted in two separate instances while traveling, he got to thinking about what it would take to have instant access to help, as well as recorded evidence of what occurred. Currently, it is often the case that no one is alerted that a crime is taking place until long after it is over. Frequently there is little objective evidence of what occurred during a crime, which allows the perpetrators to spin whatever story they wish. After talking with hundreds of women and men about their crime experiences, it was clear that something could be done to improve on existing 911 systems and help empower people. When we review the US national crime statistics below, they make us mad. When we talk with people from Columbia, Mexico, India and other countries they tell us similar stories about unacceptable levels of crime in their countries.

No one should have to live in a society where violent crime is this prevalent and where we have to be scared walking alone at night. We have chosen to channel our anger into making a piece of technology that is both beautiful and elegant while also helping to reduce the impact and prevalence of violent crime. Please help us take a step towards making people safer by purchasing a necklace if you can, and telling your friends if they worry about the safety of their loved ones.


  • Customer research with over 600 women on topics ranging from safety concerns, features and jewelry styles.
  • 350+ women are signed up to participate in our Beta Program. (Sign up here)
  • Completed our PCB and Electrical Engineering design and have 10 functioning prototypes. (These will get smaller.)

  • Currently evaluating offers from several potential private security firms with 20+ years of experience to respond to your calls.
  • We are interviewing several manufacturing firms (CMs) to see which is most equipped to handle production of our unique jewelry and electronics product. We have extensive experience with manufacturing electronics products from previous projects.
  • Finalized jewelry design and have a beautiful sterling-silver casted version in our hands.6 (see charging video above)
  • We have a working prototype of the iPhone app which communicates with the necklace and the security company.
  • We've put over a year of development effort into this project to bring it to the stage where we need your funding to move forward.

We have put a year of effort and $30,000 of our own money into researching and designing a product that will make a difference for people who feel unsafe and want extra protection. We have overcome several hurdles in determining how to make the device work and how to design it so that it will be regularly worn. Now we need a minimum of $200,000 in funds to begin manufacturing it.  If we don't raise the money then it is unlikely that the product will be made.

Producing high quality jewelry and micro-electronics is not inexpensive, and we want to get Artemis in the hands of thousands of people who need greater security. Now we need your help to get to the final stage.



Do you know any people who:

  • have jobs that place them in dangerous situations
  • are parents with daughters or college students
  • are night shift workers
  • regularly exercise outside by themselves
  • are living in an unsafe neighborhood
  • are journalists with an interest in personal safety

Please let them know that we need their help.
You can use the Tell a Friend button on our web site and more information is available on our Press Page.

  • We have currently invested about $30,000 of our own funds (and our families) and significant time into this project. The Indiegogo campaign will give us enough to produce the product, but we will also need other funding sources in the future to continue operating the security infrastructure. We have already begun discussions with several angel and VC groups.
  • We are building a security product. You can't try to change the world without having some legal risk. It is possible that in the future we will face some legal action relating to recording audio of crimes or cases where requests fail due to any number of variables outside our control. We have brought on excellent legal council to help us navigate these issues. We are also partnering with an external security company that already handles emergency calls and will accept some of the liability associated with the Artemis service.
  • We are shipping physical products and some of our product components will be made overseas. There will almost certainly be delays in some parts of the production process. To mitigate this, we plan to manufacture and assemble as much of the product in the San Francisco Bay Area as possible and we will be working with a CM with a good reputation and strong ties to Asia.


  • How do I put the Artemis Module in other pieces of jewelry?
  • Who is contacted if I call for help?
  • How do I report an emergency with Artemis and ensure I get help?
  • What if it goes off by accident? Can I cancel a request?
  • What safety situations is Artemis useful for?
  • Where does Artemis work? (Also see Requirements above) 
  • Will Artemis work outside the US (internationally)? (Also see the Requirements > International section above)
  • Can people tell that I’m wearing Artemis?
  • Can I buy Artemis for my girlfriend/wife?
  • Why can’t I just use my cell phone to dial 911?
  • Is Artemis rechargeable?
  • What if my phone is stolen or I’m out of range of my phone?
  • Is Artemis going to be available in bracelets, earrings, or rings?
  • Does Artemis make any noise?
  • Is Artemis just for women?
  • Is Artemis appropriate for my child or elderly parent?
  • Does Artemis make me safer?
  • Can Artemis prevent crimes from happening?
  • Will wearing Artemis make me feel scared more?
  • Will Artemis produce more 'false-alarms' for Police and 911?
  • What phones are compatible? (Also see Requirements section above)
  • Is Artemis waterproof?
  • Are there any other features you have planned?
  • I have allergies. What is your product made of?
  • Will Artemis work if I don't have an active subscription plan?(Also see Requirements > Subscription section above)
  • Can I let my friend or family member borrow my Artemis when I'm not using it?
  • I own a security company in a country outside the US. We would like to provide security services for Artemis.
  • I am interested in investing in your company.
  • What happens to my contribution if the Indiegogo campaign doesn't reach its funding goal of 200k by Dec. 12?
  • How big is the Artemis pendant and module? Why does it look big in the pictures?
  • My question isn't covered here. Can you add it? Yes, please email us.



Footnotes:
1. Artemis jewelry currently only comes in a pendant style. We plan to rapidly begin producing other necklaces, bracelets and other jewelry styles when we have more funding. Help us reach 500k in funding to win a free running bracelet for all Artemis jewelry purchasers! If you are an established jewelry company that wants to produce a line of Artemis-friendly safety jewelry please contact us.
2. No charge for accidental requests. Emergency requests go directly to a private security operator, so the government won't bill you for accidental requests. Prank calls may results in fees so please Artemis responsibly.
3. See 'Is Artemis waterproof?' in the FAQ above.
4. See 'Where can I use Artemis?' in the FAQ above.
5. We have spoken to 911 staff. The GPS information they receive can be wildly inaccurate. We have a method of triangulating to greater accuracy and tracking you over time in case of a kidnapping, which is superior to what 911 uses. 911 also doesn't immediately notify your loved ones.
6. We are continuing to shrink the size of the Artemis module and the pendant design surrounding it. The exact design may change slightly before we ship, probably to be slimmer.
7. All necklaces (except for the Solid-Palladium version) are crafted with high quality plating in Sterling Silver, White Gold and Gold respectively. Each necklace will have a matching chain included with the pendant and the Artemis module.
8. See 'REQUIREMENTS' section above.
† Special thanks to our models:
Karina Kramer, Lana Ricketts, Alicia Barry, Nancy Grace McMillian, Jessica Sanchez, and Ludmila Kisseleva, Peter Eggleton, Forrest and Kayla Sheffield, videographer Dave Janssen, and photographer XXXX.

§ Additional thanks to the Noun Project artists for icons: Alex Sheyn, Proletkult Graphik, Scott Lewis, Alex AS, Factorio.us, Luis Prado, Naomi Atkinson, Ola Möller, Nicolas Molès, Agus Purwanto, Matt Brooks, Lemon Liu, Gabriella Fono, Jerry Wang, and Simon Child.
