story_txt:
Quotes from some of the letters we have received since announcing Artemis:










If you encounter an emergency, simply tap the Artemis necklace 3 times. 

Artemis uses a wireless connection with your smart phone to send an emergency transmission to our private security agency which is available 24/7.
The necklace buzzes to confirm your request has been received. 
The security operator uses live audio from your necklace, coupled with GPS data and your personal profile to determine whether to contact police, fire or medical staff to help you. 
Artemis simultaneously sends a text message to your choice of loved ones with your current location and a  request for help. 








Canceling A Request
Artemis is difficult to trigger by accident, but if you change your mind you can cancel it via the Artemis smart phone app (see the FAQ for more detail).






Checking That Artemis is Connected
If you want to check if your Artemis module is connected to your phone and able to send emergency requests, simply pop it out of the necklace and flip it back and forth briefly to look for a green light.





You will have access to your audio recordings, location and motion data, which may be useful in potential legal proceedings. This data is immediately streamed to the cloud and stored securely for you. Here is the final design for the module:



Moving the Artemis Module to a New Piece of Jewelry
Just pop the module into the back of any Artemis-compatible jewelry. A magnet attaches it securely so you won't have to worry about losing it. The module contains all the intelligence of Artemis and it listens for your taps and requests help for you.

(We are continuing to decrease the size of the Artemis pendant and Module and a larger working prototype is shown in the picture.)
Charging
Charging Artemis is as simple as placing your necklace on a wireless charging pad once every 2 weeks before you go to bed. In the morning, pick it up and you're good to go.


Size
The pendant necklace is slightly larger than a quarter. The Artemis module which inserts into the back is slightly smaller in diameter than a quarter.




Note: The final design shown here is smaller than the larger prototypes shown in the videos.6





How Does Artemis Compare?











We need to have a subscription fee to cover the expense of having security operators standing by 24/7, maintaining our internal emergency response systems, and wirelessly updating your Artemis with new security features in the future.
Artemis will deliver emergency messages to pre-defined contacts via email if you do not have a subscription plan. International plans currently support SMS text messages or email only (See INTERNATIONAL COVERAGE section below). A plan with direct security operator response is $19/mo and is currently only available in the USA. Limited text-messaging plans are available for as little at $1/mo.






PHONES and OS: iPhone 4 or later supported- Dec 2015.Android supported - Jul 2016.


BATTERY: You will need to charge Artemis overnight roughly once every 2 weeks. Your phone must also be operational to use Artemis.(We recommend purchasing an external phone charger to keep your phone topped up if it gets low.)


CONNECTIVITY: As long as your phone has a working data connection (e.g. WIFI, GPRS, LTE, etc) then Artemis can communicate with the emergency response center(if a data connection is not present when an emergency request is received, then the app will store the request and try to send it when it reconnects.)


SUBSCRIPTION: For most services, Artemis requires an affordable monthly subscription. This is used to pay for the security operations staff, other security infrastructure, and so that we don't have to charge you a large fee for accidental false alarms like other companies do. Plans will range from $1/mo to $19/mo depending on the support level (see Price List above). Artemis comes with a free full-coverage-subscription for the first 60 days. There is one subscription per/user and each Artemis module is personalized to that user and plan. Artemis will process emergency requests without a subscription, but reverts to email-based alerts to friends.

INTERNATIONAL COVERAGE: LIMITED SUPPORT FOR NOWCurrently our security operations partners can only cover verbal emergency requests that require fire/medical/police response if they are made in the USA. Travel within the USA is fully supported. At launch, international buyers (or international travelers with an international data plan) will be able to have Artemis send international text messages and alert emails to predefined contacts with current GPS location, audio recordings, and a request for help (depending on their subscription level). We are looking to expand police/fire/medical/security coverage to other countries in the future. (see the Price List above for International Plan pricing)


AGE:Artemis is designed for active fashionable adults age 16-70. Other products such as Filip, LifeAlert and SmartStones are more suitable for children and for less-active seniors.




We are confident that we will be able to manufacture, deliver and support necklaces for all backers if we reach our $200,000 base goal. 
If we do not raise the $200,000 by December 12, then if you backed us, all of your money is automatically returned by Indiegogo at the end of the campaign.
Alternatively, if we reach funding milestones past 200k, then we will be able to provide additional perks to all customers (see chart).






Sense6 Design has four additional team members who contribute fashion, electrical engineering, social media, jewelry design, safety and business expertise. The founders have known each other for 7 years and have collaborated on two mobile startups previously.
Our team members are seasoned travelers who have experienced adventure, street crime, and worry over the safety of loved ones. We are passionate about making the world a safer place and we feel that wearable computing has a role in making that happen. We believe smart jewelry can simultaneously aid personal empowerment, beauty, and safety. Artemis is our first step towards living in a world free from the threat of personal violence.

The world is still a dangerous place. Regardless of whether you look at crime statistics (see below), read your local newspaper headlines, or simply talk to your friends about their crime experiences, it's clear that we don't live in a safe environment. While the longer term goals of improving education, opportunities and mutual-respect deserve support, they don't solve the problem of you having to walk home alone tonight. We think it is surprising that more of our advanced technology hasn't been designed for women, and to solve problems relevant to them.

story:
Combining with a classic mechanical hand and smartwatch functions, Tophill watch from Switzerland, features a black on black design with both a dark stainless steel bracelet, black PVD case, and dial equipped with luminous hands giving that very desirable sleek look that many looks for in a Tophill watch.  

 

Why switch between a real watch and an unattractive silicon bracelet when you can wear a stylish Swiss watch to be proud of? With this exciting new product, we remain faithful to our roots by combining an analogue display with a digital screen and an impressive set of connected features.  

 

 

We set sail to manufacture the best, connected smartwatch in the world. Building upon traditional Swiss watchmaking, Tophill doesn't make any compromises.

The watch features the newest generation of Heart Rate sensor, GPS tracking and notification system, which can connect by Bluetooth to our proprietary TOPHILL health & Sport app.

With 3-Axis gyro, angular velocity, motion sensors, and heart rate monitoring, your steps, pace, heart rate, blood pressure and calories burned will be recorded every day for data collecting, which can make a total difference in your life and health. 

With a press of the button, the Tophill will automatically read and display your heart rate on the large 0.42" OLED screen. Your heart rates will also be recorded in the watch and synced to the Tophill app automatically.

 

We have developed smart features to let you choose who or what is allowed to interrupt. The watch dial indicates the power reserve and activity performance. 

Pair Tophill watch with your compatible smartphone, and you'll be able to see all of your notifications right on your wrist! Whenever someone texts, calls, or emails you, stay updated instantly! Tophill watch displays your favorite social apps notifications from Facebook, Messenger, Twitter, Instagram, Gmail, Skype, WeChat, and more.

Manage your day, right from your wrist! Tophill both helps you arrange your calendar events, and reminds you of upcoming events, giving you a neat and comfortable day instead of hurrying to the meeting or date. 

Thanks to Tophill watch, there is no need to set the time when you land in a different time zone by manual control. With the sync time function, Tophill watch will correct the time automatically in synchronization with your smartphone. At the same time, your hometown time zone will show on the Tophill watch as well. 

 

Daily quality of sleep occupies an important position in normal work and activity. Advanced algorithms of Tophill watch are designed to understand your light movements, the heavy bed turns, wakeful state and deep peaceful sleep. And prevent you from future chronic biological and physical health problems. 

With luminous function, you can have a better experience at night

With the only one button controlled your all operations, it makes hi-tech become easier. Tophill watch comes with the quartz movement, achieving all functions with one pressing the middle button. You can navigate throughout the various menus and screens easily by simply pressing the smart crown.

 

With one hour and a half fully charging time, it can provide up to 60-day battery life, and no more daily charging troubles. And there is also no need to worry about the Tophill watch cannot tell the time when it’s out of power, thanks to the class mechanical hands. 

Water and Dust are not a concern. Wear the 5ATM-rated Tophill Watch won't worry about running, gym training, kayaking, fishing, and water-related work, it's free in one meter of water for several minutes. Tophill Watch is suitable for everyday use but not suitable for bathing, swimming, and diving. Also, it is sealed against damage that can be caused by dust and dirt.

Tophill watch, equipped with three colors, satisfies your daily dress-up. What’s more, there is no difficult to read time in the darkness with special fluorescent material on the mechanical Tophill watch hand and number.

An attractive Tophill watch is the cornerstone of a great business and casual attire. Even with the popularity of smartphones, wrist Tophill watches have held their own due to their convenience and stylish attributes. 

 

Tophill brand wrist watch come from switzerland,Inherit professional Swiss watchmaker spirit, Follow the new trend of time, create the first swiss brand wrist watch for the young people. “Tophill” inspiration from art,science,nature, etc.​

 

We offer three different styles of straps that allow you to choose from different scenes.

At the same time, your hometown time zone will show on the Tophill watch as well.  Daily quality of sleep occupies an important position in normal work and activity. Advanced algorithms of Tophill watch are designed to understand your light movements, the heavy bed turns, wakeful state and deep peaceful sleep. And prevent you from future chronic biological and physical health problems. With luminous function, you can have a better experience at nightWith the only one button controlled your all operations, it makes hi-tech become easier. Tophill watch comes with the quartz movement, achieving all functions with one pressing the middle button. You can navigate throughout the various menus and screens easily by simply pressing the smart crown. With one hour and a half fully charging time, it can provide up to 60-day battery life, and no more daily charging troubles. And there is also no need to worry about the Tophill watch cannot tell the time when it’s out of power, thanks to the class mechanical hands. Water and Dust are not a concern. Wear the 5ATM-rated Tophill Watch won't worry about running, gym training, kayaking, fishing, and water-related work, it's free in one meter of water for several minutes. Tophill Watch is suitable for everyday use but not suitable for bathing, swimming, and diving. Also, it is sealed against damage that can be caused by dust and dirt.Tophill watch, equipped with three colors, satisfies your daily dress-up. What’s more, there is no difficult to read time in the darkness with special fluorescent material on the mechanical Tophill watch hand and number.An attractive Tophill watch is the cornerstone of a great business and casual attire. Even with the popularity of smartphones, wrist Tophill watches have held their own due to their convenience and stylish attributes.  Tophill brand wrist watch come from switzerland,Inherit professional Swiss watchmaker spirit, Follow the new trend of time, create the first swiss brand wrist watch for the young people. “Tophill” inspiration from art,science,nature, etc.​ We offer three different styles of straps that allow you to choose from different scenes.

story:
The DukPak originated when the FOWL team was frustrated with Unstylish backpacks, wet gear, lack of organization, and constantly having to change bags for everyday activities. So we set out to invent the most stylish, versatile, water resistant backpack ever.

 

 

 

 

Tired of having to purchase different bags to fit our daily needs we created patent pending interchangeable Pak inserts that can transform your backpack from a work bag, to a cooler bag, to a weekend travel bag in a matter of seconds. Simply unzip the back zipper to the bottom and pull out your insert to remove or Pak, then use the top zipper for quick and easy access to gear. The back and bottom are equipped with patent pending magnets to snap your insert in place and keep it secured. Whether you are a traveler, outdoorsman, worker, or whatever lifestyle you choose the DukPak enables you to “Wear Your Life.”

 

The TravelPak is equipped with a laptop sleeve, space for magazines/notebooks, and 4 compartments for rolled t shirts, socks, and other travel essentials. This insert provides perfect organization without having to dig around to find everything in your bag!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The CoolerPak enables you to choose how you separate gear as well keep beverages cold. With extreme versatility, this insert is insulated and enables you to use it as a beer and wine tote.

  

 

 

 

 

 

This waterproof laptop case is equipped with smooth waterproof zippers as well as a magnet on the back to hold its place in the DukPak. This laptop case can fit up to a 15 inch laptop as well as hold phone chargers and other valuables.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

With a stretch goal of $50,000 we will offer an additional black option of the DukPak. (Choose color after kickstarter ends!)

story:
FREEUP

Freeup is a temporary, flexible, self adhesive, disposable fitness strip which is used to prevent eyeglasses from slipping.  Its primary purpose is to provide temporary support to an individual wearing glasses; who is involved in an activity that causes sweat and perspiration which typically results in their glasses slipping down their nose.  

Why even bother?

In most cases, I didn't have a problem with glasses slipping occasionally.  That’s one of the conditions I agreed to when I decided to use them instead of contacts.  But the slipping became increasing annoying, after physical activities that forced me to constantly focus on my glasses.  I'd frequently go jogging, which involved a lot of sweat.  During my jogs, I would push my glasses back up my nose on every other step.  It was infuriating.  When I played tennis, I had to change the way I served just to make sure that my glasses didn't fall and hit the cement and get damaged, because the sweat allowed my glasses to slip so easily. I exerted enough force during my serves that at times they would completely fall off.

Why is it different?

Existing products try to solve the problem by requiring some form of permanent or temporary physical attachment to the glasses themselves. Along with their attachment, they also have an exterior component, which is made of made of a tacky material or soft silicone designed to provide a frictional force to rest against the skin and hold the glasses up. The inherent flaw with this design is once the user begins to sweat, the perspiration and secretion of natural body oils act as a slick surface between the skin and the tacky/silicone material.  Failure occurs at this juncture, because the weight of the glasses eventually outweighs the frictional force that gets created by the contact points, as the oil and perspiration weakens it significantly.  Think of scotch tape that is applied to a surface, then peeled off repeatedly.  Eventually it loses it stickiness and its effectiveness.

Freeup is different, in that it does not attach to the glasses.  Instead, it adheres to the bridge or your nose/skin and provides direct support to your glasses at the most critical point, where all the weight is concentrated.  Because it doesn't attach to the glasses, the glasses have the freedom to shift slightly so that it doesn't feel like they are cemented there.  It feels natural.  And when the glasses do move, the Freeup support doesn't move and detach from your skin, which is critical in maintaining their effectiveness.

How does it work?

Freeup contains contoured and angled ridges, when applied they are strategically located just below the nosepad or the frame of the glasses.  They basically act as a ledges that doesn't move, regardless of how much you sweat. 

Prototypes

I’ve researched dozens of different materials and have made hundreds of prototypes.  The very first, being a band aid with foam tape on top, acting as the ridges to what we have now.

Colors

Although the majority of users would like these to be discrete and transparent, we believe that there are groups of individuals, who would love to express their Freeup.  Similar to football players, and other athletes who have gravitated to various Breathe Rite colors.  We will eventually be providing custom colors, logos and messaging.

Timeline

Once we reach our funding goal, we will order tooling and set up for production.

story:
Why Gymi?

Gymi was born as the idea of building a real sports tracking wearable device which:

  • allows you to track your workout routine, without being intrusive.
  • doesn't require you to sync every single day to see your stats.
  • it doesn't ask you to pull your phone out to register your progress.

So the principal goal is wear it, tap start and you are ready to go.

What is on a Gymi?

Gymi currently has 4 main components:

  • Multiple Sensors on abs and arms which allows you  to measure your reps, time and sets you have performed on your routine.
  • A heart rate monitor sensor that allows you to track when you're at your best performance point, to increase your endurance and muscle and reduce the possibilities of injury.
  • Real time displays, that show on your arm, the current rep & set you are up to and how many more to go.  This makes it easier to reach your goals
  • The Gymi Brain: the core which counts, measures and transfers the information to your phone, enabled with a micro controller with Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) communication, to seamlessly sync with your smartphone (IOS at this time, but Android is coming too).

Gymi Smart Shirt

Gymi Track Pants


* We are making our best to achieve something which looks similar to this.   We will notify of colour options in advance, so each buyer will be able to select their colour preference.

What Gymi can measure and count?

Most of the upper body routines :

  • Abs routines (most of them involving upper body movements)
  • Chest routines (most of them too)
  • Arms (biceps and triceps routines).

First Proof of concept

Last prototype on tv interview


But what about my lower body?

For that we are introducing the Smart Pants

Smart pants by Gymi are great for counting your steps, squats, jumps and lunges and does this while you are working out.

You will have the same freedom to move, that we offer with our smart shirt.

Just put them on, start your workout, and know that your key movements are being monitored automatically for you.



Why Gymi is better than other wearables?

We have an app too

Our app was designed to be very user friendly, ensuring there is no learning time needed, for you to use it.  However, we still wanted it powerful enough, so you have all  the vital information.  This allows you to  clearly see your progress and know how to improve. 



Personalize your experience to suit your own body

Daily stats sync on real time from your Gymi to your phone

Track Progress of your goals



Why we need your help?

We are looking to raise funds for the following short term objectives:

  • take our current Proof of concept prototype to final production stage.
  • source the best quality textiles & components to provide high quality stylish garments integrated with our smart technology.
  • undertake effective and reliability durability and quality control testing

    • produce a first batch of Gymi's for our early adopters and get feedback

How long we been working on it?

The team have been working on this since November 2013 when we first commenced sketches, design and our test prototypes.  

Who we are?

We are two entrepreneurs Debbie Roberts (Australian) and Pedro Barrera (Mexican) and a group of advisors on the Fashion, Fitness, Health and Electronics.  We have a  proven track of success on previous ventures, and with experience working with Fortune 500 companies and even YC companies. 

We might look like oldies, but we are passionate about building products that improve lifestyles and save time and effort.


What are the biggest challenges we can face?

We list the challenges that we need to sort on the next months if this campaign is successful:

  • Reduce the size of our Gymi Brain ensure we can add more features to it.
  • Make sure we can achieve at least the scenario of 3 days without recharging. Battery is important for us the lighter and lasting the comfortable and better it will take the product.
  • As you might know this kind of projects always face 3rd party delays but we are dedicated to do our best to stay on track to the dates and times, so as not to disappoint.

And we have an SDK now




We are happy to announce that we are gonna release Gymi SDK to IOSplatform.

The main goal is to let your imagination work on how you can reward yourself after performing certain routine or achieve a goal.

Imagine that you can connect your Gymi (shirt or pants) to any device in the world and perform certain cool actions as rewards:

- Let you navigate on FB only if you have done 50 pushups?.

- Your coffee machine will start to make coffee as soon as you walk 5km.

The possibilities are endless and is all up to you.

Get your Gymi shirt or pants on any package and get access before anyone else to the new platform of workout improvement. 


How you can help us?

We are very grateful for any help, particularly if you can:  

  • share this with your friends and loved ones.
  • share this with your coach or trainer
  • Tell us how to continue to make Gymi better.

story:
The Sept Mai is, above all, a matter of design. A smart return to the sources of industrial aesthetics from the middle of the 20th century. It displays a stylish, balanced, yet bold expression. The Sept Mai uses space as a guiding principle and offers a modern design with an assertive character: depth, emptiness, relief, space. Combined with subtle innovative details, its general appearance will satisfy the passionate collector as well as the amateur looking for a timeless and exclusive accessory.

 

Bold Design.

Nostalgic notes with contemporary elements make Neucarl The Sept Mai a must-have for any enthusiast. The Sept Mai is an exercise in design and an object that brings together some of my convictions.

  • An exclusive design using zero catalog pieces.
  • Limited Editions - only 100 numbered pieces for each finish.
  • Lume layer as a special feature.
  • No stylistic or technical compromise.
  • A strong DNA.

 

 

 

 

 

The breathtaking design of The Sept Mai immediately catches the eye. Without over-played minimalism, The Sept Mai combines a smart streamlined design with a slender look. It's a bold mix of classic design codes and subtle contemporary influences. Beyond trends, far from fast-fashion, the unique aesthetic of The Sept Mai takes probably takes roots in the post-Bauhaus era, in the current Streamline Moderne, and concedes some retro-futuristic notes. 

The first production of Streamline Moderne appeared shortly after the crisis of 1929. The Chrysler Building in New York illustrates the transition to the "Art Deco" movement, which it was attached to and began to fade in the 30s. In this sense, the Art Deco period is the mother of the current Streamline Moderne. It is because of its requirements of rational sobriety that the Streamline Moderne appeared. It added curves, dynamism, fluidity, aerodynamics, central elements of the design of The Sept Mai. Streamline Moderne became a brand new field, generated mainly by the "New-Deal": Industrial Design.

 

 

You may be one of those people who just want to get to the point. Here are the dimensions of The Sept Mai. The Sept Mai was not designed to please everyone but should fit correctly on all wrists, with appropriate sizing and good lug width.

Going further in the details, The Sept Mai has a rounded 316L stainless steel durable case measuring 41mm in diameter, for a total length of 45mm, and a lug width of 20mm. Large enough to show its details with ease and keeping the thinnest edges possible.

 

Thin Case. Designed around the skinny mechanical hand-wound Sellita SW215-1 movement, its depth is a mere 10mm, 8.35mm excluding crystal.

 

 

Luminescence • The Sept Mai unveils an easily readable, slightly concave, multi-layered dial that adds depth and accentuates the watch's three-dimensional grip. The inner layer is made entirely from Swiss Super-LumiNova BGW9. Stunning. The upper layer adopts a circular brushed steel finish, giving it a familiar industrial touch.

 
 
Perfect reading and unparalleled refinement. Devoid of numbers, the dial has many subtle details, such as clear and easy-to-read indexes. Among the many subtleties of the design are the hollowed-out hands that perfectly meet the different indexes or the date window with special geometry designed to match the angle of the indexes, as you can see below.
 
 

 

Geometry. More generally, the geometric aesthetic is found in the design of the perfectly balanced three-thirds dial. The outer third, the widest, includes the hour markers playing with the curvature of the dial, oriented towards the central hour segments. On the inner third, the different indexes keep the rule of proportions. They are also turned towards the central third, reinforcing its importance. It divides space into 12 time segments and illustrates, in a way, the quest for time control.

Allow space. Unlike the dial, the profile of the sapphire crystal is convex, increasing the use of space. The glass is double curved (the front and back of the crystal are curved), so there is little distortion of the dial, even when viewed from an angle. From an aesthetic point of view, it follows the curve of the case for perfect fluidity. 

The back glass is also a sapphire crystal. Its generous opening of 27mm reveals the Sellita SW215-1 movement. The Neucarl “N” monogram is discreetly present to remind us that it belongs to the brand. No other decoration is used to keep the simple, almost rough, industrial aspect of the movement.

The back case is engraved with all the traditional information about the components but also mentions the Edition and the Serial number – here, The number 1 of 100 in the Founders Edition

 

 

The quest for freedom is the key symbol of my design. Through The Sept Mai case, after months of development, a somewhat dreamlike vision takes shape. Being able to materialize this concept of freedom is something truly magical for me. I hope it make sense in your eyes and that you also feel the magic when you see it.

More › Read Why is it called "The Sept Mai"? on Medium  •  3mn read

 

Talking about design and functionalism demonstrates the responsibility I feel to make solid but subtle technical choices to support the design, and not just "make it pretty to sell".

Among these choices, the Sellita SW215-1 is original. It is a hand-wound movement with a date complication. While most mechanical movements today are self-winding, with an integrated rotor, this is an old-fashioned movement, so to speak. The absence of a rotor also allows it to maintain a thin profile of only 10mm, and it could have even been 8.35mm if my aesthetic requirement had not focused on a perfect curve and therefore the use of a curved sapphire.

If it were a vintage watch, you wouldn't be surprised to find a hand-wound movement, but it's an unusual choice for a new microbrand watch. It is, above all, a decision intended to provide an experience different to that of an automatic winding watch. In a more personal, sensory relationship, you operate your Neucarl The Sept Mai yourself every day you decide to wear it.

 

I choose this movement during the first moments of the drawing process, and it is the latter that evolves around the Sellita SW215-1. In this sense, the path followed is fundamentally different from embedding a movement in an already designed case or chosen from a supplier's catalog.

About. The Sellita SW215-1 is the first cousin of the famous ETA caliber 2804-2, but with two additional jewels. Many reputable watch companies are using this movement as an alternative to the ETA mechanism due to it being more economical and readily available. It is striking notably for its slimness (only 3.35 mm with date and central sweep seconds), reliability, and robustness.

 

 

Case • 316L Grade Stainless Steel · Polished · Serial number engraved on the back. 41mm diameter x 10mm height, 20mm lug-width · 45mm lug to lug

Movement • Mechanical Sellita SW215-1 hand-wound · Swiss Made · hours, minutes, seconds and date at 3 · Power reserve of 42 h.

 

 

Dial • Multi-layered · Circular brushed steel finish & Super-LumiNova BGW9 · Printed indexes

 

 

Strap • Fine black leather. Monogram printed on the back. Dimensions: 75mm x 115mm x 20mm. 316L steel pin buckle with engraved Neucarl monogram. Quick-release bars.

 

 

Hands • Exclusive Neucarl Design • Stainless Steel

 

 

Lume • Inner layer · Swiss Super-LumiNova® BGW9

 

Glass • Sapphire Crystals with A/R coating, front and caseback · water-resistant to 50m

Weight • 54g  |  Guarantee • Two years

 

Productions changes.

There are only 3 :

  • The Neucarl "N" monogram will be engraved on the crown.

     
  • I added some "grip" to the crown.

 

  • The official Brand font of the final logo will be used on the dial

 

 

Founders Edition

 

Neucarl suggests elegant, high-quality, unique designs, in small series, sold at a fair price. The brand inspires and shares positive emotions through unique and striking designs.

To give form to a vision. I trust the creative process to express myself, to create something of enduring value. Neucarl has a stylish design, one of a kind, driven by passion. Amateurs can turn away from huge corporations and mass-brands to enjoy independent watchmakers' original and affordable products.

 

I’m not obsessed with the stacking of technical superlatives which seems to be the case in popular advertising. If you’re here, you’re probably, like me, intolerant of cheap and mass-produced products made to please everyone, according to the fashion and trends now on Instagram.

This does not mean being snobbish and only buying high-ticket items. It means demonstrating our taste and quality standards by the things we buy or the projects we support. In other words, not to impress others or brag, but to express how much we love beautiful and story-driven items. Our favorites goods are a means of self-expression.

 

In these turbulent times, I believe in the need to shape our environment with these little positive emotions that we sometimes feel, failing to control what escapes us. Like riding a bicycle, we must continuously reinvent how to keep our balance if we don’t want to fall.

Expression through design is my own. My intention today is to offer a small piece of my space: a bold and modernist design with retro-futuristic accents. Initially influenced by the fascinating mid-century Streamline Moderne, it borrows from the past and the future to capture the moment.

Capturing the moment is what we need. Let's do it together.

 

Aesthetics and beautiful design, in general, fascinate me. Product design allows me to share a sensitivity for the simplicity of moments of intense pleasure. I also discovered that it is through Product Design that my most potent convictions come forward. It goes without saying that I am committed to defending them thanks to Neucarl.

  • Promote expression through design
  • Encourage entrepreneurship and help others succeed
  • Promote independent design rather than mass-market products.

All throughout the past 12 months, my company and I have developed a keen self-awareness and the skills needed to lead the projects that support Neucarl's long-term vision.

 

 

Founders Edition.

This represents the starting point of Neucarl. An edition oriented towards industrial aesthetics, symbolized by its circular brushed steel dial, which includes a lower layer made of Super-LumiNova BGW9 with a superb bluish glow.

Limited to 100 copies, this finish will only be produced once, do not miss it. You might be able to say show it proudly, in a few years: "Yes, I was there!" :)

Daylight

 

Darkness

 

 

Roma Edition 

Why Roma? Because for Neucarl, this is where it all started, five years ago already. If the date of May 7 is the first chapter in the history of Neucarl and gave its name to the brand's very first model, Roma is the theater. Steel, black, white. Nothing more, nothing less. Pure, simple, and honest as my relationship with Roma.

› Read on Medium: "Why to call it The Sept Mai?"

Features

  • The dial is in a glossy white finish, with a deep rendering.
  • The black indexes and dark hands reinforce the purity of the whole.
  • The use of Super-LumiNova BGW9

Daylight

 

Darkness

 

Berlin Edition

Why Berlin? I fell in love with Berlin in the year 2000, while covering for french medias the Film Festival which takes place every year in the German capital, 

The warmth of the people, the post-cold war atmosphere only 10 years after the reunification of east and west, the growth of this city in complete reinvention still inspires me.

On the occasion of a pleasure trip two years ago, I felt quickly at ease there. Carried by the artistic and cultural life of the places, I let myself imagine this unique dial. Retro-futuristic and bold, isn't it?

Features

  • The dial is in a "Carbon Black" dark finish.
  • The blue indexes and hands add a retro-futuristic touch. Neon lights you said?
  • The use of Super-LumiNova BGW9. It plays with the night.

Daylight

 

Beyond the technical features, what you get compared to a mass-market brand is the exclusiveness of a model produced from a limited series. Add in the little extra soul brought by the microbrand, and you have something worth supporting. This is something the marketing department of big brands can't manufacture.

 

I firmly believe in the crowdfunding and pre-order development model. The objective is to make Neucarl as independent as possible, so that its prosperity rests, above all, with its community of ambassadors. The first production is largely financed by its customers from the start. It’s a healthy choice that aims to build much more than a commercial relationship; it’s a relationship of mutual trust, almost like a family.

This is a business management choice, which makes it possible to get rid of bank financing and to be able to create independently. It allows Neucarl to limit stocks as much as possible, to produce on-demand, and therefore to offer you The Sept Mai in small series. This business model is made possible thanks to you since we’re in direct contact with you. There are no intermediaries. This allows a quality service in direct contact with you. 

Neucarl can envision sustainable development in the long term, without making you pay the high price for pages of advertising in magazines or fancy marketing. While some companies have to finance themselves from x6 to x8 or more, and often use bank financing, I choose independence, transparency, reason, sobriety, and security.

 

Among the first to support Neucarl, a small group of unconditional supporters relied on the attention to detail brought to the Neucarl design. I call them "Ambassadors". I hope you took the time to read their testimonials – in a grey box – scroll up if you didn't!

They bought into my humble convictions very early on. They believe in the company's aim to deliver a quality proposition in the current design landscape. The best part is they choose to support the more profound mission carried by Neucarl: sharing positive emotions in the broad sense, through design.

They are located in 18 different countries all around the world, waiting for the arrival of their Neucarl The Sept Mai, which has already been paid for, often months in advance. Still, they would not have given up their place to anyone, nor would they think about abandoning the project.

I can't cite everyone here, but thanks to you Allen, Luca, Oscar, John, Kevin, Aurélien, Guillaume, Peter, Gérard, Noah... to name only a few. Your support is priceless to me.

In this sense, Neucarl's bet would already have been won: 

To share positive emotions around a design project!

It's your turn: Join us today!
story_txt:
The Sept Mai is, above all, a matter of design. A smart return to the sources of industrial aesthetics from the middle of the 20th century. It displays a stylish, balanced, yet bold expression. The Sept Mai uses space as a guiding principle and offers a modern design with an assertive character: depth, emptiness, relief, space. Combined with subtle innovative details, its general appearance will satisfy the passionate collector as well as the amateur looking for a timeless and exclusive accessory.


 
Bold Design.
Nostalgic notes with contemporary elements make Neucarl The Sept Mai a must-have for any enthusiast. The Sept Mai is an exercise in design and an object that brings together some of my convictions.

An exclusive design using zero catalog pieces.
Limited Editions - only 100 numbered pieces for each finish.
Lume layer as a special feature.
No stylistic or technical compromise.
A strong DNA.

 

 
 

 
 

The breathtaking design of The Sept Mai immediately catches the eye. Without over-played minimalism, The Sept Mai combines a smart streamlined design with a slender look. It's a bold mix of classic design codes and subtle contemporary influences. Beyond trends, far from fast-fashion, the unique aesthetic of The Sept Mai takes probably takes roots in the post-Bauhaus era, in the current Streamline Moderne, and concedes some retro-futuristic notes. 

The first production of Streamline Moderne appeared shortly after the crisis of 1929. The Chrysler Building in New York illustrates the transition to the "Art Deco" movement, which it was attached to and began to fade in the 30s. In this sense, the Art Deco period is the mother of the current Streamline Moderne. It is because of its requirements of rational sobriety that the Streamline Moderne appeared. It added curves, dynamism, fluidity, aerodynamics, central elements of the design of The Sept Mai. Streamline Moderne became a brand new field, generated mainly by the "New-Deal": Industrial Design.
 
 

You may be one of those people who just want to get to the point. Here are the dimensions of The Sept Mai. The Sept Mai was not designed to please everyone but should fit correctly on all wrists, with appropriate sizing and good lug width.


Going further in the details, The Sept Mai has a rounded 316L stainless steel durable case measuring 41mm in diameter, for a total length of 45mm, and a lug width of 20mm. Large enough to show its details with ease and keeping the thinnest edges possible.

 
Thin Case. Designed around the skinny mechanical hand-wound Sellita SW215-1 movement, its depth is a mere 10mm, 8.35mm excluding crystal.

 
 
Luminescence • The Sept Mai unveils an easily readable, slightly concave, multi-layered dial that adds depth and accentuates the watch's three-dimensional grip. The inner layer is made entirely from Swiss Super-LumiNova BGW9. Stunning. The upper layer adopts a circular brushed steel finish, giving it a familiar industrial touch.

 
 

Perfect reading and unparalleled refinement. Devoid of numbers, the dial has many subtle details, such as clear and easy-to-read indexes. Among the many subtleties of the design are the hollowed-out hands that perfectly meet the different indexes or the date window with special geometry designed to match the angle of the indexes, as you can see below.
 

 
 
Geometry. More generally, the geometric aesthetic is found in the design of the perfectly balanced three-thirds dial. The outer third, the widest, includes the hour markers playing with the curvature of the dial, oriented towards the central hour segments. On the inner third, the different indexes keep the rule of proportions. They are also turned towards the central third, reinforcing its importance. It divides space into 12 time segments and illustrates, in a way, the quest for time control.

Allow space. Unlike the dial, the profile of the sapphire crystal is convex, increasing the use of space. The glass is double curved (the front and back of the crystal are curved), so there is little distortion of the dial, even when viewed from an angle. From an aesthetic point of view, it follows the curve of the case for perfect fluidity. 
The back glass is also a sapphire crystal. Its generous opening of 27mm reveals the Sellita SW215-1 movement. The Neucarl “N” monogram is discreetly present to remind us that it belongs to the brand. No other decoration is used to keep the simple, almost rough, industrial aspect of the movement.
The back case is engraved with all the traditional information about the components but also mentions the Edition and the Serial number – here, The number 1 of 100 in the Founders Edition

 
 


The quest for freedom is the key symbol of my design. Through The Sept Mai case, after months of development, a somewhat dreamlike vision takes shape. Being able to materialize this concept of freedom is something truly magical for me. I hope it make sense in your eyes and that you also feel the magic when you see it.
More › Read Why is it called "The Sept Mai"? on Medium  •  3mn read
 


Talking about design and functionalism demonstrates the responsibility I feel to make solid but subtle technical choices to support the design, and not just "make it pretty to sell".

Among these choices, the Sellita SW215-1 is original. It is a hand-wound movement with a date complication. While most mechanical movements today are self-winding, with an integrated rotor, this is an old-fashioned movement, so to speak. The absence of a rotor also allows it to maintain a thin profile of only 10mm, and it could have even been 8.35mm if my aesthetic requirement had not focused on a perfect curve and therefore the use of a curved sapphire.

If it were a vintage watch, you wouldn't be surprised to find a hand-wound movement, but it's an unusual choice for a new microbrand watch. It is, above all, a decision intended to provide an experience different to that of an automatic winding watch. In a more personal, sensory relationship, you operate your Neucarl The Sept Mai yourself every day you decide to wear it.
 

I choose this movement during the first moments of the drawing process, and it is the latter that evolves around the Sellita SW215-1. In this sense, the path followed is fundamentally different from embedding a movement in an already designed case or chosen from a supplier's catalog.
About. The Sellita SW215-1 is the first cousin of the famous ETA caliber 2804-2, but with two additional jewels. Many reputable watch companies are using this movement as an alternative to the ETA mechanism due to it being more economical and readily available. It is striking notably for its slimness (only 3.35 mm with date and central sweep seconds), reliability, and robustness.

 

 
Case • 316L Grade Stainless Steel · Polished · Serial number engraved on the back. 41mm diameter x 10mm height, 20mm lug-width · 45mm lug to lug

Movement • Mechanical Sellita SW215-1 hand-wound · Swiss Made · hours, minutes, seconds and date at 3 · Power reserve of 42 h.

 
 
Dial • Multi-layered · Circular brushed steel finish & Super-LumiNova BGW9 · Printed indexes

 
 
Strap • Fine black leather. Monogram printed on the back. Dimensions: 75mm x 115mm x 20mm. 316L steel pin buckle with engraved Neucarl monogram. Quick-release bars.

 
 
Hands • Exclusive Neucarl Design • Stainless Steel

 
 
Lume • Inner layer · Swiss Super-LumiNova® BGW9

 
Glass • Sapphire Crystals with A/R coating, front and caseback · water-resistant to 50m
Weight • 54g  |  Guarantee • Two years
 
Productions changes.
There are only 3 :

The Neucarl "N" monogram will be engraved on the crown. 
I added some "grip" to the crown.


 
The official Brand font of the final logo will be used on the dial

 
 

Founders Edition




 

Neucarl suggests elegant, high-quality, unique designs, in small series, sold at a fair price. The brand inspires and shares positive emotions through unique and striking designs.
To give form to a vision. I trust the creative process to express myself, to create something of enduring value. Neucarl has a stylish design, one of a kind, driven by passion. Amateurs can turn away from huge corporations and mass-brands to enjoy independent watchmakers' original and affordable products.
 

I’m not obsessed with the stacking of technical superlatives which seems to be the case in popular advertising. If you’re here, you’re probably, like me, intolerant of cheap and mass-produced products made to please everyone, according to the fashion and trends now on Instagram.
This does not mean being snobbish and only buying high-ticket items. It means demonstrating our taste and quality standards by the things we buy or the projects we support. In other words, not to impress others or brag, but to express how much we love beautiful and story-driven items. Our favorites goods are a means of self-expression.

 

In these turbulent times, I believe in the need to shape our environment with these little positive emotions that we sometimes feel, failing to control what escapes us. Like riding a bicycle, we must continuously reinvent how to keep our balance if we don’t want to fall.
Expression through design is my own. My intention today is to offer a small piece of my space: a bold and modernist design with retro-futuristic accents. Initially influenced by the fascinating mid-century Streamline Moderne, it borrows from the past and the future to capture the moment.
Capturing the moment is what we need. Let's do it together.

 
Aesthetics and beautiful design, in general, fascinate me. Product design allows me to share a sensitivity for the simplicity of moments of intense pleasure. I also discovered that it is through Product Design that my most potent convictions come forward. It goes without saying that I am committed to defending them thanks to Neucarl.

Promote expression through design
Encourage entrepreneurship and help others succeed
Promote independent design rather than mass-market products.

All throughout the past 12 months, my company and I have developed a keen self-awareness and the skills needed to lead the projects that support Neucarl's long-term vision.
 

 
Founders Edition.
This represents the starting point of Neucarl. An edition oriented towards industrial aesthetics, symbolized by its circular brushed steel dial, which includes a lower layer made of Super-LumiNova BGW9 with a superb bluish glow.
Limited to 100 copies, this finish will only be produced once, do not miss it. You might be able to say show it proudly, in a few years: "Yes, I was there!" :)
Daylight


 
Darkness


 
 
Roma Edition 
Why Roma? Because for Neucarl, this is where it all started, five years ago already. If the date of May 7 is the first chapter in the history of Neucarl and gave its name to the brand's very first model, Roma is the theater. Steel, black, white. Nothing more, nothing less. Pure, simple, and honest as my relationship with Roma.
› Read on Medium: "Why to call it The Sept Mai?"
Features

The dial is in a glossy white finish, with a deep rendering.
The black indexes and dark hands reinforce the purity of the whole.
The use of Super-LumiNova BGW9

Daylight


 
Darkness
 
Berlin Edition
Why Berlin? I fell in love with Berlin in the year 2000, while covering for french medias the Film Festival which takes place every year in the German capital, 
The warmth of the people, the post-cold war atmosphere only 10 years after the reunification of east and west, the growth of this city in complete reinvention still inspires me.

The first production is largely financed by its customers from the start. story:
Introducing the Neva Shoes, the world's first fully-customizable leather handmade shoes, designed in Atlanta and handmade in Gaziantep - Turkey, inspired by classic handmade espadrille and yemeni shoes .

Espadrilles and Yemenis are well known traditional footwear from Spain and Turkey. What started as a simple garment has become classics by now. Yemenis and espadrilles are timeless shoe styles. They are versatile, casual, and comfortable. We wanted to create harmony between these two styles.  We wanted to bring east and west together. 

So we combined these two classics and created fully handmade, fully customizable three unique shoe models inspired by timeless classics, yemenis and espadrilles. 

Paris, Zeugma and Barcelona. These Neva shoe models are the most authentic shoes of their kind in the world.  Also, we added some innovation to these classics. We covered outsole with organic natural rubber to prevent slippery and to reinforce and extend the life of the shoe.

Nevas are unisex, easy to wear, easy to clean, comfortable and versatile shoes made with premium Italian leathers. We created Nevas and liked very much. We wear them literally every day. Now we want to share these models with you.

We select basic colors for our models. Our artisans made samples with these basic colors and they are gorgeous. But we wanted that our backers reflect their individual styles to Nevas. So each backer can create their own unique shoe by selecting 3 models and 45 leather type and colors.

Here are models.

 Paris is the first design of Neva Shoes. It offers one-piece upper and a short heel with extra soft leather anti-odor insole.

Zeugma is the second design of Neva Shoes. It combines best features of espadrilles and yemenis with lowered tongue and lowered backstay. Also it has full flat organic rubber outsole add-on.

Barcelona is the third design of Neva Shoes. It offers modern style with the best features of espadrilles and yemenis. It is improved with outsole version of one of our artisans old design. 

The designs are novel, but the materials (we used premium leathers imported from Italia when crafting samples and we will use premium materials with backer's shoes too. ) and craftsmanship are faithfully traditional.   

Nevas are made to last with best quality Italian leathers, and you'll be surely be wearing yours for more than one season. They are fully handmade. The sides of the shoes are carefully hand stitched with %100 cotton thread dipped in beewax. The stitching is what gives Nevas their distinctive looks. Nevas are unisex, easy-to-wear, easy-to-clear, comfortable and versatile shoes.

Here are the our selected basic colors Neva Shoe models.

Or you can go with a custom pair of Neva to design your shoe inside and out. There are endless options, so you can create a unique pair to match your style. You can create your own unique shoe by selecting from 3 models and 45+ different color/leather option.

We will send you a survey about your design at the end of the campaign, also with a link to design your shoe using our web site's online design tool, with our interactive custom neva design tool, you can see exactly what your shoe will look like as you select from an wide variety of options.    We will start to ship shoes 6 - 8 weeks after the end of the campaign. 

You can select your colors / leathers from our leather swatch . See our full detailed leather / color swatch from web site. 

If you want another color/ leather option for your shoe, please do not hesitate to contact us. We will contact our suppliers and will do our best to find your colors.

  

You will get a  beautifully made shoe with a multifunctional cotton dust bag in the box that's comfortable, surprisingly versatile, and well-nigh indestructible.  Neva's high-quality leathers soften with time and stretch to accommodate your feet, making them feel like a second skin that was stitched just for you.

Hurry up and back this campaign earlier orders will be first on the production line.

Please choose your size from the chart.

Neva shoes are all made by natural leather that will adapt to your feet, in the case of being doubtful we recommend to choose the lowest number since the shoe will expand to adapt your feet. 

One of our co-founders is from Gaziantep, a town known with ancient shoemaking tradition. We meet with yemenis during our Gaziantep trip in 2017. We found this shoe style and yemeni artisan's craftsmanship is remarkable. I was wearing a pair of handmade espadrille at that time. We were impressed by the survival of these traditional models and crafting methods for hundreds of years.

At that time, yemeni artisans we met were faced with economic and cultural crisis. We loved this traditional footwear. We wanted these traditions, and artisans to be saved from the wheel of times.

We decided to create a leather shoe design as our first product when founding Neva Design. We wanted to create harmony between classic yemeni and espadrille styles.  We wanted to bring east and west together. 

Our goal is to make these models followers of tradition with sharing them with you, allowing people to appreciate the work from espadrille and yemeni craftsmen. Encouraging these artisans to embrace and pass their knowledge to following generations. Meet Orhan Bayram, he is our lead artisan.

We combined these two classics and created three shoe models inspired by yemenis and espadrilles. And named them Paris, Zeugma and Barcelona ( To be honest Barcelona is an improved version of one of our lead artisan Orhan's old designs ).  

Our production is currently in Gaziantep where local artisans still devote themselves to every single detail of every pair of classic shoe they produce. 

We’ve partnered with an artisan family which crafting yemenis with traditional ways for generations. We are using imported first quality Italian leathers. Every pair is still made entirely by hand, from A to Z, using high-quality leathers. 

Quality is matter,  each pair is meticulously hand-stitched using the same tools and methods that have been employed for generations. Slow, handcrafted production enables us to go carefully about our craft. We closely inspect each shoe to ensure that it meets our standards of beauty as well as durability before sending a pair to you. 

We made Nevas, wear them, and they are great. Now we want to share these designs with you too.

We are an interesting mix of designers, graphic artists, software developers, and serial entrepreneurs. You can visit nevas.co for more about us, the core team is three people who have come together by a random connection over the past two years.

The Neva was created in 2018 by the Naime and Mustafa who designs leather and wood-based products as a hobby.

Together with Daniel, Serdar, and Kadir, they took on the challenge of creating a business from their hobby

Neva Design is now our vehicle to do awesome things.

 

 You may return any new, unused items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund.  

You should expect to receive your refund within 7 days of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases, you will receive a refund more quickly.

 

Risks and challenges

Every project comes with its own unique risks and challenges and we have minimized them. As one of our co-founders is from Gaziantep, based on his personal relationships back home we are working with artisans who's abilities give us confidence in fulfilling orders on time and with the best quality.

story:
Warm Your Entire Winter with Unprecedented Comfort

Antelife G1 with precise heating setting and intelligent temperature control chipset will be your best outdoor partner in winter!

 

What makes Antelife G1 the perfect heated gloves?

Each person has different requirements for the temperature of gloves because of their different physiques, but ordinary heated gloves only support 3-4 heat settings.

Wearing conventional heated gloves often make people feel that either the temperature is not warm enough or too hot, and they can never properly make you more comfortable while getting warm.

Antelife G1 can be more precise to meet your different needs for the heat provided by the gloves in different scenarios. You can adjust the perfect temperature at any time according to your needs to make your winter life more cozy!

Heat On Your Demand

Antelife G1 is the world's first smart heated gloves with precisely adjustable heat setting, which can provide a much richer experience compared with other heated gloves.    

The regular heated gloves only support 3-4 levels of temperature adjustment, while Antelife G1 can support 40-65℃ (104°F-149°F) precise temperature adjustment.

You can adjust the temperature to your most comfortable state according to the needs of different life scenarios.

3X Faster To Reach Optimal Heat

Antelife G1 Heated Gear products utilize carbon fiber heating elements to generate and trap heat across core body areas, Using carbon fiber heater with 3X faster the performance, which can heat the gloves to 65°C (149°F) in 15s. 

Constant Warmth and Even Heating

Antelife G1 has a built-in intelligent temperature control chip and a temperature sensor, which can detect the temperature in the gloves in real time and intelligently control the current and voltage output to achieve the constant temperature state in the gloves.

The heating core offers advantages with even heating with extreme durability and provides superior life over competing products.  The flexible heating wire on top of the fingers and thumb and on the back of the hand and micro-threading is so thin it is almost invisible to the touch delivering the top of the line comfort. 

The smart chip used in Antelife G1 is more powerful than that.

When the temperature sensor detects that the temperature in the gloves exceeds 70°C (158°F), it will automatically stop heating to ensure safe use.

In addition, it has a temperature memory function, which will automatically adjust to the temperature set before the last shutdown every time you restart the system, making your use more convenient!

Keep Warmth Long Lasting and More Comfortable

The Antelife G1 uses Thinsulate™ which is 3M’s™ performance synthetic insulation that utilizes microfibers to trap air and retain heat while maintaining an exceptionally bulk-free profile.

It traps more air in less space than any other insulation – even down. Its quick-drying hydrophobic fibers absorb less than 1% of their weight in water.  

Up To 7 Hours Battery Life

Using the latest technology the Antelife G1 features radiant core heating technology and rechargeable 7.4V lithium-ion batteries the gloves are designed to deliver heat for up to 7 hours!  Slim rechargeable li-ion battery packs slip into pockets in the wrist of the gloves. 

The battery is installed in the storage bag at the wrist position of the gloves and can be taken out at any time, which is convenient for carrying and charging. In addition, the storage bag is designed with a waterproof zipper to prevent water ingress.

Waterproof, Windproof and Breathable

Antelife G1 gloves are designed to keep you comfortable and ready for whatever life throws at you, in any cold climate situation. Our gloves are made of a blend of taslan waterproof material and resin cotton making them: soft, light, breathable, windproof and water resistant.

Machine Washable

You do not have to disturb yourself about the method of washing that would preserve the lifespan of your gloves. Simply take the batteries out and throw the gloves in the machine and you are good to go，just don’t forget to take out the batteries.

Feel Free To Operate Your Smart Phone

If you are going to make gloves that are adaptable to both regular city life and extreme adventures, the least you could do is make them touchscreen-friendly.   with the special durable touchscreen sensitive material that Antelife G1 ensure you can operate your mobile phones while the glove is on.    

 

One More Thing

We never expected the amount of support we would have for our project, but we are so proud to recommend one more great product to make you feel great this winter... Antelife Heated Socks.

 

Antelife Heated Socks heat up to 149℉ or 65℃ with carbon fiber heating elements, are cold resistant, The integrated batteries provide up to 13 hours of warmth on a single charge.

The socks are made of 98% cotton, making them super comfortable, thick and well padded, absorbent, breathable and quick drying.

Media Coverage

​

Why Choose Antelife G1

Main Specs

About Size

For Both Men And Women

Perks We Offer

Add-on Perks

Accessories Of Antelife Heated Gloves

Accessories Of Antelife Heated Socks

When the Magic Happens

Production is on schedule. Each glove is carefully produced by our factory and be tested over and over again. 

Core Team

Brand Story

Antelife is a tech company in Innovative products and cool gadgets. The industry, the inventions, the manufacturing, has branded a loyal, patriotic, hard-working ethos into us. Combining excellent creativity, quality and craftsmanship, we strive to create the finest products available that are both innovative and functional.

Mass Production

We have begun our mass production! 

 

Feel Free to Contact Us

 

Go Enjoy Your Winter!

story:
Elppy™ is a smart ring which is both affordable and useful to the everyday user. Elppy™  has unlimited possibilities with it’s built in swipe, control and Bluetooth enabled hardware.

See the prototype in action:

Elppy™ works by simply pairing it to your smart device via Bluetooth and controlling functions using the touchpad that has been fashioned to be worn on the finger. You can control your music, take photos or even give presentations all controlled remotely with Elppy™, straight out of the box, with no apps!

Once Elppy™ is out there and in the hands of app developers, we believe that the applications for Elppy™ are endless. We'll provide app developers the tools to create apps that give Elppy™ additional features like controlling TVs, lights, doors and the list goes on...

Elppy™ will simplify the way you use your devices forever. 

Unfortunately, we have had reported issues with purchasing perks from our campaign. One of the main causes has been the auto-fill function of internet browsers. If this occurs, try manually filling in your details.  

If the problem persists or you have any other payment issues, please don't hesitate to contact us on support@elppy.com and we'll try to resolve this issue with  Indiegogo support. 

Thanks for supporting us!


It's the smart ring which NEVER needs recharging, and doesn't require any special app to make it work! In fact, Elppy™ can be paired with any device using Bluetooth technology which means the sky's the limits in terms of uses! 

Light and compact, Elppy™ is the friend on your fingertips, allowing you to skip music effortlessly while exercising without stopping your activity. For professionals, it can be used to skip through a slide presentation without having to point and click! 


Over the last 18 months we have busy designing and building functional prototypes and evaluating them. As seen in our video footage, the functional prototype (left of image below) has been successfully used in many applications. However, after user feedback we have further improved our design (right of image below), in many different ways! The new production design is what you'll be receiving & what we need your help with to make happen!

 
To see our functional prototype in action, here are some "how-to" videos:  How to use Elppy (prototype).

Elppy's housing is made of polycarbonate and the band is made of a durable elastomer similar to that used in many sports watches.

Inside, is where all the magic happens - with smart technology, Elppy™ uses as little as possible energy for endless uses. Here's an exploded view of the different parts.


Elppy™ comes with an adjustable finger strap that accommodates fingers with range of diameters from 13 to 25 mm (circumference from 40.8 to 78.5mm). If this size range does not suit you, please contact us on support@elppy.com & we will endeavour to change the sizes based on customer demand. 

What sets Elppy™ apart from other smart rings is that it's so simple to connect and start using and yet is a fraction of the price of it's predecessors.

Competitor units require complex apps to function. Elppy™ on the other hand is simple to connect and use. Made with lightweight elastomer, Elppy™ sits comfortably on your finger, resilient to sweat and safe from slipping during even the most vigorous activity. 


We've thoroughly tested Elppy™ with a variety of uses! Elppy's highly durable housing is resilient and scratch, bump, water and drop resistant! With normal daily use, Elppy™ lasts up to two years. At a disposable price point, Elppy™ is designed as a throwaway when the in-built battery is depleted - allowing you to upgrade to the latest technology/model. 

Elppy™ is compatible with Windows, OS X, Android and iOS devices and have reported no compatibility issues. 

Elppy™ is a Bluetooth Low Energy human interface device (HID) that is natively supported by a wide range of devices and operating systems. Make sure the device you wish to control supports Bluetooth low energy and HID devices before attempting to pair.

If Elppy™ is not paired with any device, pressing any of the two buttons will wake Elppy™ up into pairing mode. This is indicated by a quick flash of the LED. Elppy™ will remain in Pairing or Discoverable mode for 30 seconds, after which it moves to sleep mode and the process will need to be repeated.

After 10 mins of inactivity, Elppy™ takes a nap to conserve energy. You can wake it up by pressing any of the two buttons. To control Elppy™ you use one of 5 actions all performed with your finger/thumb: swiping the touch pad left, right, upwards or downwards (nice long strokes) or briefly touching the centre of the pad.  

Elppy™ operates in two different modes: 

1. Multimedia/Selfie mode (single LED flash) or 

2. Presentation mode (double LED flash). 

Each mode can be selected selected by pressing a button (top button for multimedia, bottom button for presentation). The change of mode is indicated by a single or double flash of the LED upon button release.



MULTIMEDIA/SELFIE MODE (single LED flash) 

Allows the user to pause/play, change tracks and adjust the volume. When the native camera app is open, you can trigger a shot!

Swipe right - advances to the next track. 

Swipe left - returns you to the start of the current track or to the previous track if two swipes are performed in quick succession. 

Swipe up - increases the volume or triggers the camera when in the native camera app.

Swipe down - decreases the volume or triggers the camera when in the native camera app. 

A momentary touch of the centre of the pad - will pause/play the current track. 

PRESENTATION MODE (double LED flash) 

This mode allows Android, PC or Mac users to navigate their device or presentation slides. *NB this mode non functional on iOS devices. 

Swipe right - moves the selection to the right, or advances the slide.

Swipe left - moves the selection to the left or takes you to the previous slide. 

Swipe up - moves the selection upwards 

Swipe down - moves the selection downwards. 

A momentary touch of the centre of the pad - will "enter" the currently selected item.


Postage of Elppy™ is estimated to be $5USD to Australia and $10USD to the rest of the world. The postage cost is the same for all perks (except retail pack), so you can bundle multiple Elppy's for the same postage!

Elppy™ will be produced in Black, Blue & Green but new colors will be introduced if stretch goals can be met. 

COLOR SELECTION:

For all rewards that offer backer-selected colors, backers will be able to make their color choices via a separate survey that we'll send around at the end of the campaign.


$80,000: MORE COLORS TO SELECT FROM!

If we manage to raise $80K, we'll be adding three additional colors selections, including rose gold, for your Elppy™!

$100,000: WATER RESISTANT!

If we manage to raise $100K, we'll make sure the casing is water resistant, so you don't have to worry about any accidents!

Our current design is fairly water resistant, but we cant guarantee it (mainly around the buttons). If we achieve this stretch goal, we'll be able to add a manufacturing process that will guarantee water resistance.

$150,000: SECRET STRETCH GOAL!

If we manage to raise $150K, we'll be introducing a secret stretch goal! We can't tell you all the details just yet, but we can tell you it will be a celebration you won't want to miss;) Keep an eye on our updates for the secret stretch goal announcement!


AARON MOHTAR - Co-founder and CEO

With a PhD in electronic engineering and seven years of medical device research work at Flinders University, Aaron Mohtar founded Elppy™ to make a larger, more direct and practical difference to everyday people’s life.

Adelaide born, but completing his high school diploma in Lebanon, since completing his degree and then PhD, Aaron has worked a Senior Research Associate at Flinders University in Adelaide.

In this role he is directly involved in the research, development and evaluation of medical devices including anti-suffocation pillows, handheld cancer probes and post operative rehabilitation devices. He thrives on seeing the devices he has designed make it to the commercialization process and contributing to the medical industry. 

Aaron has been recognized with awards, media coverage and other accolades for his work, including first prize at the 2014 Flinders University Enterprise Workshop gala for his team's outstanding entrepreneurial and business acumen, and being accepted into the Innovyz Commercialization Program for Elppy™ (formerly known as Swyper) which he co-founded with Belinda Wade and Greg Stevens.

See his Linkedin profile at: https://au.linkedin.com/in/aaronmohtar

GREG STEVENS -  Co-founder & R&D Manager

Greg Stevens has been building various innovative non-commercial products with his Grandpa since he was 10.

Today he is a product development engineer and businessman driven to develop profitable solutions. He loves working on innovative products and services, and is a strong believer of complete user-experience orientated design that is passionate about product, scalability, sustainability, aesthetics and form; business analysis, development and improvement and process generation and optimization.

His career highlights include winning the 2014 Enterprise Workshop challenge and being accepted into the Innovyz Commercialization Program for Elppy™ (formerly known as swyper) which he co-founded with Belinda Wade and Aaron Mohtar; developing a wireless mesh network to help paramedics within the festival industry for his first start-up WiFindUs and designing the tram stop benches for the North Terrace to Entertainment Centre tram extension upgrade project for Street & Park Furniture in Adelaide. He was awarded a University and Engineering Medal for his Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering and is currently interested in wearable devices, wireless devices, biomedical devices, asset management software, heating products and systems, entrepreneurship.

See his Linkedin profile at: https://www.linkedin.com/in/greg-stevens-4237b059

BELINDA WADE - Co-founder and Marketing Manager

Like her co-founders at Elppy™, Belinda has shown entrepreneurial tendencies from a young age. At age 10 years old, her and a friend picked all her parents lemons, cut all her neighbours flowers, loaded everything into a wheelbarrow and took it to the local nursing home where they sold lemons and flowers to the old folks for a tidy profit.

Belinda Wade moved on from lemons and flowers, graduating with a Bachelor of Biotechnology and Molecular Biology at Flinders University and also has a Graduate Certificate of Management (Technology Management) from La Trobe University. Since graduating she has worked in variety of business development roles and has been the Business Development Manager of an analytical facility with state of the art mass spectrometry equipment providing services to research and industry at the Faculty of Science and Engineering at Flinders University in Adelaide for the past five years.

Apart from developing new products, Belinda has also been busy developing children. She is the mum of Sam 9 years, Hudson 7 years, and is currently 33 weeks pregnant. 

She was thrilled to be accepted into the Innovyz Commercialisation Program for Elppy™ (formerly known as Swyper) which she co-founded with Aaron Mohtar and Greg Stevens.

See her Linkedin profile at: https://au.linkedin.com/in/belindawade
