story:
Short Summary

  • I, (Kimberly Zisler) have been obsessed with shoes since I was about 3 or 4 and started my magnificent Jelly collection from K-mart.  It seemed becoming a shoe designer was my destiny!  After designing shoes in L.A. and NYC for over a decade, I moved to Colorado to be closer to family.  I noticed a void in the marketplace for a versatile, stylish, comfortable winter boot.  With all of my old foot injuries and remaining scar tissue, I wanted to create a cozy, stylish boot with good arch support, easy entry, and an anti-slip sole to wear after my winter activities.  As an added plus, the design I came up with allows the boot to become a supportive slipper simply by removing the outsole.

  • Whether Alpine or Nordic skiing, snowshoeing or ice skating, most of us can agree that there are few things better in the winter months than getting your heart pumping in the snow and feeling the sweet kiss of  powder on our cheeks…except, maybe, what comes after...Après!  Our boots are stylish enough for any mountain resort from Aspen to Zermatt and they are so comfortable you won't want to take them off.

  • This campaign is so important to the success of our company.  Due to factory minimums, it takes a lot to get a shoe line off the ground.  We are using high quality materials so that we can produce a product that's truly great.  The boots are being made in Brazil.  Factories and suppliers require money before they will even start on an order and that's why we need your financial support!
  • Your contributions and support will help this mostly women-run small business have a chance in an over-saturated marketplace run by huge, established companies.  Isn't it time for something new in a market where everyone is designing the same old shoes over and over again?
  • We designed 4 styles, however we will be offering 2 styles, (as seen below) on this campaign.  For every $20,000 past our goal we will offer another style due to factory minimums.


What We Need & What You Get

Let's break it down:

  • We need $65,000 to make a full production order.  Factories have pair minimums and they will not touch an order unless you meet their minimums. 
  • If you contribute $250 you will be one of the first to wear an Après Style by Zisler boot!
  • We have a variety of contribution options(perks) and ALL will be helpful.
  • If we do not reach $65,000 you will get your pledge money back and our campaign will be void...no perks will be fulfilled.  If this happens, our boots will not be made at all unless we get a large enough store order.
  • PLEASE HELP US ACHIEVE OUR GOAL!

Risks & Challenges

As an entrepreneur, I understand risk.  I understand it can be a struggle to decide where you want to invest your money with all the options out there.  By contributing to Après Style by Zisler you can be a part of the American dream.  In a world of conglomerates, isn't it nice when a woman can follow her dream, start a shoe line from scratch, and raise it to become a successful self-sustaining business?

  • I have been designing shoes for over a decade and I have the design, factory, and sales experience to bring our line to fruition.
  • I will travel to the factories and oversee production to make sure you are getting great boot workmanship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Any contribution helps!  If you are strapped for cash, please spread the word of our campaign to as many people as you can...publicity is very helpful!
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Short Summary  I, (Kimberly Zisler) have been obsessed with shoes since I was about 3 or 4 and started my magnificent Jelly collection from K-mart.  It seemed becoming a shoe designer was my destiny!  After designing shoes in L.A. and NYC for over a decade, I moved to Colorado to be closer to family.  I noticed a void in the marketplace for a versatile, stylish, comfortable winter boot.  With all of my old foot injuries and remaining scar tissue, I wanted to create a cozy, stylish boot with good arch support, easy entry, and an anti-slip sole to wear after my winter activities.  As an added plus, the design I came up with allows the boot to become a supportive slipper simply by removing the outsole.

Whether Alpine or Nordic skiing, snowshoeing or ice skating, most of us can agree that there are few things better in the winter months than getting your heart pumping in the snow and feeling the sweet kiss of  powder on our cheeks…except, maybe, what comes after...Après!  Our boots are stylish enough for any mountain resort from Aspen to Zermatt and they are so comfortable you won't want to take them off. This campaign is so important to the success of our company.  Due to factory minimums, it takes a lot to get a shoe line off the ground.  We are using high quality materials so that we can produce a product that's truly great.  The boots are being made in Brazil.  Factories and suppliers require money before they will even start on an order and that's why we need your financial support! Your contributions and support will help this mostly women-run small business have a chance in an over-saturated marketplace run by huge, established companies.  Isn't it time for something new in a market where everyone is designing the same old shoes over and over again?
We designed 4 styles, however we will be offering 2 styles, (as seen below) on this campaign.  For every $20,000 past our goal we will offer another style due to factory minimums.




    What We Need & What You Get Let's break it down:  We need $65,000 to make a full production order.  Factories have pair minimums and they will not touch an order unless you meet their minimums.  
 If you contribute $250 you will be one of the first to wear an Après Style by Zisler boot!
We have a variety of contribution options(perks) and ALL will be helpful.
 If we do not reach $65,000 you will get your pledge money back and our campaign will be void...no perks will be fulfilled.  If this happens, our boots will not be made at all unless we get a large enough store order.
PLEASE HELP US ACHIEVE OUR GOAL!
    Risks & Challenges  As an entrepreneur, I understand risk.  I understand it can be a struggle to decide where you want to invest your money with all the options out there.  By contributing to Après Style by Zisler you can be a part of the American dream.  In a world of conglomerates, isn't it nice when a woman can follow her dream, start a shoe line from scratch, and raise it to become a successful self-sustaining business?  I have been designing shoes for over a decade and I have the design, factory, and sales experience to bring our line to fruition. I will travel to the factories and oversee production to make sure you are getting great boot workmanship.    Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:  Any contribution helps!  If you are strapped for cash, please spread the word of our campaign to as many people as you can...publicity is very helpful!
 Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
The world is full of beautifully unique places, systems and beings, however many of them will soon be gone forever. 

 

Massive coral bleaching all around the Great Barrier Reef, Japanese dolphins are being brutally slaughtered as we speak. The Solomon islands are being taken over and ruined for logging.  Caribbean reefs are being altered by man-introduced fish that have already dropped certain reef fish populations by 90%! and of course the countless islands and countries such as the Tuvalu, Kiribati, Barbados, Philippines, Bangladesh, Egypt, Maldives and so many more homes to millions of people will soon be under water. 
 
 
We believe in the human race. Throughout our existence we have been able to repeatedly prove our ability to get things done and move forward. We also believe that we should not stop growing, not stop building and not stop creating because it is this innovation that has brought us so far, that has brought many of us healthy enjoyable lifestyles, however if we wish to continue on this great journey and share it with others then we have to be more efficient and we need to live smart.
 
It may not be one trick that fixes our climate and balances out our globe, but there are enough small things we can do to make a huge impact together.


This is one of our plans, and hopefully you can help:

 

 

To do our part in keeping our planet clean and sustainable we have created the SEAVAL Shades, made sturdy out of the most sustainable material to grow from our soil today, bamboo. The sunglasses come with top quality polarized lenses, great sense of style and comfort and to support extreme athletes and hands-on activists we made them durable, waterproof and they float!
 
Yes our sunglasses have more sustainable processes and materials than other brands, but that's not all we're doing to help. We have partnered with some of the best organizations and certainly our favorite, who have dedicated themselves to bettering our planet and solving global issues.

With each purchase of SEAVAL Shades you can help us donate to them at no additional charge. See the info below and help us help them help us all.  

For each pair of SEAVAL Shades, you help us donate $5 to the organization of your choice!

We are launching our new line of SEAVAL Shades in collaboration with some of the best, and definitley our favorite, wildlife conservation organizations. 
With each purchase of Shades you make, we will donate $5 to the organization of your choice! See the organizations below and pledge for a pair of SEAVAL Shades on the option labeled with their name.

___________________________________________________________________________________

 

 

 

Ric O’Barry’s Dolphin Project is a campaign under the International Marine Mammal Project at the non-profit Earth Island Institute. The Dolphin Project aims to stop dolphin slaughter and exploitation around the world.  This work has been chronicled in films such as the Oscar-winning documentary The Cove, A Fall From Freedom, and in the Animal Planet mini-series Blood Dolphin$. Campaigns for dolphin protection are currently underway in a variety of locations around the globe, including, Indonesia, Faroes Islands, Solomon Islands and India.  

For more information and options to support Ric and the dolphins, please click the image below and visit www.dolphinproject.org 




___________________________________________________________________________________

 

 

Although a beautiful creature, the lionfish has been a major threat to the many waters and reefs it has recently invaded. Due to an aquarium release in Florida the lionfish found itself in a surrounding with no natural predators and everything to eat. This allowed the Pterois volitans to roam freely and spread out in massive numbers across the Caribbean, Southern United States, Central America and parts of South America in no time.
The lionfish can lay over 30,000 eggs every 4 days, is protected by long venomous spines, eats over 3 times its body weight daily, have dropped certain reef fish populations by over 90% already and are responsible for immense amounts of coral damage!

Lionfish Elimination Team is the leading reaction organization dedicated to safely and efficiently removing lionfish from the invaded waters. This is done by organizing and training divers/hunters, collecting and sharing data with specialists, collaborating with governments in order to allow and push forward lionfish hunting programs and of course getting down and dirty on the reef and removing lionfish themselves.

For more information on LET Divers, check out their famous facebook page and website by clicking the image below:

 

 

___________________________________________________________________________________

 

Are you interested in getting one of the first pairs of the new SEAVAL Shades at a price less than half the prospective retail price AND help supprt these organizations? Great! We have a couple of awesome options for you on the right!


The first 150 ORIGINAL and 150 DIVER models are available now for an even more exclusive discount of only $48 so be the first to buy and share this option with your friends. 
When these spots run out, don't worry, you can still get one of the first new models of the SEAVAL Shades with acessories at a great price of $64 shipped right to your door.
(For shipping outside of the US please add $12)

When pledging on one of the options make sure you select the organization you wish to donate to; the option is marked with either a (DP) or an (LET) standing for Ric O'Barry's Dolphin Project and the Lionfish Elimination Team, respectively.

The SEAVAL Shades are currently offered in two main new models, the ORIGINAL and the DIVER. Both of these models allow for slight customization (color, lenses..) which you do not have to mark when ordering. Simply pledge on either ORIGINAL or DIVER and once the campaign is over we will send you an email allowing you to make your final decisions on how you would like your Shades customized.

Check out the various models below:

ORIGINAL Light (Natural Bamboo)

 

ORIGINAL Dark (Black Bamboo)

 

DIVER Light (Natural Bamboo)



DIVER Dark (Black Bamboo)

 

DIVER Dark Blu (Black Bamboo, Ocean Lenses)

 

Included Accessories

Along with your purchase of SEAVAL Shades you will also receive a durable bamboo case of either natural or black bamboo, coressponding with your Shades of choice.
In addition we will add a natural cleaning cloth and protection bag for comfort and safekeeping.

Click Here or on the Gallery tab at the top of the page for more images

Thank You to:

The Lionfish Elimination Team and Ric O'Barry's Dolphin Project for their amazing close collaboration with us and

Turtle&Ray Productions for generously providing us with top quality marine footage for our video!

See more of their work at: http://www.facebook.com/turtleandray

And of course all of our Indiegogo supporters!

story:
With your help we would like to bring this technology to all.

This project starts from year expert that we could do in the field of direct printing on textile, we started several years ago, with basic models and then move on to ever more efficient models and competitive.

All this is great but we want to do more, to give the opportunity to many to enter this wonderful World of textile printing and personalization.

On the current market there are other printers of this kind, each one with pros and cons, but all with high prices.
We want to create a product that brings together all the positive things but at a reasonable price and the only way to achieve this is to make it happen together.


The Butterfly v3 is an inkjet printer for direct printing on textile, with this you can customize various kinds of garments, such as T-shirts, polo shirts, sweatshirts, leotards, aprons, table cloths, shoes, caps, etc.
This technique is essential to coat that slice of the market where the traditional screen printing can not be of help, such as small productions or complex graphics in full color, where the cost of the frames would be too high.

With this printer you can start a business right away, just add your creativity and the result is secured.

This is a machine with many positive features.

The main ones are:
- Loading system ink bags to ensure optimum conservation
- Recirculation of white ink to prevent separation and sedimentation
- System "WetCap system" to keep the head always damp even in stand-by
- Automatic cleaning system
- Integrated PC
- Touch screen
- Rapid platen system
- Very high resolution and fast printing
- Printing area of some 30 x 50 cm (11.8 x 19.7 in)


Textile ink is not toxic, it is water-based and subject to evaporation.
To ensure excellent preservation we decided to adopt a system of bags, easily replaceable and no chip control.

You will be free to use the ink of your choice.

We are many years studying and improving our ink and arrived in good results.
Our ink has a formulation that can realize prints lives and resistant to washing with a minimal maintenance requirement.



As everyone now knows, the white ink is what can cause problems if not managed well.
In Butterfly v3 there will be a system of recirculation and filtration so as to keep the ink in excellent condition and ready for printing.


A leading cause of clogging of the print head is the air, to avoid this we have devised a "WetCap System" which, at the time of stand-by, pushing the cleaning liquid in the sponge where the head is supported so as to keep forever humid.



To keep the printer efficiently, we decided to integrate a system of cleaning and loading ink by electric pump.
in this way it is possible to perform cleaning cycles or loading, in a clean and productive way.



These will be the main platen through which you can customize different things.


The Butterfly v3 will be equipped with a print head composed of 8 channels divided into 180 nozzles each one, all with technology "Variable drop" which allows to print three different drops ensuring optimum printing.



With this machine you can make high-quality prints with ease. For printing garment clear, so no need to print a white base, is sufficient to load the image into the printer, select the margins and print settings, load the garment, press start and after dry with heat press or industrial oven.

As seen in the chart below, it is all very easy and fast.


For printing garment dark, then with the need to print a white base, simply pretreat the garment and load, load the image into the printer, select the margins and print settings with white base, press start and after dry with hot press or an industrial furnace.

As seen in the chart below, it is all very easy and fast.



We thought of a campaign a bit 'special,

promote a high quality product at an extremely low price.

We are sure that thanks to you, our project will be constructed and that this technology will have an excellent momentum worldwide.



Below we want to show some pictures and videos of clothing printed with the sister Butterfly v2, this gives you an idea of how and what you can achieve with this technology.




                                     The Butterfly v3 is a business for you.

promote a high quality product at an extremely low price.

                                     The Butterfly v3 is a business for you.

story:
why neno?

When you are not using it , the mask is exposed to micro powders, microorganisms and various pollutants which will then be breathed in once the mask is worn.

neno 

is a patented design case that has been adapted for this problem.

Even if it is an essential design it has some special features:  

inside each neno box there are  two  medical-grade bags  that contains natural and safe salts that absorb the humidity produced by the breath, creating a hostile environment for bacteria and viruses.

Food-grade silicone gasket for an airtight, dust and moisture proof seal . 

 One-handed opening/closing  (only magnets no hinges)

Just press on the corner and it will magnetically lock in the open position.

 

neno uses 8 very strong neodymium magnets

 

minimal,elegant & mom approved!

a beautiful gift for your relatives and friends.

 

Divisible into two parts so once in a while you can regenerate the salts with the sun.

 

 Wood is the only material that only needs water, air and sun to grow.

Each cubic meter of plastic replaced by wood is equivalent to one less ton of carbon dioxide released into the atmosphere.

 

innovative and patented design (prototipe n°7 in photo)

Made with love by real Italian artisans.

Uvg light sterilization before shipping.

 

inventor:

HI i am Lello , 3d modeling designer and passionate about carpentry.

This is my first project on Indiegogo and I only did it using  a smartphone, but I'm sure of Neno's potential. I've had many positive responses  from family and friends who use it every day; I hope you will like this project too.

 thank you very much!!

story:
Welcome to the party, pal!

We are Influx Clothing UK. We make T-Shirts we want to wear. If you want to wear them too then that's even better!

All our T-Shirts are printed using dye sublimation, a technique which allows the fabric to absorb the ink directly.  So no plasticy feel, no colour loss and definitely no flaking away in the wash.

We are passionate about our designs and only print using high quality techniques and the best quality products.  There's nothing worse than buying a T-Shirt you love and only being able to wear it a handful of times before the design begins to diminish or it starts to lose its shape.  Let's face it, we've all encountered the dreaded T-Shirt tail; where the garment loses its shape and flies away at the base of the back.  Don't you just hate that?!  We certainly do.  After all it's a T-Shirt not a T-Skirt!

With Influx Clothing there's no chance of that.  After intensive research and product testing we have found what we believe to be the highest quality dye sublimation garments money can buy.  Combined with the quailty of a dye sublimation print these T-shirts are certainly made to last.

We Need Your Clothes, Your Boots And Your Motorcyle.

If you check us out at influxclothinguk.bigcartel.com  you'll see that we already have some awesome tees for sale. And if you want to purchase any of those then we'll happily oblige. However there are a few designs on there that are coming soon. And that's where you come in. We want to make those designs a reality.
The funds that we are trying to raise will allow us to purchase enough blank stock and printing consumables which we can then use to launch these products.
The products which we want to launch are:
The Hood , The Mad and The Ugly
Eric the Redeemer
We Can Do It
We're also excited to launch our Travel Card Holder campaign which these funds will also allow us to do.
You Shall Not Pass!!!
We are an already established T-Shirt company and have perfected our printing technique to an exceptionally high standard. The only risk on this fundraising campaign will be if no one wants to see us launch our awesome new designs. And that would be a sad day for humanity.
Keep Ya Change Ya Filthy Animal
If you can't contribute to this campaign then that's not a problem. Thanks for taking the time to look. Feel free to follow us on Twitter @influx_clothing and spread the word of Influx.

We are an already established T-Shirt company and have perfected our printing technique to an exceptionally high standard. The only risk on this fundraising campaign will be if no one wants to see us launch our awesome new designs. And that would be a sad day for humanity.
Keep Ya Change Ya Filthy Animal

If you can't contribute to this campaign then that's not a problem. Thanks for taking the time to look. Feel free to follow us on Twitter @influx_clothing and spread the word of Influx.

story:
In addition to being made from USDA Organic bamboo (see more below), our fabric is Oeko-Tex 100 certified, meaning they're guaranteed to contain no harmful chemicals or toxins. This makes them perfect for those with sensitive or irritable skin.

Moxy and Zen underwear is made with bamboo viscose, a fabric so soft and breathable, your cotton underwear will feel like plastic bags with leg holes after wearing our undies. 

Bamboo viscose is so efficient at circulating air that it will keep your nether regions a degree or two cooler than wearing any other type of fabric.

It's also extremely moisture absorbent. It wicks moisture away from your skin before odor-causing bacteria has a chance to wreak havoc. 

Super breathable underwear that efficiently wicks moisture away from your skin means that even after a long day in the office or traveling, Moxy & Zen undies will leave you feeling fresh, making them perfect for workaholics, travelers, hikers, or binge gamers.

We don’t stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing. 

- George Bernard Shaw  

It's the little things in life that really matter. We wanted our underwear to be super comfortable with fun patterns in the hopes that they would bring a small smile at the start of a long day and be one of the reliable little things that helps people keep on keeping on.

We wanted fun and nerdy underwear patterns that we couldn't find anywhere else. All of our women's and men's undies will be available in these patterns:

We want to make a lot of patterns. Help us get there by sharing this Kickstarter page with your friends because the more support we have, the more exclusive underwear patterns and designs can become available!

In our quest to create the greatest undie, we researched many fabrics and were particularly surprised at how bad cotton was for the environment. So much so that we vowed to never sell cotton products.    

For starters, cotton is grown on 2.4% of the world's farmlands, but accounts for nearly 25% of all pesticides sold around the world! That works out to nearly 500 000 tonnes of pesticideused on cotton each year. There is a lot of energy and money needed to spray that much pesticide over that much farm land.

Cotton is also a very thirsty plant, it needs 5 bathtubs of water to grow enough cotton for 1 pair of men's boxer briefs. And because it is uprooted after every harvest, the soil loses nutrients, forcing farmers to use a lot of fertilizer. Worst still, compared to bamboo, you need 60 hectares of cotton to produce enough fabric material as 1 hectare of bamboo.

Long story short, we spent a lot of time looking at cotton and other fabrics and concluded that cotton is a bad option for anyone looking to be eco-friendly. We wrote an article about this on Medium if you want to know more.

Moxy & Zen underwear use waistbands that are designed to last and keep their form. Even after years of wear, they will not roll when you're bending or lose their stretch. They are soft and have no tags or unneeded stitching to keep your waist irritation-free and feeling good!

We don't use tags on the insides of our waistbands as we find they can sometimes cause irritation. They're also an unnecessary expense and don't add to the comfort or functionality of underwear. Our washing instructions are ironed on and guaranteed to be unnoticeable.

We really don't like the concept of branding/ads on underwear, especially the names of old men. We don't put any branding on our waistbands because we think the world has enough ads, we don't need more on your bum, even if it's from a super awesome brand like Moxy & Zen.

From the funky undie exterior, to the comfort of your posterior, we knew that to make our product stand out in a crowded market, we needed to put a shocking amount of time and energy into getting the basics right. We've set up numerous underwear tests, contests, and giveaways. 

We've given customers free undies for the sole purpose of getting our undies on as many butts as possible. We got the feedback we needed that assured us our product really is the greatest undie humanity has ever known.

Our undies have been tested on thousands of butts. We've collected feedback by awkwardly asking every customer and beta tester all kinds of questions about underwear. As a result, we've made several product iterations to get our undies to fit right and feel great.

Our men's line has been tweaked repeatedly to become what we think is the peak of men's underwear development. 

Our women's underwear has been tested on all kinds of lady shapes and sizes. We've given away dozens of free samples, done comparative product analyses, and gathered feedback from various surveys and focus groups. We've added a bit more fabric to the butt than a typical woman's undie to minimize the risk of butt crack exposure and to provide more support for your bottom. The feedback has been overwhelmingly positive!

We use flatlock stitching throughout. All our stitching is guaranteed to be unnoticeable and irritation-free. 

We iron on our washing label and don't use potentially irritating tags either sewn into seams, or on the waistband. Moxy & Zen undies were built to maximize comfort by ignoring non-essential features.

As any seasoned globetrotter will tell you, traveling light is key. Not only are Moxy & Zen underwear light weight, but they're so breathable they'll keep you fresh for days. This allows you to save pack space while inducing zen no matter where you find yourself.

When it comes to travel, quality > quantity.

We have sizes small to xx large available for both men and women. Check out our sizing chart below to find out exactly what that means.

To measure your waist, use a tape measure and measure around the most narrow part of your torso. If you are in-between sizes, size up for a looser fit, or down to keep things snug. 

We started off as Buddha Boxers and launched our first Kickstarter selling men's boxer briefs in early 2017. We didn't know what to expect and were blown away by the support and feedback we got.  

But since then, the feedback from women was overwhelming and very clear: They wanted the most comfortable undies too. And so, we set out to make the world's most amazing panties.     

We weren't happy with simply making the most comfortable underwear, we also wanted them to look awesome and be a way to express ourselves, even if no one else can see.

The thing is, nothing in your life will ever be closer to you than your undies. If they're uncomfortable, they're just going to distract you from everything else. You need the zen feeling brought on by wearing super comfortable undies. And with fun patterns that tap into your inner moxy, you’ll be aglow with Moxy and Zen!

story:
Kara Beauty is a cosmetics brand that has an aim to create beauty through simpler and easier ways. The products that the brand provides are multi-functional makeup with 100% natural ingredients.

 

 

'Beauty Made Simple'

 

 

 

Kara Beauty is a brand created for a degree project by Clarissa Devina Gunawan that has an aim to help women have a faster and simpler makeup routine. With the tagline ‘beauty made simple’, the brand provides multi-functional makeup products that are made from 100% natural ingredients. Targeting consumers that prefer simple and minimalist makeup, the brand also leverages two of the UN Sustainable Development Goals, gender equality and responsible consumption and production.

 

 

 

What makes the products from the brand unique is that they are multifunctional makeup. All of Kara Beauty's products would not be specified for only one use. However, otherwise, each product will have more than one purpose, for example, a cream that people can use on their lips, cheek, and as an eyeshadow, or a pomade/rigorous cream that can be used for the eyebrow and as an eyeliner. Moreover, all of the brand products will also be made of 100% organic materials, where people will not have to worry about whether or not the product will damage their faces, as all-natural ingredients make them. Ethical working and low consumption and production are two things that make Kara Beauty unique as not all brands care about the environment.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our products are all made of 100% natural ingredients.

 

 

 

This crowdfunding aims to bring Kara Beauty’s product to life, including creating packaging. All of the products will be made by marginalized women, who have hardship, such as single-parent women or women who experienced workplace harassment.

Kara Beauty plans to work together with Singaporean non-profit organization – AWARE if the goal of this crowdfunding is exceeded. The brand would also like to collaborate with AWARE to create the formula for the brand's 100% natural ingredients products. Therefore, by donating to this project, you will not only help Kara Beauty, but you will also help women in need. 

 

 

 

 

To create the packaging includes a manufactured perspex compact case. Kara Beauty would need to order a minimum quantity of 12 000 pieces per design. The investment capital requires to meet the minimum order makes this a challenge.

 

 

 

Kara Beauty Small Drawstring Makeup Pouch

 

Kara Beauty Zip Makeup Pouch

 

Kara Beauty Compact Mirror

 

Eye and Brow Paint

 

*Note that all of the pictures above are mockups. 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Just because you can not contribute doesn't mean you can't help! You can help us by making some noise about this campaign and to share the link of our Indiegogo campaign with your friends and family!

 

Also, you can follow us on Instagram at karabeauty.sg

 

Thank you! Your help would mean a lot to us!

story:
Here at Sneaks& Swag we customize and restore Boots&Sneakers with great quality and unique customization for an affordable price. We need your donations to start up our business because we need money for an air compressor, paint, better quality paint brushes and shoe cleaners . Our Mission at Sneaks&Swag is to make our customers feel that what they have on their feet are unique and made exactly for them. Also people who donate will receive an entry for a free pair of custom sneakers  by Sneaks&Swag.

Sneaks&Swag Business Plan

Here at Sneaks&Swag we provide quality sneaker and boot customizations at an affordable rate. Getting your sneakers or boots customized benefits you the customer because you will feel that your customized or restored sneakers or boots are cool and unique because they were made just for you. You the customer would feel that their sneakers or boots are like brand new because they were restored by us at Sneaks&Swag. Our service is greatly needed because roughly 300 million pairs of sneakers are thrown away each year according to (http://usagainblog.com/2013/05/17/the-shoe-waste-epidemic/) because they don’t see the value in them when there could be a huge value to them if you got them customized or restored by us at Sneaks&Swag.

Competitive Advantage

Our advantage at Sneaks&Swag is that our customizations are more original and unique than other customizers. Another advantage is that our customizations are faster to get back (1 month fastest 3 months longest) than other customizers which take as long as 6 months. Furthermore your sneakers or boots do not have to be in DS condition (dead stock or great condition) when you send them to us unlike other customizers who require DS sneakers only. Finally we provide high quality full sneaker and boot restorations which is something that other customizers do not offer.

Competitors

Some of our competitors are Kickstradomis, District customs, Dejesus customs, and Mache customs.

Organization and Management

The best organization partners for Sneaks&Swag are sneaker stores like: Nike, Adidas, Foot Locker, Finish Line, and Kicks Usa. These stores are helpful because they are major sneaker distributors. Angelus Direct would also be a great organization because they are the best and only leather and suede paint and dye distributors. Sneaks&Swag uses Angelus Direct for all of its painting and cleaning supplies.

Marketing & Sales

We plan to market Sneaks&Swag by using social media sites such as: Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Twitter, and Pinterest to spread the word about Sneaks&Swag customizations and restorations. Our sales strategy is to have our service featured in popular sneaker distributor stores like: Nike, Adidas, Foot Locker, Finish line, and Kicks Usa. Being featured in these stores is key because most of our customers get their sneakers or boots from these stores.  

Financial Projection

Our Financial projection is that we will be receiving at least two sneaker or boot customizations per week ($75). We also project to be doing at least 3 sneaker or boot restorations per week ($50). We are projecting $125 per week which is a total of $500 per month. We will be taking out -$75 per month on advertising such as our website, social media, etc. We will be also taking out -$75 for supplies such as paint brushes, paint, cleaners etc. We also will be taking out -$50 for our hard working employees and we will be taking out -$75 for sneaker shows or events. By the end of the month will be left with $225 for savings (If anything goes wrong or needs to be fixed). We are projecting $6,000 in sales this year. By the end of the year we will have $2,700 in savings money.

What We Need

Your donations will enable us to purchase customization materials that will keep our business afloat.

Vashon Chapman

http://sneaksswag.bigcartel.com/

story:
Who are we?

Ex Gratia was founded on the idea that more can be done to support the many causes around the world that go unnoticed in our daily lives. We wanted to create a stylish line of clothing that would not only donate a portion of proceeds to charity, but also raise awareness for certain issues. Many different causes have generic tees that have been worn once then tossed to the bottom of your clothing pile. Ex Gratia wanted to create a stylish design that would be worn again and again, getting the most exposure for the cause. 

Our first release:

When creating our first tee, we wanted to design it around one of our favorite causes, Clean Water. It is estimated that 4,100 children die everyday around the world due to water related diseases. Dirty and contaminated water is one of the lead causes of death in the world, and yet, no one talks about it. With this design, we hope to raise awareness about the issue and donate 10% of the profits to one of the leading charities in Water. 


What will the money benefit:

We will be using the funds to create the tee's, create and fund our website for a year, pay for more designs, and stock inventory, which allows us to keep prices lower in the future. We cannot do this without the support of you guys, so even if you cannot afford to purchase a reward, please share and spread the word about Ex Gratia, so we can benefit those around the world who need it most.

The Future:

We are currently working on more designs in relation to other issues that we are passionate about. Some of these issues include:

  • A Green Earth
  • World Hunger
  • Cancer Awareness
  • Homelessness 

If you are passionate about a certain issue and have any design ideas, we are always welcome to new ideas. In order to grow this business, we need all of the support we can get. Please follow us on social media to keep updated on our journey.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ExGratiaStore

Instagram: ExGratiaStore


After the campaign is over, we will send out a survey to everyone who purchased a shirt regarding what size you want. 

Risks and challenges

We created a Indiegogo so we could print the actual amount of shirts ordered, instead of using a Print on Demand business. We did this so the prices would be significantly lower, and we could donate more to the different causes. Without the support of everyone during the Indiegogo campaign, we will have no option but to move to the more expensive option. We hope that you will support us on this journey.

Without the support of everyone during the Indiegogo campaign, we will have no option but to move to the more expensive option. We hope that you will support us on this journey.

story:
Who we are

BaqPaq is all you could ever need or want, all on your back. Charge your phone on the go, ask the bag what the weathers like in an hour, and track all of your belongings - plus much more!

BaqPaq is a project we've been working on for some time now and would love to make it a reality. We're web developers currently, and wanted to see if we could take a physical product, in this case the backpack, and improve it and help it adapt to the new decade ahead.

We've come up with an AI Integrated, feature filled solution that we believe is perfect for the everyday backpack user in the 21st century. The key points include, but are not limited to:

  • A personal assistant that communicates from the bag (AI)
  • A Data connection (either separate or connected to your phone) to keep you connected
  • A Mobile Hotspot and Wi-Fi Access using the above connection
  • An LED Inside the bag that turns on when bag is opened
  • A Personal Cloud System for files
  • A Companion app to customise preferences from your phone.
  • A CCTV-Style Camera, for the moments you wish you caught, or even in case of an accident.
  • Speakers! Take your music with you, and, share it with others.
  • A Solar Powered Battery pack! The bag never needs charged, so long as you use it!
  • A Tracking system using provided NFC Tags, meaning you will get an alert on your phone if you leave something behind!
  • An alarm is fitted, if the bag is moved out of range from the phone while connected, an alarm will sound, deterring any sticky fingers!

We're very proud of it at this point, and have developed many schematics, branding resources and even the mobile app. All we need now is a little help to develop our prototype and put it in front of investors.

What's next?

Essentially, this is our plan for the next steps ahead.

  • We want to be able to get our product in the form of a working prototype in front of as many users we can to review and gather feedback.
  • After gathering the feedback we'd love to then revise and move forward, hopefully to some investors!
  • We believe that £5000 will be sufficient to make multiple prototypes, advertise the bag, send the prototypes out for review.
  • We need to be able to buy the components required to fit the bags and get them all interconnected. This is our next step and the one we need funding for.

Your contribution

Your donation would help us greatly improve this product and develop a prototype. We believe this bag could be revolutionary in the way people carry things day to day and use something more creatively that is often overlooked.

  • If you decide to back us, you will receive one of our first prototypes to test and review.
  • You'll help a potentially revolutionary product get to market and in front of everybody.
  • You'll be funding hopefully the startup of an exciting new tech company, using technology to improve a humans day to day life, and maybe make it easier.

Risks & Challenges

Our plan is to get to market but that's some time off yet. If the prototype isn't well thought out it could lessen our chances, so

  • We've sourced all the products we need to build it as according to our, long, thought out plans.
  • We've brainstormed steps we can take to help us when it comes to marketing and the final stages of development.

 

We believe that this product has massive potential, we just need the resources to get it there.

Check out our web design services at www.dystortion.co.uk

Thanks, the BaqPaq team

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Seit 30 Jahren unterrichtet unsere gemeinnützige Kampagne freshFANTASY Kinder und Jugendliche auf Trendsportgeräten: Inlineskates, Einrädern, Waveboards, Snowboards, Heelys usw. - aber bei keinem dieser Geräte war die Begeisterung so groß, wie bei den SnakeSurfern. Nachdem es keinen Hersteller mehr gibt und den meisten Schulen das Geld zur Anschaffung dieser tollen Innovation fehlt, möchten wir es in hochwertiger Form selbst produzieren lassen und möglichst vielen Schulen und Sportvereinen auf Spendenbasis beschaffen. Deshalb besteht jedes Perk aus zwei (!) Sets SnakeSurfer: eines für Dich und ein weiteres, welches Du dann einer Schule oder einem Sportverein Deiner Wahl überreichst.

Um einen ersten Container ordern zu können, benötigen wir 900 Bestellungen.

Info zum SnakeSurfer:

Mit dem SnakeSurfer kannst Du überall fahren, wo glatte Flächen sind: in Parks, auf der Spielstraße, in Turnhallen, in der Wohnung, in Skateparks, an Promenaden...
Es ist schnell gelernt und macht dauerhaft großen Spaß!
Das SnakeSurfer fahren fördert die Balance, die Motorik, das Gleichgewicht, die Koordination und die Körperspannung. Vor allem aber den Spaß an der Bewegung!!
Die SnakeSurfer sind - im Gegensatz zu einer billigen Kopie im Internet - nicht aus Plastik, sondern aus Mehrschichtholz (Skateboard-Technik) gefertigt und haben statt Plastik-Bremsen extra hohe Gummi-Stopper, die sicheres Starten und Stoppen ermöglichen und - ganz wichtig - die Turnhallen-Böden nicht beschädigen! 

Mit Deinem Perk unterstützt Du unsere Arbeit und die Gesundheit der Kinder und Jugendlichen in den Schulen und Sportvereinen Deiner Kommune. Die SnakeSurfer werden nicht im Handel angeboten, sondern sind nur über uns und die Schulen/Vereine erhältlich. Ausführliche Informationen dazu findest Du auf unserer Website www.freshfantasy.de. Du kannst uns natürlich jederzeit anrufen oder eine email mit Deinen Fragen schicken: info@schulsport-innovativ.de und Tel. 08243-4169848 in Deutschland.

- we are looking for non profit organizations who wants to adopt this campaign for their country -


Short description

Since 30 years our charitable non profit campaign freshFANTASY is teaching children and youngsters on trend sport products like rollerblades, unicycles, waveboards, snowboards, Heelys etc. - but by none of these devices the enthusiasm was as big as with the SnakeSurfer. After there is no more manufacturer and no chance to finance great and helpful innovations like this for most of the schools we would like to produce it in high-quality form by ourselves and deliver them to the schools on donation base. Therefore, every Perk are two (!) sets of the Original SnakeSurfer: one for you for the regular price and another set for free for a school of your choice. You just have to name the school to us which will be donated from you.

To be able to order the first container, we need 900 orders from Europe.

Information about the Original SnakeSurfer

With the Original SnakeSurfer you can ride wherever you have smooth surfaces: in parks, in gymnasiums, in skate parks, at promenades, parking areas, at home, in your office…

It is very easy to learn and gives you permanently big pleasure!

The Original SnakeSurfer is perfect to train balance, coordination and the body tension.

The Original SnakeSurfer are made - in contrast to a cheap copy on the Internet - not out of plastic, but out of wood (skateboard technology) and have – instead of plastic stopper which comes with the cheap copies - smooth rubber stopper who allows a safe starting and stopping and – very important - which do not damage indoor floors as the plastic stopper will do! 

With your Perk you support our work and the childrens and youngsters health in the schools  of your local authority district. The Original SnakeSurfer will not be available in regular shops - only from us and from schools. Find detailed information on our website www.freshfantasy.de. You can call us of course any time or send an email with your questions: info@schulsport-innovativ.de and Tel. 0049-8243-4169848 in Germany.


- we are looking for non profit organizations who wants to adopt this campaign for their country -
